reviews.review_header: a dangerous product for people ignorant about skincare
reviews.review_text: Let me start out by saying that I do not have sensitive skin. When I applied the bubble mask, it burned, and in fact my skin kept burning for hours afterward. Whenever you feel something fizzing on your skin, it doesn't mean that "it's working", what it really means is that irritation is taking place. The mask is also extremely soapy and hard to wash off, it reminded me of washing laundry detergent off your hands. In fact, I wouldn't be surprised if that was precisely how they made it foam - by adding laundry detergent. I suggest you read up on skincare (reputable, scientifically supported sites like beautypedia.com) and stay away from products like these.
This is such a fun mask to do with a loved one. It isn't too pricy and it gets the job done. Tested it out as a make up remover and it worked too.
This product was expired by six months when I received it. I didn't notice it was expired until after I ordered the product.

I love this mask so much! With just a couple uses I was able to see a drastic change in my skin . I suffer a lot with acne and would spend so much money on Lush masks or spend time making DIY masks but honestly this is the best mask I've ever used . the only thing I have to complain about is that it is a little hard to wash off because it's kind of thick but still totally worth it for the price and the results . Totally recommend it for everyone

I never wrote reviews for anything (good or bad) but I just have to with this! I just used it, and honestly, my face has never felt so CLEAN! And soft, I can't stop touching it. 😊 I would actually give this 4.5 stars because the ingredients are not listed in English, nor are there instructions included. However, all you have to do is Google the product or check Pinterest for the How To. You apply it evenly to an unwashed, dry face. Let sit for 5 mins or until all over bubbles (you'll hear and feel them). Rub in for 1-2 mins, then wash off. Pat face dry. Apply toner/moisturizer or make up as normal, or go fresh faced! This product is seriously worth it. I have an oily T-zone, but otherwise clear skin and this is great for me.

reviews.review_header: The packaging for the product was great. It was nicely packaged with bubble wrap to ...
reviews.review_text: The packaging for the product was great. It was nicely packaged with bubble wrap to protect the box and the shipping was on time. The mask itself is interesting and refreshing. After seeing many reviews about it, I decided to try out the product. It works amazing and leaves my skin feeling soft. One downfall is that I have very dry skin, so I did have to moisturize after using the mask. But other than that, it minimized my pores and left my skin feeling so clean. However, I did notice that after using it, I started breaking out more on my forehead. I'm not sure if that has anything to do with the product or just my skin. Overall, I recommend trying the mask. It's definitely a different mask experience.

It didn't dry my skin out, but after using it several times I really don't see any benefits from it either (any more than any other masks I've tried). Thr applicator is useless, I got much better coverage with just using my hands and if you don't close the container up quickly it starts reacting with the air. Good for a lark, but not for serious skin care.

reviews.review_header: Best Clay Masks I've ever used!

This facial mask made my pores smaller and my skin tighther, smoother, and it added a glow to my face. This is definitely a must-buy product!

This is SUCH a fun mask. You look so goofy and it tickles your face. My skin feels so soft and clean afterward.

This stuff really soaks up all the oil. It made my face feel like your skin does when you use bar soap. I put on serum afterwards and it was really sticky! Like it didn't want to absorb. Waited 5 minutes or so and then put on daily moisturizer. It turned white on my cheek! Like I was putting on thick sunscreen! My face feels smooth, but almost artificial. Like I put on primer that sitting on top of my skin. Checked the box and the date printed on the bottom was 2015!! Expired a year and a half ago!! It's been like 30 minutes and my face still burns with painful tingles. I really hope this hasn't messed up my face!

reviews.review_header: ) so bad that I have to go to a dermatologist for ...
reviews.review_text: I don't understand why this product has a very high rating. It broke my skin (normally without any acne!!) so bad that I have to go to a dermatologist for the first time in my life! Do not buy it unless you want to damage your skin like I did.

Just used this mask for the 1st time and I love the way it bubbles and pops! I googled YouTube tutorials and blog posts to get the directions in English. I left it on for 20 minutes per most reviews and while it didn't make my skin feel itchy there was some tightness as the bubbles formed and popped. My skin feels softer and has a glow after use.

I have pretty dry skin, but like many people have my trouble spots for acne. This mask isn't a miracle but it is a great mask to me personally for one reason, all other clay masks I've tried before left my face too parched. Clay in general is an effective face cleanser and the addition of carbonation leaves my face soft and smooth. I probably use it once a week now.

I love this product! I love trying different and fun masks and this one is great if you want to try something different. When you first put it on, it starts bubbling right away. I wait for about 5 minutes and then I rub it into my skin and then wait a couple more minute and it starts to bubble up more. I love the sensation and I use a warm washcloth to wash this off because it is quite hard to wash this off. My skin feels so soft and hydrated when I use this. I will be repurchasing.

This product is very inconsistent. Its as if the ingredients were changed completely between the first and second purchase. The first time the product was a light gray color and bubbled as expected, clearing up my acne in the process. The second time this was purchased, the product was a dark/muddy green color and did not bubble like the first time this was purchased, worsening my acne problem. This is very unethical, not sure what kind of business these people are running. I would have asked for a refund, but this product is not eligible!

This is by far the most fun and best feeling mask I have ever used. It is a thick creamy texture. When you apply it, it starts bubbling pretty quickly. I left in for fuve minutes and the bu bles got quite thick. It tickled a little around the nose area, but felt good. Then I massaged into my face for 2 minutes and rinsed with warm water. My skin felt super clean, fresh, and smooth afterwards. I had to share it with my Sister and Cousin because I loved it so much! The only negative is the instructions are in Korean. I had to look up directions inline to know how to use it. I highly recommend this face mask. You will love it!

I was looking for this mask and I was so joyful when I received it! I love the texture of it when putting it on, and the bubbles! (/foaming) After using it, my skin felt so soft! Great product do recommend!

This product completely ruined my face. While the mask was on my face my face felt like it was burning. When I finally took it off my face after many many minutes of scrubbing over the sink I noticed my overly dry and flaky skin which is also rough and bumpy to the touch. My face was a super soft feel before I used this product I’m trying so many different ways to reverse what the mask has done to my face but nothing has even helped my return to its orginal texture.
Product description says 4.3 oz. Actual product received was 100ml (3.38oz). 30% of clay mask is MISSING. i would like 30% discount!!

reviews.review_header: I love it because I see results almost instantly - my ...
reviews.review_text: I love it because I see results almost instantly - my skin is lighter, softer, pores are clean, I feel refreshed...I just wish it was a little more forgiving on how quickly you have to apply it!

reviews.review_header: then that's fine, have at it
reviews.review_text: If you're only looking to use this mask for the novelty of it, then that's fine, have at it. But we aware that instead of helping keep your skin healthy and whatnot, it may actually CAUSE you to break out, as was the case with me. I started out with relatively clear skin, no pimples, then I use this mask, and in the same day I got 2. It's really fun to use, because it is neat when the clay bubbles up it's really tickly, and you look like a grey Michelin man; however it's not the best for upkeep.

This product was pretty cool but dried out my skin terribly and I got 3 huge pimples the next day. Won't be using again but if you have the right skin for it, this could be a nice product.

reviews.review_header: Love it😊. I would recommend the mask

while this works well, I hate how it is very hard to find out if this has animal ingredients, which it does. I've been using this face mask for some time now but I immediately stopped buying it when I found out they use some sort of pig skin/pig fat for the collagen ingredient, which I've read has no known skin enhancing effects; I wish they would just take it out! It's so twisted that they have the marketing mascot as a pig...who is wearing the face mask...with dead pig ingredients in it. It's just gross. They don't animal test but using animal ingredients is just as bad and cruel. Do not recommend if you like your skincare cruelty free.

reviews.review_header: ... video on this face mask and I fell in love. I had to have it
reviews.review_text: I watched a YouTube video on this face mask and I fell in love. I had to have it. Searched for it online and finally found it for a reasonable price on Amazon, ordered it and waited. Wahh. The expected delivery date was 1 month away... no, no, no. To my surprise, it arrived on my doorstep sooner than I expected. I rushed home and couldn't wait to get it out of the box and onto my face. It has a unique smell to it. . Don't leave the cover off for too long or it will start to bubble itself. I tried to use the little spatula that it came with, but I'm a hands/fingers type of person. Needless to say, the spatula is still sitting on the cover and it hasn't come off since. You must be quick to apply it because it starts foaming immediately. Don't apply too much around your nose and eyes, it will foam up and you wont be able to breathe or see. LoL. Washed my face and O.M.G. My skin never looked so nice or felt so smooth. I couldn't wait to use it again. Totally recommend.

reviews.review_header: Not a miracle worker, but fun!
reviews.review_text: For starters, I bought this because I saw a tutorial for it and it looked fun and when I looked for it on Amazon, everyone commented on how it battled their blackheads, which is exactly the skincare product I tirelessly search for with no great success. I was excited to try out my new clay mask and put it on as soon as it came. It bubbles VERY quickly so you have to work fast. It tickles a little, but it's fun! When you wash it off it really is a clay mask under all that fluff. So did it defeat my blackheads? Not exactly. I didn't seem to have the life changing experience with it that everyone else did. However I'm thinking I see a reduction in those blackheads around my nose, but I'm not sure if that's just me convincing myself the mask did something. It does leave your skin soft, but mine was also a little dry so you will want moisturizer afterwards. All in all, I don't know that it's necessarily a magic blackhead eraser, but it sure is fun! I would buy it again just for the bubbles!

Totally worth the buy. Be warned though: the product instructions are not in English. Refer to the product info here if you need guidance.

reviews.review_header: Most amazing thing I've ever used, crying tears of joy.
reviews.review_text: I've almost used up my whole bottle now and I have never loved a product more!! I have struggled with horrible acne since I was 13 (I'm 20 now) and this mask was a dream come true. HOW I USE IT: I usually use the mask 2-3 times a week. I put it on before I take a shower. I get a small amount (a little goes a long way here) and rub it all over my face. WAIT 5 MINs! That ALL it takes AMAZING!! After five mins wet your fingers and gently rub your face till the mask feels creamy everywhere. Then get in the shower and wash it off first thing (it will bubble a whole lot so keep your eyes and mouth shut. It doesn't actually burn your eyes though just fyi). Personally I don't like to get this product on my lips (I have very sensitive lips) so use your own method for that. Overall this is THE BEST face mask I have ever used. I have been to many dermatologists for my acne and I have tried everything from pills to washes to help my skin and nothing but THIS AMAZING PRODUCT has helped. THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU Elizavecca!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! <3 <3 <3

Okay so I am obsessed with face masks. Peel off, mud masks, gel masks, sheet masks. You name it, I'll try it. Which is I was ESPECIALLY excited to try this one. I have heard nothing but amazing things about it. So I bought it of course. My best friend and I were going to try it together. We were both so excited. A day before I did the actual face mask, I tested it out on my hand to make sure it was ok. Everything was fine. The next night when we put the masks on our faces, it began to sting a little. I figured the mask was just doing its job. But then we started to feel more and more stinging. Which eventually turned into burning. We washed our faces off as soon as we could and it ended up CHEMICALLY BURNING OUR FACES. We both had extremely red, raw, and sore peeling skin for weeks. I wish I could give this product 5 stars because I really wanted to, but I can't because I almost had to go to the ER for how badly it burned me.

reviews.review_header: but glad that I took a chance at this product
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this product due to my sensitive skin, but glad that I took a chance at this product. I love the results! For those thinking about buying, know that the instructions and info are in Korean. However, you can find this information online, so fear not. The consistency of the mask is very goopy and you have to work fast to get it distributed across your face, otherwise it starts bubbling up. The bubbling feels funny and can itch a bit. Also, be warned that it feels a bit warm. I initially thought it was burning my face, but it's just residual heat from where the oxygen is creating a chemical reaction- thus the bubbling. After rinsing it off my face was soooooo smooth! Just make sure to put on some moisturizer because your skin will be a bit dry. In all, if you are on the fence about buying this product, give it a try! It's fun and totally worth the results!

I ABSOLUTLEY LOVE THIS!!!!!! so I'm 14 and pretty self conscious about my acne. it's not bad, but when I do break out, I BREAK OUT, which sucks. everything is red and super super bumpy. so this came today (on time) and as soon as I got home I decided to try it (on a face that had makeup on it but was then removed by gym class, just so you guys have an idea of what my face was like-gross). so I tried it and I was sending snapchats to my friends as it bubbled, saying how weird it was. I got bored and once it stopped fizzing I squished it down and left it like that for about five minutes. once I wiped and then washed it off, my skin felt kinda tight, which made me worried. but, I let my face air dry and 10 minutes later I touch my forehead and its bump free!!! and my nose is super smooth!!!! all I have are reddish blotchy spots, which are going away, but I've always had those on my face (usually in between my forehead). anyways, long story short, I LOVE THIS!!! I'm planning to use it about once a week or once every other week, so my skin doesn't get deprived of natural healthy oils. 10000000/10 would recommend!!!! (I included a during & after picture)

I even made my mom use it and she absolutely love it. The only thing i didn't like is that there are no instructions in english so i had to read it from a website. So basically after leaving this baby on your face for about 5 minutes and it's already bubbled up like crazy just massage it to your face for a few seconds then i wash it off with warm water. Make sure to use warm water and not lukewarm or cold water since this mask is so hard to remove. If your face starts getting itchy while the mask is bubbling up, it's totally normal. And it'll only last for a few minutes anyways. I then apply my regular moisturizer and my face looked so good.

reviews.review_header: Not recommended for sensitive, combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about this product and couldn't wait to receive it. I have combination skin and am looking for a product that will help clean my skin and also control my blackheads. This product was very easy to apply using the small scoop/mini spatula that comes with it. It definitely was entertaining watching the bubbles slowly start to cover my face. The mask was easy to remove. I used a wash cloth and warm water. My skin felt nice afterwards. It was soft, clean and felt refreshing. A few days later I started to notice changes in my skin. I began to break-out which is highly unusual for me. My cheeks became very red, raw and sensitive. The worst however was the dry flakey skin accompanied by what looked like hives on my chin and around my lower lip. They were very itchy and popped up below my lower lip in clusters. I was panicking because I have never gotten such a horrible reaction to any skin care product before. I wanted to make sure that it was indeed this product that caused the reaction on my face so I waited a week before trying it again. I reapplied this mask a week after and I received the exact same reaction as I did the first time. I will not be using this mask anymore and am very disappointed. I really wanted this mask to work well but it was not for me. If you have sensitive combination skin, please save yourself the time, money and embarrassment and DO NOT buy this product.

reviews.review_text: It's fun to use as a facial mask. It's neat that it bubbles up..but the only thing I don't like is that it feels like a thin film of it is left on my face after I wash it off. It has actually caused me to get acne on my face.
It really works my face skin lightened so the blemishes.
It did not meet my expectations

reviews.review_header: didn't really notice a difference but I've always had pretty clear, combination skin
reviews.review_text: Felt interesting on my face; didn't really notice a difference but I've always had pretty clear, combination skin.
Awful, made my skin burn and irritate. With no instructions nor ingredients written in English.
I didn't receive this item instead I got a random makeup product I didn't order
Very itchy but worth it my face feels amazing
doesn't seem to do anything. waste of money!

This product made my whole face swell up and burn like fire!!!!!! No instructions so I looked it up. Put it on for 5 minutes. I still can't leave the house. My face is still swollen, burning, itchy, red, and dry!! Yeah some of my blackheads are gone but so is my face!!! Very upset. embarrassed to leave the house and my New Year is off to a really bad start! I will be staying home for at least another week. I may have to go to the Doctor if the swelling won't go down. I am taking benadryl and I may need some steroids. I wouldn't touch this product. I think it is more novelty and fun with foam. Let me tell you also that I have skin that is NOT sensitive. Still have blackheads and I look like someone punched me in the eyes and set my face on fire. Happy New Year!!! USE WITH CAUTION!!!! I do not recommend this product to anyone. My face is ruined.

Love love loooove this!! Such a relaxing and fun little mask. I've used it twice and hardly made a dent in the jar. It's tingly and cool feeling in the face. Directions on jar are not in English so I recommend looking up a video on it to see how to use if you have questions.

reviews.review_header: Not impressed.... Does nothing to my skin problem
reviews.review_text: Not really impressed with this mask. I did not notice any changes in black heads after month of using it. My skin got break outs and as well very dry feeling after using this mask.

I was so excited to try this. But I am so disappointed. It smells good. When you put it on your skin, it actually feels good. When it start foam up its really fun tingly feeling. But its so hard to wash off. My face is burning and super itchy. I dont have sensitive or dry skin. i have combination to oily skin. Anyway I wouldnt waste money on thus product.
Came with 1 month till expiration date!
Meh

reviews.review_header: ... video on your FB timeline brought you here don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: If a video on your FB timeline brought you here don't waste your money. This mask is fun but feel like it has no function or actual purpose for your skin. It simply does not do anything. After it bubbles and your blend it in is becomes a slimy mess and requires a lot of water to remove. Felt like the more I washed my face the soapier it got.

I could not have been more excited to purchase this after my sister told me about it. After It took me and my husband to finally pry open the little plastic jar, I applied to my face and the remainder from my hands onto my son's face. Within 2 minutes it was burning and as my 9 year old explained "felt like scraping all over my face". There was no cooling or "light" tingling as others reported. I am very disappointed and will keep to my other all Natural products that don't cause pain. I have very dry skin but not sensitive skin. My 9 year old has normal perfect skin. http://hispanickitchen.com/avocado-hummus-with-spicy-shrimp/
This is simply was waste of time gimmick. It does nothing and feels weird. I want my money back.

This is the second order I've placed for this product and as much as I LOVE the effect it has on my skin I am highly disappointed in this last shipment. The product I received was clearly a return that was sent back out. When I first opened it the outer rim of the jar was coated and there we product missing from the jar. After LOVING this product preciously I don't feel this is hygienic and I will not be ordering again.
I love it!! But it is very slimy, when you are washing it. That's the only downside.
Amazing!!!! Absolutely loved it

Shipping was fast but I don't like this mask. I basically threw my money away. The directions are in Chinese so I wasn't sure if I was supposed to wash my face first, how long to keep it on, or what exactly it was good for. All this mask did for me was sizzle up!

reviews.review_header: Ingredients list given is a lie
reviews.review_text: It dried out my skin, didn't do anything. The ingredients list on Amazon are completely wrong. They are only key ingredients. I bought the product due to the ingredients but it's a lie. The following are the real infredients of this product: Purified Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, White Clay, Acrylate Copolymer, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Methyl Perfluorobutyl Ether, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Lauramide DEA, TEA-Cocoyl Glutamate, Green Tea Extracts, Glycerine, Dipropylene Glycol, Bentonite, Collagen, Charcoal Powder, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Flavouring Agents, Carbonated Water, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Lavender Extracts, Monarda Didyma Leaf Extracts, Peppermint Leaf Extracts, Freesia Leaf Extracts, Chamomile Flower Extracts, Rosemary Leaf Extracts This product has many chemicals that are bad for your skin. Please do not buy for the sake of fun.

reviews.review_header: Because the 2nd time was much worse and I think I had an allergic reaction to ...
reviews.review_text: Another product that made me break out. I fell into the trap of seeing this on Instagram or Buzzfeed or social media so I tested it. I USED THIS TWICE and threw it out. It gave me breakouts and weird bumps the first time but I thought maybe it's because I was on my period. I should never doubt myself. Because the 2nd time was much worse and I think I had an allergic reaction to it. My mouth and chin just felt weird for the rest of the day.
expired in 2016....

This mask is awesome! It took quite a bit to get it but I am assuming it was due to the holiday season but my face is super smooth and blasted my black heads! It also came with samples of other items. Love love love it, oh and it makes me look like a rain cloud! I usually do face masks 2 to 3 times a week and this is by far one of my favorites!!! Will be ordering again! Small advice, work quick and keep the lid on the container! The product will bubble in the jar!

reviews.review_header: Unable to use because the instructions are in a foreign ...
reviews.review_text: Unable to use because the instructions are in a foreign language. Japanese I think, not sure. Very frustrated. I can't even see what the ingredients are. I am not about to put this on my skin. This is not the same item I ordered. The one I ordered was in English. Very dissapointed!!
I recieved lightly salted edamame in my package, not the carbonated mask. Very disappointed. Not sure how you mess something like that up.

I am always looking for a good mask for my sensitive skin. I have been using a mud mask but they tend to flake everywhere while they're drying. This carbonated mask looked super fun to use so I ordered it on a whim to get me up to the one day shipping threshold. The mask comes with a small spatula under the lid and zero instructions in english, so I had to google to find out how to use it. You're supposed to apply a thick layer to unwashed skin and leave it to bubble completely, around 5 to 7 minutes. Then you can either rinse it off or rub it in, then rinse with lukewarm water. The mask is somewhat stretchier than a normal clay mask- almost like a starchy pudding. I used the spatula to apply it, and made sure that I didn't leave the container open too long. I'm not sure if it's the oils or the air that causes the reaction so I made sure to avoid contaminating the jar with either. I ended up leaving mine on for 8 minutes to get the full bubble effect, and then I tried to rinse. The bubbles came off easily but the underlying mask was harder to remove and kind of slimy. I ended up having to use a konjac sponge soaked in steaming water to get the mask off, but it came off easily with that combo. It took a LOT of rinsing to get the mask out of my sponge so make sure you use a backup one or a washcloth. My skin afterward looked super smooth and hydrated, so the work was worth it. I followed the rest of my routine and have had zero issues with this affecting my skin negatively. Overall, this is a fun mask that I would recommend to anyone looking for a twist on a clay mask. I think that it would be a good idea to use this in the shower when I try it again next week, just so it's less messy.
Wrong item

I ordered this on August 11, 2015 and received it on August 15; I was really surprised by how fast I got it since it was a last minute purchase. My sisters and I have been eyeing this product for a while now due to the rave we hear on Youtube and other Korean beauty sites. We all have different skin types: my baby sister is normal-dry, my oldest sister is oily, and my younger sister and I have combination-oily skin. It comes in a cute packaging with a plastic spoon to scoop the products out (so it's very handy for those who like it clean) but I personally prefer using my hands. You have to spread it on somewhat quick otherwise the product will sit on the face and start its process of carbonating. I followed the instructions and began to feel the carbonation working its magic perhaps 1-1/2 minutes in as it warmed up my face. Massaging it after 5 minutes and rinsing it off took longer than I expected--perhaps I put too much product on? But it was quite messy. Aside from that, I would say my skin felt very smooth and cleaned. I don't know if my face brightened at all but I plan to use this more to see the long-term effects. My sisters haven't used it yet but hopefully they like it just as much as I do.
The product feels nice but it caused my face to break out. I have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_header: It's also a fun mask to do because it tickles just a tiny ...
reviews.review_text: This mask obliterated my blackheads! I had tried pore strips and other masks but none of them did the trick. This is a game changer in my skincare routine. It's also a fun mask to do because it tickles just a tiny bit and makes you look like a rain cloud.

The clay mask jar was a piece of s***! As I opened the box the container was broken full of the clay all over the place. Also by the touch and smell of it, the product was pretty much like glue. Didn't even give it a chance just threw it away.

This product really helps pull my stubborn black heads to the surface and makes it easy for me to get them out! Before I started using it I had to really work hard which was not good for my sensitive skin. I have noticed a huge improvement and recommend this product to all my friends and anyone who wants to get rid of stubborn black heads
I love this product so much....

I ordered this mask because my skin had been flipping out and not only breaking out with deep cystic type acne (you know, the ones under your skin that are tender but never come to a head) but I also have always suffered from black heads and white heads. Nothing I used seemed to improve my pores and it has always been a battle with the blemishes. I decided to give this mask a try and I couldn't be happier. It looks very similar to a normal clay mask and comes with a little spatula type tool to apply it. One thing I like is that you don't have to precleanse your face. Many masks have you wash your face, apply the mask, then wash it off. I feel like that is just too much for our sensitive facial skin. With this mask, you can just put it on (obviously don't do it on top of makeup or something). I love getting up and being able to brush my teeth, put on this mask, gather my clothes and such, and then hop into the shower to remove it. So simple! I wasn't sure what to expect, but the mask applies smoothly with the tool provided and then foams up as it is left on. Once it's all foamed up, the next step is to kind of smoosh the foam back down and massage onto your face as you would a soap. Lastly you rinse it off. When I use this mask, my face feels clean and refreshed but not dry, and I think it gives me a healthy glow. My skin also just feels lovely! When this product arrived, I had several breakouts and a particularly bad blemish in addition. After 2 uses of this mask, my skin has almost completely clear.

This mask was SO much fun, and it actually did make my skin gorgeously smooth and glowing when I washed it off. The following two days, however, I ended up having to deal with severe dryness/peeling/flaking. If you've ever used Retin-A, it was identical to the initial purge your skin goes through. I would actually be willing to put up with the two days of horror just to have that initial gorgeous glow for a special event. Left to its own devices, my skin is normal, with dryness in the winter.
My girlfriend accidentally fell asleep with this on her face and the next morning her face was raw and bloody.
Instructions not in English

I bought one for myself and one for my friend. She tells me she uses it all the time and it tingles when the bubbles start to foam. she loves using it. Her daughter even uses it. I have yet to use mine because I havn't found a tool to get it out of the container yet with out using my hand and ruining the whole jar. Once agian there are no instructions on the container so if your thinking of purchasing this product, here are the instructions. How to Apply Elizavecca Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask It’s simply to use a carbonated bubble clay mask. While it’s not necessary to wash your face first, you should ensure that you do wash your hands. You can use the mask day or night, it doesn’t matter. You don’t have to wash your face in advance to use the mask, as you’ll be rinsing your face off after you do use it. Many women choose to use the carbonated mask as a makeup remover. However, you can also use it in the last step of your skin cleansing program if you wish. If you wear long-lasting permanent makeup, you may wish to remove your makeup first, as the clay mask may not have enough cleansing power to remove it. The Milky Piggy comes with an included spatula. All you have to do is use the spatula to remove a small amount from the jar. You can use this to scoop out about a half a tablespoon of the clay product. This also keeps the quality pure. You can use the spatula to spread it over your face, or your fingertips. Gently tap it on the skin of your face, avoiding nostrils, eyes, lips, and hairline. You should be aware that the product does foam up so you may wish to place a smaller amount on your face than you would normally for a clay mask. You don’t want to overdo it then have to worry that the clay may drip off. Ensure that it’s evenly spread on your face. You don’t want to leave any large blobs as these may fall off and leave you wasting product. Once the mask has been applied to your face, the carbonation inside the mask will cause it to froth up. It begins to froth up as it oxidizes with the air. This process will take about three to five minutes. You’ll soon see how the gooey wet clay will start bubbling up, and become frothy, foamy bubbles. You’ll notice how the foam has a lighter colour than the actual clay mask product. Many people like to watch this happen in a mirror. You will also experience a gentle tingling feeling on your skin. If you wish to provide additional benefits to your skin you can also use your fingertips to gently massage the clay around your face. You can do this for about one or two minutes. Next, apply some water to your face and continue to massage lightly. This will also help to remove the mask from your face once you’re done. This type of clay mask differs from other types of clay masks in that it doesn’t dry out. Don’t bother waiting, or you’ll be waiting for a long time. After the mask has stopped foaming, or about ten minutes, you’ll now be ready to use a clean damp washcloth to wipe it off your face. Use only lukewarm water. Pat your face dry and you’ll see for yourself how your face is so clean and refreshed! Ideally, you should leave your face free of cosmetics, but if you must apply, wait an hour or two to do so, perhaps in the washroom at work. You should use your clay mask only two or three times a week.

reviews.review_header: Bubbly and Effective for Combo Skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to give the mask a try right after I received my package. To preface, I have combo skin, with certain areas that are prone to becoming oily and irritated, while other areas can be dry. My skin is difficult to work with, and I often have a hard time finding products that will help with both oily and dry skin issues. When you use the mask, you MUST use the plastic spoon that came along with the package, as skin oil will activate the foaming ability. Once I applied it to my face, I let the mask foam up for about 10 minutes. The mask is going to foam *A LOT*, but it also provides a bit of a cooling sensation while its foaming. After 10 minutes on my skin, I went ahead and massaged the mask around my face using circular motions for 2-3 minutes, then rinsed the mask from my face. After using it, I definitely felt my skin being more well-balanced, toned, and that larger pores that I have (especially on my nose) are now visibly reduced. I'm going to give this a try on a weekly basis, and maybe increase to 2-3 times a week as my skin requires. For the price, I'm really impressed!

reviews.review_header: Dry Skin? This is the mask for you!
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin, to the point that I use Aquaphor Aquaphor Advanced Therapy Healing Ointment Skin Protectant 14 Ounce Jar as my daily moisturizer. Not to mention, I live in the second driest city in the US (I drink more water than seems possible in a day). Unless I use Aquaphor, my skin is flaking within hours of a cool shower. Understandably, I am nervous to try new masks, as most all of them are too drying. Not the case with this mask! I exfoliated right before use, and patted my skin dry. Then, I used the spatula provided to swipe the mask over my skin. I wiped the spatula before sticking it back into the mask in order to keep the remaining mask in the jar from foaming. By the time I had finished applying the mask to my face, it had started foaming. The foaming action felt somewhere between a tingling and an itching, but not altogether unpleasant. After 5 minutes had passed, I gently wiped away the mask with a warm washcloth. My skin looked brighter, my pores were smaller (did not remove blackheads, though they were less noticeable), and my skin felt softer. I did start to feel some of the telltale "tightening" that us dry-skinned folks are well acquainted with, so I finished with some Jergens Ultra Healing lotion. My skin feels and looks much better, so I am working this into my skin care regimen from here on in!

reviews.review_header: WARNING: this product contains Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend bought this for me because I asked him too. I was super excited to try this on as I'm obsessed with korean beauty product and I read/watch a lot of positive review everywhere (not just on amazon). After trying this mask on, I felt like most of the positive review only comes because the mask is really fun to put on. It makes you look funny and it makes you laugh because of the tingling sensation. Unfortunately, this mask is really hard to rinse off. WHAT BUGS ME THE MOST is that it left my skin squeaky clean which usually is a pretty good indicator that it contains detergent (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate), a cheap foaming agent that will irritate and dry out your skin. I checked on cosdna website and I was right about this. Sodium lauryl sulfate is pretty much one of the ingredient that my dermatologist strongly recommend me to avoid.

Ok here's a few things. When I got the box it was destroyed but that can be blamed on overseas shipping, however when I opened it there is nothing in English except the title... No directions and you can't read the ingredients... I haven't tried the product yet because I have no idea how to use it properly.

reviews.review_header: Leaves Skin Clean Without Feeling Overly Dry
reviews.review_text: I am always skeptical when it comes to the claims that skin care companies make about their various products, but I am quite pleased with the Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask. To start, this mask contains the following ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, White Clay, Acrylate Copolymer, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Methyl Perfluorobutyl Ether, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Lauramide DEA, TEA-Cocoyl Glutamate, Green Tea Extracts, Glycerine, Dipropylene Glycol, Bentonite, Collagen, Charcoal Powder, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Flavouring Agents, Carbonated Water, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Lavender Extracts, Monarda Didyma Leaf Extracts, Peppermint Leaf Extracts, Freesia Leaf Extracts, Chamomile Flower Extracts, Rosemary Leaf Extracts I am hesitant to use products that contain Butylene Glycol in them because it irritates my sensitive skin, but I had read so many great reviews of this mask, I thought I would give it a try. I did a small test swatch on my neck and after 24 hours, there was no reaction, so I moved on to putting it on my face. I did not develop the usual redness and itchiness that I experience with Butylene Glycol, but it does make my skin sting a bit, particularly if I am using it as one of the last steps in my cleansing process. To avoid this, on the days when I do use the mask, I use it as the first step when I wash my face. It effectively removes dirt and sebum from my pores and leaves my skin feeling quite clean, without feeling stripped and dry. You do have to apply the mask quickly as it bubbles up quickly. It takes about 10 minutes for it to reach peak bubbliness. I usually let the mask do its thing and rinse with lukewarm water after 15 minutes or so. For a deeper clean, you can massage the bubbling mask into your skin after a couple of minutes and then rinse after the usual amount of time. I have tried this and I prefer to just let it sit and do its thing. Overall, I am quite pleased with this bubbling face mask and have made it a regular part of my skincare regimen.

Okay, So my husband got me this and I just have to review it. Firstly, lets talk about what you get. You get a jar of the face mask, which has 2 lids. One is the white- creme colored one on the outside, then there is a clearish one separating the product from the air. on the Clear lid, there is a little paddle. The instructions are in another language, but here is how I use it. I scoop two little paddlefuls of the goop onto the inner whitish lid and then put the clear one back on the jar. 2 scoops is normally a generous amount. Then I talk my fingers and apply all over face. Avoid nose and mouth and eyes, this stuff puffs up nicely. I find something to do other than twitching from the tickles for about ten minutes or until it had puffed out and looks like a medium grey color ( it starts out as cloud grey). Then, since I hate having to clean this clay stuff off my sink ( the speckling globs are the worst), I use a paper towel to get the majority off my face. It sort of flattens like a souffle. I then wash the rest off with a washcloth or face scrubby. I read somewhere that it makes your face glow. I totally agree. It's fun, but the only downside I can see is waiting through tickle torture on your face for it to puff up. Other than that, I would recommend this product.

This mask is AWESOME. I originally saw an ad with a reaction video for this product and just had to try it. It took really long for it to come but thats understandable since it did come from Korea. I've used this about 4 times since i've got it and each time it leaves my face super soft. It came with two trial sized creams that were also amazing: Tony Moly goat milk premium moisture cream and Tony Moly panda's dream white magic cream. I've only used the panda's dream once, it had kind of a weird glue sort of smell to it but the goat milk cream smells light and floral. The clay mask doesn't have a smell to it. There are no English instructions on the box or jar that it comes in so I had to look that up. You put about a chestnut worth of mask on your face (I applied it with the little applicator that they have in there, I'm not sure if that was the intended purpose but it works for me) and make sure you shut the container quickly since the product seems to react with the air. The consistency is kind of thick and goopy. Then you wait about 5 minutes and the product bubbles up like crazy. Be careful not to get it too close to your eyes or nostrils when you apply it because it can burn near the eyes and since it bubbles up you don't wanna breathe it in! After the 5 minutes is up I have been rubbing it in and then washing it off with a cloth and it really has been making my face crazy soft and I absolutely recommend it!

I'm impressed with the list of ingredients in this mask. I use it about 3 times/week (mature skin) and alternate it with a traditional clay mask that I customize with a few different essential oils and I also add a couple of other ingredients. This bubble mask seems to be quite refreshing for the skin, as well as clarifying. Once a apply, the foaming bubbles begin within 1 minute. After about 2 more minutes I use my cheap little hand face brush (the kind you can buy at Big Lots, etc., for about $3.00 - kind of like a large round bristled toothbrush). So I brush this in circular motion around my face and let it sit for another couple of minutes. VERY refreshing with all the excellent ingredients in this mask and I definitely recommend.

Well, I dont know if I got a bum batch or my skin just won't bubble up, but I got barely any bubbling at all. When I first opened it, the product looked like super wet hair gel or jelly. Putting it on was nearly impossible with the spatula so I used my fingers, but it was still hard to get on due to the jelly texture. I left it on for 10-15 min. At one point I did spread it around since I read that can increase the carbonation and it still didn't bubble up more. I don't know if it's just the one I got or if I did something wrong? My face was dry. I kept the container open only long enough to scoop some out and immediately sealed it up. On the plus size, I loved the tingling sensation and when I cleaned it off, my face feels super soft and tighter. So even if I didn't bubble up (which is why the three star review,) I did have a clean face that looked nice. I'm just really bummed I didn't get that fun experience everyone else seems to get with this product.

reviews.review_header: Im very disappointed. Mine was greenish clay unlike what others got
reviews.review_text: Im very disappointed. Mine was greenish clay unlike what others got. Theirs was gray. Im not sure if i got a bad one or it's fake. Ive had this on my face for 45 mins now but it still hasnt turned gray/white-ish.

I received this as a gift. I am more than mildly concerned when the first caution on the box is a potential side effect of clinical stigmata (which is basically liver failure). Despite other rave reviews it makes me exceedingly hesitant to try the product. I am unclear as to whether or not this is a translation error or what.

My friend gave me this for my birthday since I've been into Asian Beauty products lately. Before I actually used this carbonated bubble clay mask, I looked at blog reviews and YouTube videos. There was a common theme and it was that this mask, as it bubbles, made their face itchy. So for a while I was hesitant to use it even when I received it as a present. However, I decided to try it out one day and you know what, it's pretty fun. You apply this to your dry face and within a minute (if not seconds) you can feel it bubble up. I assume this bubbling feel is what people meant as their face felt itchy, but I think they over exaggerated. After the mask has fully bubbled up, you massage it and let it sit for another 2 minutes before washing it off. I use this mask before I shower so I can wash it off as I'm showering. This means no more wet floors as you splash your face, trying to get that last bit of stubborn clay mask off. Do note that this mask is not like your typical clay mask in that it will dry up (or at least I've never gotten to that point). However, I do feel the result is similar to the typical clay mask that do dry up. Nothing special, it does what it states. But unlike other clay masks, this provides you with some entertainment (scary or not).

reviews.review_header: this mask does retail for $19 and amazon sells it for much less so this would be a good deal if you or someone you know wants to ...
reviews.review_text: While this carbonated clay mask is novel and very interesting to experience, I do find that it leaves your skin a bit dry. It did make my skin feel really clean and smooth, but as someone who has combination skin that gets really dry in the winter and in certain areas in summer, this would not be my ideal mask. In addition I haven't noticed any changes or improvements to the size of my pores or blackheads from using this. However, this mask does retail for $19 and amazon sells it for much less so this would be a good deal if you or someone you know wants to try out this mask. It is definitely a fun mask to use! Heads up: it does get uncomfortable though when it foams up and makes you have a really strong urge to scratch your face, but I definitely think this mask is fun and good for sleepovers or to do with friends. The mask foams up SO much, its hilarious to see one do this mask.

I cannot express how happy this mask has made me! I've struggled with acne, discoloration, blackheads, and large pores since my teen years and have had no luck finding ONE product to help with all of my problems. Until I started using this mask! I wash my face with my makeup removing wash prior to using the mask. Even though it says it can be used on dirty skin, I'm not willing to task that risk of having make up left on my face. I leave it on for 10 minutes, to really let it work its magic, and then I wet my fingers to smooth the bubbles down and turn it into a regular clay mask. I leave that on my face for about 3-5 minutes and then gently wash it off with a face loofa. I've been using it on a nightly basis for the past week, and every morning I wake up and my face is brighter, my pores are so much less visible, and my acne comes and goes away by the next day instead of hanging around. I have crazy sensitive skin too and it's not overs dying or making my skin feel raw after the fact. I'm pretty sure I'm stocking up on this stuff before I can't find it anymore!

I've been using the unicorn peeling mask (the chrome mask) and love it. I got this bubbling mask as a Xmas present. It's all right, but it did feel like it was slightly burning and tingly when the bubbles started to foam up. My skin type isn't particularly sensitive, yet this mask seemed to be slightly painful when foaming. It was also difficult to wash off, the clay was very slimy and clung to my skin. My skin did seem very clean after, but my unicorn mask does the same thing with no weird pain sensation.

Very pleased with this product. It arrived in excellent condition, no damage to the package and the product was well sealed. Box it comes in has a scratch off foil to indicate authentication code as well. The product is kept fresh by a plastic seal once you unscrew the lid, and has a small spatula to scoup product out with that locks onto the lid when your done with it. I recommend taking enough out to cover your face at once as the product starts to foam/bubble immediately on contact when spread on the face. Use on totally dry skin, and let sit for 5 minutes (or more, if you really want to) then wet your hands and scrub the foam into your skin for around 2 minutes before washing off. I like to use it 2-3 times a week at night. If you have sensitive skin like I do I wouldn't recommend using it more than 3 times in one week tops. I would absolutely reorder this product when I run out.

reviews.review_header: A lot of fun, but I don't feel like it does much ...
reviews.review_text: A lot of fun, but I don't feel like it does much else. I received this mask as a gift as I absolutely love trying new face masks. The bubbling effect of this mask is definitely a lot of fun. I don't feel that it cleaned out my pores much or helped with my blackheads, but it did cut down the oil on my face and left it feeling refreshed. The mask is a little difficult to rinse off and you definitely have to watch and make sure you get everything rinsed down the drain. If you have little spots left in your sink that dry, they will take a little scrubbing to get off. Overall I really enjoy this mask and it does leave my face feeling refreshed, but if you have blackhead issues this wouldn't be the mask I would recommend.

reviews.review_header: I love the cooling sensation at first and the bubbling as ...
reviews.review_text: i wasnt expecting much from this product and was more interested in it bubbling. After trying this product for the very first couple of times, I love the cooling sensation at first and the bubbling as well. After I washed off my face, it was super soft and smooth and had a nice glow. I also loved how there was an applicator tool with this as well. Made it so much easier to spread. The things I didn't like was that it felt like there were a million needles poking my skin. Overtime of using this product for about a month, my skin was being inflamed and kept getting red. Overall, I probably wouldn't buy this product again. It was fun but overtime, my skin just didn't like it anymore.

reviews.review_header: Contains Paraban, SLS, and other chemicals that are really bad for your skin
reviews.review_text: Contains Paraban, SLS, and other chemicals that are really bad for your skin. I wish I had researched a bit more before buying this product, but after applying this to my face, I find it smells really perfume-y. So, that got me researched for the ingredients. All the ingredients and instruction listed in this box are Korean. But, if you go to memebox.com(where they also sell this product), you can find all the ingredients listed in English. [...] Please save your money and don't buy this if you want all natural ingredients.

reviews.review_header: You get a carbonated clay mask, you get a carbonated clay mask, evryone gets a carbonated clay mask!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.review_text: This was my first experience with carbonated face mask and so far I am very pleased. I use this mask once a week as part of my pampering routine to clean out the oil and dirt in my pores. It works really well. I only apply it on my nose, chin and between my eyebrows since thats the black head and oily prone areas. I find that its best to apply this mask before a shower because it does leave behind soapy residue that can be hard to wash off. So i apply it before my shower and wash it off in the shower using the residue on the rest of my face. The first time i used it, it burned my face slightly (on a scale of 1-5, a 2) but after that it was fine. I'm really in love with this clay mask~

My father had a bad case of cystic acne on his nose. Like those pimple popping videos. There is no dermatologist where I live: which is on a remote island in Alaska. I used this product on him. After 3 application his nose is clearing up. His nose was so large it appeared go have no real shape. One side of his nose was BLACK. Day 4 his nose is "deflating" and the blackness is now pink w light undertone of black. I wish I had taken pictures. (Incidentally I use this product on myself 3-4 times a week). I bought this product on the memebox.com. I believe in this product so much I felt I needed to write a review on Amazon as well.

I love this. I was so hesitant to buy it because Ive heard its super messy.. but it wasnt. It was VERY bubbley and super FUN. It just kept getting bigger. I cant comment on if it "helped" my skin, but my skin did feel soft and clean after using it. I loved it it was worth the price just for how silly it is. And I didn't have trouble washing it off at all. Just, when putting it on, be fast, and close the container because it will bubble up rather quickly. And look up the directions online, the directions on the pkg arent in english.

reviews.review_header: The packaging is adorable, and it smells great
reviews.review_text: This produce was exactly what I was expecting! The packaging is adorable, and it smells great! It starts to bubble as soon as it touches your skin. Definitely recommend using the little scooper that comes in the lid. If you dip your fingers into the jar, the clay in the jar will start to foam up a little from contact to the oils on your hands. I scooped some into my palm and then applied from there. I'm sure some fancy people might use some sort of tiny bowl to transfer the product for use, but cupping it in my hand worked just fine! It made my skin feel clean and tingly, but not dry and crispy. This little jar won't sit in my cabinet and never be used like most other masks I buy!

This product is so amazing. My grandma bought it for me last year for Christmas and I still have about one mask left! I use it all the time if I have hormonal breakouts or just some imperfections I want to get rid of. I have dry skin and it usually doesn't ever breakout and this product doesn't dry out my skin. I wouldn't recommend using it everyday because that will dry it out but once a week will keep your skin looking bright. This is my favorite face mask because it's fun and it does the job and isn't over priced. It's fun to do with your friends or just by yourself to relax. Also, when you smooth the bubbles out after it foams it leaves this cooling sensation that feels great on your skin! 10/10 would reccomend and going to buy this product again soon!

This is so weird but awesome! I got this as a gift and saw clay mask and that's it. When I used it I was a little taken aback! Hello bubbles! I have combination skin. Oily on my forehead, eyelids and my upper nose - mainly due to wearing glasses and the rest normal. I waited about 10-15 minutes to take off. My skin feels fresh and rejuvenated! And the scent is divine! The scent is White Tea. I will definitely be using this often! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_header: For oily, combination skin, or to spot treat. Yes it's fun
reviews.review_text: Bought it because I'm oily. The clay mask really feels like it gets in the pores and cleanes them out. Because it's a clay mask I would recommend you having a moistur product after because it's gonna feel a little drying. It was a lot of fun having it puff up and it seems to work really fast. I didn't feel like I needed a lot of product which was nice. It has a light fragrance but not over powering. I would recommend this for people with oily or combination skin. I'm not sure I would suggest this for people with dry skin unless your spot treating or if you just wanted to try it once and not for your regular beauty care. I do believe this is worth the price to buy if you plan to work it in your beauty routine but if not if you only plan to use it once.

I'm 30 and have very oily skin still. I don't break out a ton but my skin is dull and greasy which I hate. This mask literally made my skin super smooth without drying it out (which makes my face over produce oil) and as gross as it sounds, made all my little black heads pop to the surface. Way better for your skin than a biore strip and more efficient too. Make sure to avoid leaving the jar exposed to air for too long, it will activate the mask. I usually spoon a bunch on my face, close the lid and then go back and smooth the mask on. A little goes a long way, it at least expands to twice it's size so be careful around your eyes and lips (although it doesn't burn, it's just annoying foam stuck in your eyelashes).

reviews.review_header: Was so excited to try this but ended up less ...
reviews.review_text: Was so excited to try this but ended up less than enthused. Mostly it just continues to foam on your face until you wash it off- meaning if you rub it around after foaming it becomes creamy and then starts foaming all over again and this process can continue for as long as you want. my only issue is that it's TOUGH to get off!! I typically use when taking a bath since I need to literally submerge my face and scrub hard to remove it- and even then it gets all over my white towels and causes a mess. No noticeable difference in skin.

I randomly saw a video review on Facebook about this carbonated clay mask. So I decided to give it a try. Used my husband's amazon account (he's a prime member so I figured I use the free shipping. Lol) I got this today and decided to give it a try before going to bed. After a minute of application, it started bubbling (although I didn't got as much bubbles as others shown on their pics) and waited for few more minutes and gently rubbed my face. After that, I left it for a good 2 minutes and washed my face with warm water. After drying, I saw the great results IMMEDIATELY!!! I am so amazed how well this product is that I can't help but keep caressing my cheeks. Lol. I usually just leave my face with make up on due to laziness before going to bed but now that I have this, it will definitely be a part my night time regimen. You won't regret purchasing this product!

Received it as a thoughtful Christmas gift from my bestie. She uses it and says it's amazing! I have used plenty of store-bought masks in the past, so I used this without hesitation. Only once, that is! I put it on my face and within 2 minutes MY FACE WAS BURNING. I panicked and ran to the sink to remove it but it's HARD TO WASH OFF! The foam on top is easy to remove, but the gray paste stuck to your skin needs scrubbing to remove. Washed off what I could and then jumped in the shower. I like my showers comfortably warm (not scalding) and the warm water made my face feel like it was burning, even after the mask rinsed off. Returned to the mirror and my skin was red and blotchy and a little itchy. It took 2 days for my skin to look normal again. I obviously have a sensitivity to something in this product. The experience was pretty scary. I will never use another commercially prepared face mask again. I will only use natural, home-made masks from now on, made from things found in the garden and kitchen. I can't gamble with the health of my skin.

reviews.review_header: Works really well on the first use
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product and it shipped to me super fast. It really worked the first time I used it and it made my skin so silky soft. Since opening and using it the first time, it no longer works now. I guess once the product was opened and hit air, it deactivated the oxygenated ingredients. It foamed up in the container itself once opened. A skincare product such as this needs to be in a pump like the others I've used. I was really looking forward to using this product weekly too.

Not only is this mask fun, it absolutely leaves my skin feeling incredibly clean without feeling over dry. I have a gross, stressful, and physical job that has wrecked my skin over the past 4 years and I've been working to improve it. This mask, in combination with the Elizavecca Glutinous Snail Cream moisturizer, has made a very drastic difference in how my skin looks and feels. My acne is clearing up, the dried patches around the corners of my mouth and nose are clearing up, my skin has had a generally healthier glow, and it just leaves me with a general improvement of self confidence from putting effort in. I have oily skin and my boyfriend (who's also trying the mask with me tonight) has sensitive skin, and its been a very good experience for both of us.I would definitely recommend this mask, 10/10, any day of the week, for yourself or as a gift.

Maybe my girlfriend and I are just weird but this mask just makes use very anxious. The sensation of the bubbling on our faces triggered our anxiety and makes us freak out. First time she tried it the mask she started to cry and had to remove it immediately. I’m a guy an I get the same way from the sensation from this mask when I put it on, very strange.

Bought this product for me and my daughter to try. We definitely had fun applying the product and waiting for it ti bubble up. My face did feel cleaner after using the product but I honestly did not see a big difference like people in some of the videos I watched claimed they say. But don't be discouraged by my review. Different effects for different textures. I have only tried it twice and based off of that it's not something I would buy again. Unless you use the internet this product does not come with any instructions in English on how to properly apply and take it off so that you get the full experience that you should. First time I applied it i didn't know i was supposed to rub it in after it bubbled.

I opened a container and it started slowly bubble. It is gray and very thick but flexes. I started to apply it and it was bubbling quite fast. Because of this effect, I think I applied too much. It was bubbling fast and expanding. I started to clean it up. but the mask layer under the bubbles was too thick. It took me a while to wash it off in a washstand. Thus, it is better to apply in thin layers in the opposite of other clay masks and wash it off in the shower. After, my skin was quite soft and cleaner. I have a combinational skin type and am 25 years old.

reviews.review_header: Kind of itchy, but works well
reviews.review_text: I've only used this mask once, but my impression was that it's effective but just slightly uncomfortable. I don't have particularly sensitive skin (I'm white but don't tend to have strong reactions to most products), but this mask was pretty itchy. Not painfully so, and I had no redness after removing it, but definitely the kind that makes you have to stop yourself from scratching your face. The other issue I had was with removing the mask itself. Maybe I'm missing something, but it was SO hard to get this mask off. Maybe I'm not used to clay masks, but I felt like I really had to keep scraping it off my face. Still going to keep using it because my face felt great afterward, and I'm going to experiment with using less or more of the mask at one time.

I have never had a product that worked so well on blackheads. I am addicted to this stuff. I have tried everything and have spent more money than I care to admit. But after only one use of this mask it really made a huge difference. This is worth a try. I was hesitant because I have very sensitive skin but I have had no breakouts. I am also very oily in my Tzone and I was able to go a full day without using blotting paper after I used this mask. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_header: Fun, but leaves a small residue on face.
reviews.review_text: There was a huge buzz around this product on youtube. In every video they would apply a thick layer, it would bubble up, and they would wash it off. When I apply a layer thick enough to feel fully covered, the mask bubbles like it should but is really hard to get all off. My face feels clean, but not deep clean after use. It feels like there is a slight film on my face like when you use a cheap brand of body soap on your body. But, the bubbles are fun. I will not re purchase this item, or fully use the container.

I'll start off by saying that this mask is super fun! You don't need to use a lot to see lots of bubbles. But beware, it tickles a LOT. Especially if you get it close to your nose. Although I'll be honest, I didn't see really any results after using the mask. I am a combination skin type and It left my face feeling a little dry and flaky after I rinsed it off. So for me, this was more of a novelty and not something I plan on purchasing again.

It's fun the first time and to share with friends, but too irritating and complicated to use regularly. - You have to keep putting the clear plastic lid back on in between applications to make sure the rest doesn't foam - It tickled so much it made me cry - I have dry skin and it definitely dried me out a bit - Gets messy - Meh I'll finish it off just because I have it, but I won't be buying again.

Its a fun cleansing mask to try, but I would not buy it again because it is annoying to take off. It definitely is fun to try on and understand the hype that was going on for the IG pictures. But really it is not that different than any other mask. The mask is reasonably priced, but it is hard to store since it will carbonate just in the shelf. Sooooo... I would buy it at least once just for fun if you want it for the IG lol

reviews.review_header: ... we tried it it does go on very much like a paste and it does carbonate and bubble and ...
reviews.review_text: My daughter wanted to try this so we went ahead and purchased it once we got it in we tried it it does go on very much like a paste and it does carbonate and bubble and Fizz on your face we followed the directions and afterwards I could tell a big difference and how smooth my face was and how much smaller her teenage pores were it has helped with fighting her acne

reviews.review_header: I really like this! It didnt get rid of the stuff ...
reviews.review_text: I really like this! It didnt get rid of the stuff in my pores but it was super gentle and my skin felt so clean afterwards. I feel like I'm not damaging my skin when I use it two days in a row even because it's so gentle. My skin doesn't feel stripped of its natural moisture, but it feels refreshed and it smells so good! This stuff is fun and cute and it's worth a try. Definitely. I like how a little goes a super long way. It bubbles almost on immediate contact with skin and it doesn't tingle or itch. I have sensitive skin and this works!

Yes this mask is a little fun because of the foaming, but take out the novelty and you're left with a mediocre mask. It does make my face feel smooth but the bubbles form so fast it's hard to fully cover the face. Plus it's a pain to wash off, it sticks to the skin and takes a lot of effort to rinse off. After all that work it's not worth it. I've used far better clay masks and will not be purchasing this again.

reviews.review_header: It's fun but not very practical.
reviews.review_text: This is fun. I'm not certain that it did anything for my skin. However, if you are having a spa day with friends, then this is perfect. It's so unique and weird that it is sure to be a party favorite. I won't use it in my typical skincare as the tingling sometimes borders on intolerable and I can't wait the time limit to wash it off.

This stuff goes on as a thick dark goo, and by the time I finish applying the last bit to my face, it's starting to bubble. The bubbles create a nice tingle and my face feels fresh and smooth after I rinse. It's easiest to use before the shower, because it can be a little tricky to get it all rinsed off. However, I prefer to use it a few nights a week right before bed. I feel like it really helps to cleanse the day away and keep my skin nice. Give it a try!

reviews.review_header: I love it! It makes my skin very soft and ...
reviews.review_text: I love it! It makes my skin very soft and smooth. After massaging my face with a Luke warm water, it definitely made skin a bit tighter and softer. So, for the next person who purchases this, don't forget to massage your face with a warm water after you see the bubbles (instructions only comes in Korean) and wash it off. Will purchase this again.

reviews.review_header: The mask consistency is thick and like gelatin. It comes with a tiny spatula which ...
reviews.review_text: The mask consistency is thick and like gelatin. It comes with a tiny spatula which is useful in spreading the product. You must be quick to spread the gel like substance and try not to put too much since the product will bubble and you'll end up unable to see. When the product bubbles, it starts to itch and sometimes tickle the face at the same time. After a few minutes, you pat around the product and turn it into a clay mask which you leave one for 10 minutes or so. Afterwards remove the mask and enjoy a cleaner and brighter looking face.

This mask was SO MUCH FUN to use with my girlfriends over! We had fun taking pictures with our faces puffed up with bubbles. We all said our skin felt really good after using! It's really tingly and tickles your face which we all laughed about while using it. I really recommend this mask for a fun girl's night. It comes with a small spoon for scooping it inside, but I also purchased a mask brush which I recommend to do as it's much easier to apply with a brush.

I love this product. I really does foam up I use it every couple of days. It makes my skin smooth and gives me a healthy glow, although it can leave you a bit dry. (I have oily skin so the dryness doesn't bother me all that much). I usually apply mine and leave it on for 5 minutes sometimes longer and then go and lather it up and give my face a good scrubbing with a facial brush before I rinse completely. Its also really fun to use cause you can feel the tingling and watch the foam grow. It does foam up fast once you begin applying so work quickly to do so.

4 out of 5! Tip- spread it on as thin as possible. The thicker you spread it the less it bubbles. Plus if you don't put it on thin you WILL burn your skin. Over all though it was fun, and seemed to tighten my pores and improve my complexion. Only complaint is there is no English directions. Which is ridiculously ridiculous when it can burn your face if you use it wrong. I knocked a star off for that

reviews.review_header: I wanted to LOVE this product
reviews.review_text: I wanted to LOVE this product. I dont consider myself having dry, sensitve skin. I tried it first to make sure I wasn't allergic, and I had no adverse reactions to it. When I first applied it on my face, I noticed it immediately started to tingle. I thought this was part of the process and it started to bubble like I expected. After about 2 minutes on my face, the tingling started to feel more like a burning sensation, so I went to wash it off & I could already see my face was red. Once I finally got it off (i had to use a wash cloth to get it off faster) I had all these little red bumps all over my face. I had to immediately put aquaphor over my face to stop the burning. No telling what my face will look like tomorrow. I will not be using this again. 2 stars for the prompt shipping, and no issues with the product looking like it was opened or anything.

I was going to buy this on amazon, but found it on Wish for 5 dollars, so I bought it from there! The first time using it, I put on a very thin layer and within a few minutes it was bubbling. It's such a weird and different feeling. It almost feels like I'm sweating with bugs crawling on my face. But besides the weird feels this is AMAZING!! I've only used it the one time so I will update at a later date if it changes my skin at all :)

reviews.review_header: Love this stuff! Even with sensitive skin and eczema!
reviews.review_text: This mask is not only fun, but it works really well! I not only have sensitive skin, but I am also extremely eczema prone, so I was a little concerned that it might not work, but it works wonderfully! The only thing (and if you watch Tati's video, she mentions this) is that the first time I did it, I put it on under my nose. Don't do that! It foams up and you end up breathing the bubbles in! Other than that, it's great! It also removes leftover makeup, so I would especially use it after performance weeks! I'm making this a part of my weekend routine because I love it so much! I will definitely recommend this to anyone and I will buy this again in the future!

reviews.review_header: Used to work, but now it burns
reviews.review_text: I originally really enjoyed this mask, and it made my skin feel silky smooth. However, it's a year away from expiring, and it burns my skin. I'm not sure what happened, but I'm pretty sure that I had an authentic product (I purchased it through Memebox 2 years ago).

I absolutely love this product! I got it as a gift and am not disappointed at all! It goes on smooth and almost instantly starts to foam, it itches ever so slightly in a few spots, but i have a feeling that's because its really getting in there for a deep clean. Its so fun to transform into THE SWAMP QUEEN! Upon wiping it off I notice my rosacea is calmed down, my skin is sooo smooth and has a lovely glow. My skin looks so refreshed after i use this. I will for sure be buying a refill once i run out. Another Pro-You don't have to use a whole bunch so this will last quite some time. Two thumbs up!

This is by far one of the best masks I've ever used! It took me a couple of uses to figure out what works. I wash my face first with my usual cleanser. I use the small plastic spatula included to spread a thin layer across my dry skin. Then wait for it to bubble up. And when I say bubble it really bubbles! It tingles quite a bit but resist touching it. When the bubbles die down (about 5-7 mins.) Rinse off. My skin feels so clean and soft afterwards. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_header: Skintertainment that Doubles as a Great Cleanser
reviews.review_text: The Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask is great skintertainment, but also works as a great cleanser. I generally only use it though right before I take a shower, because washing it off can get messy. I really like the smell and the bubbles help your face feel clean. Milky Piggy packs a punch with charcoal powder and the price is great.

reviews.review_header: Such a fun product and it left my skin feeling fantastic
reviews.review_text: Such a fun product and it left my skin feeling fantastic! I would recommend using a good moisturizer after. A little goes a long way with this product too. You only need to put a tiny bit on and it will foam up to 4x that amount! It is a little hard to wash off afterwards but it's worth it for the results! Also note if you have really sensitive skin this product may be a little to harsh for your skin type.

Its fun, only a little messy. It begins to bubble VERY quickly as soon as you put it on your skin. It's best as a thin layer on your face. This mask did not really do MUCH to my skin but made it feel matte-soft for about 2 hours, so i don't really believe this is anything but a fun 20 minutes!

I have only used this product on a small area of my face and it did not cause any breakouts or redness there and it bubbled up quite well without any irritation. As soon as I do a complete mask I might update this review again, however, for the time being I love it.

I bought this a year ago and mine is still good. Just make sure you cover it every time you're done with it and don't keep it exposed to air for too long, bubbles can and will grow inside the tub. I love the way it bubbles on my face, it leaves my skin feeling nice and soft and fresh. Cute neat product to try out. A lot of girls have raved about this. Mine was authentic.

reviews.review_header: Exactly what I expected it to be
reviews.review_text: This face pack comes in a cute lil tub with a little plastic spatula attached. I put it on my face and it starts foaming almost immediately until I can no longer recognise myself and have morphed into a scary/cute cloud. I like to call it my cloud face. When I wash it off, my skin feels squeaky clean- it gets all the oil off-ALL of it- so you definitely need to follow it up with a moisturiser. One must be careful not to directly touch the contents of the tub, as that could set it off and it could start foaming in there. However, if u scoop it out carefully with the clean dry spatula provided, all will be fine. I would definitely repurchase.

This was sent to me. Nothing asking for a review, so I don't know if it was a mistake or what. But I tried it and absolutely love it! When I run out I will definitely buy more. I actually make my own natural products, so I am looking for a way to make this with no chemicals. But, until I do, I will continue to use this! Love it!

Really cool product!! It has this bubbly, foamy feeling as you apply it (watch your nose holes haha) made my. Skin feel so nice afterwards and even though I have sensitive skin, it did not cause me any breakouts or reaction. My daughter and I absolutely LOVE it! Will be buying again!!

reviews.review_header: It's SUPER itchy I couldn't use it more than once
reviews.review_text: It's SUPER itchy I couldn't use it more than once. soooooooooo itchy I swear )^: just the thought of it makes me want to scratch my face. It's not "tickles it's straight up itchiness. And also you have to make a lot of space for the eye area because it expands a lot and will get on your eyelashes
