reviews.review_header: Quick face mask with great results
reviews.review_text: I really like this mask because I think it's one of the few masks that doesn't take a long time (this mask only needs to be on around 5 minutes). When you put it on, it kinda feels ticklish/itchy for a while, but I think that's because the clay is foaming up. I do sense a difference after using it. However, my face gets a little dry after using this, so I have to put on moisturizer (which is good in general). TIP: Don't put it on your entire face because when it foams it tends to spread everywhere, so you don't want to put too much or it might get into your eyes or mouth.

mine was defective. It looked like gray slime, but I didn't know what to expect, so I tried it. I used a lot just like recommended, but it didn't foam up at all. It made my skin feel soft, I don't have oily skin, so that might have been an issue, I was looking to get it for the detoxing and cleansing that it claimed to do. Amazon gave me a full refund so can't complain. I would try it and if you hate it return it.

reviews.review_header: ... tried this product once and i must say i love it! I have sensitive acne prone skin so ...
reviews.review_text: I just tried this product once and i must say i love it! I have sensitive acne prone skin so some products really irritate my skin but not this one! It foams up really fast and then makes a nice cleanser when you add some water and rub it on your face. My face felt so soft after using this product and it really did clean up some of my pores. I stilll have blackheads but for using it only once so far i am impressed!

reviews.review_header: Not in a bad way. But it felt like Hydrogen peroxide minus ...
reviews.review_text: My skin was noticeably clearer after using it. Some of the blackhead on my nose didn't come off but the ones I get on my cheeks did. It was strange as it was working though. Not in a bad way. But it felt like Hydrogen peroxide minus the pain. Bubbling and tickling your face. I went to bed after washing it off and when I woke up my face felt a bit greasy. But I feel that had more to do with my skin reacting to mask slightly drying it out.

Very interesting product! Comes in a small tub with spatula for easy application. Works quickly and feels so tingly! It has a pleasant clean fragrance and bubbling effect on the skin. Washes off pretty well and leaves soon feeling soft and clean. No huge difference in appearance in skin but mostly nice treatment that can be done in convenience of your own home.

So I received this mask about a month ago, I used it once!! I went to use it tonight, and there was mold growing inside the jar! I washed my face thoroughly before I used it.... don't wast your money! I had to throw mine in the garbage!!

reviews.review_header: Too Messy; Hard To Rinse Off; Somewhat Satisfied
reviews.review_text: The mask is interesting. Once the bubbles start to rise it makes me look like Squidward from that one episode of Spongebob. My only problem is how messy it is to put the mask on and how much of a hassle it is to take off. You have to wash your face repeatedly like around 5-10 times in order to get this face mask off! Wouldn't purchase again. Totally not a face mask to buy if you're a lazy person like me, this face mask isn't simple.

reviews.review_header: Fun Face Mask for Girls Nights! Leaves Your Skin Feeling Soft and Clean
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! I was introduced to it by a friend on one of our "girls nights" and we all tried it. It was a lot of fun and we made all kinds of funny shapes on our faces. It made my skin feel so soft and clean and It didn't make me break out despite having adult acne. I ended up coming on here and ordering some myself. It bubbles right up about 1/4 an inch off your face so make sure to keep it away from your eyes. It has a slight medicine smell but isn't unpleasant. I also love that it comes with a little applicator that can be stored inside the lid.

Love this mask because of the tingling sensation which you don't get with other masks. The mask left my skin feeling clean and soft. I feel like it helped get rid of some blackheads too. I will purchase more in the future.

So this mask is on my face right now and I will say this is the craziest mask I've ever used! I can feel it bubbling and getting bigger on my face. At first it burned a little around my nose but after a few minutes it was okay. I'm leaving it on for 10 minutes instead of 5 since I have really oily skin! Hopefully this mask is a winner since I'm big on using them!

reviews.review_header: In love! Work like a charm
reviews.review_text: In love! Work like a charm, kind of hard to put on alone and I'm not sure what this product actually does because everything is in Korean even the instructions. But if you go to the website there is more info. I know after the 1st use my skin felt amazing and you don't need a lot if any moisturizer after, it leaves a silky feeling after and its not drying your skin out!

reviews.review_header: and use a simple clay mask like Queen Helene twice per week
reviews.review_text: Cleans off make-up but that is all. Not nourishing, doesn't take out blackheads. My recommendation, get a peel or facial for troublesome skin and then exfoliate, moisturize, and use a simple clay mask like Queen Helene twice per week.

I have large pores,so I use anything I can get my hands on to smooth my skin out. I've only used it once, but my skin felt smooth and tight (in a good way) afterwards and looked fantastic. I'll order it again. Oh, and I have really sensitive skin and this didn't bother it at all.

reviews.review_header: My favorite mask I've ever used
reviews.review_text: My favorite mask I've ever used. The bubbles fizzing makes it a bit ticklish but it really is effective. Make sure after the bubbles are all foamed up, you rub it in and enjoy your actual clay mask for a good 10-15 minutes. It can be difficult to wash off but I feel like I am just washing away blackheads and excess sebum every time. My favorite mask to use any time-- but I especially love using it before an event. It gives me that extra glow and makes me feel so nice!

reviews.review_header: Good, but leaves a film on face
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift, and it's so much fun to use. As the mask foams up, your face looks like it's growing. The foam creates a tickling sensation on the face, but isn't unpleasant. I left off a 5th star for one reason. As others have mentioned, I notice that the mask leaves a film behind on my face after washing it off. My face will feel tacky to the touch. I have to go back in with a face wash to remove the film. Even when followed by a thorough cleaning with a quality facial wash, the film doesn't always feel like it's gone. I'll continue to use the product until I finish it, but I wish it didn't require an extra step.

For the price this is I expected a good size amount, and it wasn't that big. I used a regular nail polish bottle next to it for comparison. Also as small as the container is, that's not even the amount of product you get ! The first picture I included because you can see that there's like half an inch of just the container and no product? For the price there should be a decent amount you'd think!

reviews.review_header: Ok for fun, but no noticeable skin improvement
reviews.review_text: It’s fun to use, because it definitely does bubble up very satisfyingly, and it didn’t cause me to break out, but neither did it really do anything for my skin. Usually after a good mask, my skin feels very soft and rejuvenated, but with this mask it just feels normal. I’d only use this if I was having a sleepover party with friends and the goal was just to have fun and look silly - if the goal is to actually improve my skin, I’d use something else.

I just tried it with my roomie and we both loved it! It felt a lil funny at first but my skin feels and looks pretty amazing! Glad I tried it, def recommend it! My roomie has super sensitive skin too and it didn't bother her at all to use the mask either so it's a pretty awesome product!

reviews.review_header: Plus it's weird and fun and makes you kinda look like JoJo the Dog ...
reviews.review_text: I totally bought this for the novelty factor, but damn it all if it doesn't WORK. I noticed a difference in my skin after the first time I used it. Plus it's weird and fun and makes you kinda look like JoJo the Dog Faced Boy while it's working - all of which is just a giant bonus. Completely worth it!!

So I haven't exactly used mine yet because I'm scared. In all the photos I've seen and videos I've watched, the mask is a thick, gray consistency and is said to have little smell. Yet when I opened mine it was a slimy green mixture and it smelt like girly shampoo. Not sure why mine is different or if I should even attempt to try it out.

reviews.review_header: ... I used it the first time and fell in love with the bubbling and popping sensation on my face ...
reviews.review_text: Ok so I used it the first time and fell in love with the bubbling and popping sensation on my face and the smoothness of my skin after I washed it off. It seemed amazing at first. So good that I went ahead and ordered 3 more for my mom and I. I went to sleep soon after I finished the first time. Woke up with an oily face. Didn't think of it much as I do have an oily T zone. Then my mom came and told me that she had red rash marks near her nose and cheek area and that her face was super oily. She has normal skin so I was surprised to actually see it greasy. By then I had already ordered them so I gave them away as gifts with some bathroom sets and threw mine away. The next morning I also developed those painful under the skin pimples and my cheeks felt like were burning up. Kept on washing my face with chamomile tea.

reviews.review_header: Fun to use but did make my skin feel a ...
reviews.review_text: 2 stars because it came with the product having seeped out of the container and was all over it. So before I could even use it I had to wash the entire container and scrub the hardened mask product off of it. Fun to use but did make my skin feel a little dry afterwards. Not something I would do on a regular basis.

reviews.review_header: Holy Smokes! Blackheads GONE. I believe
reviews.review_text: So in all honesty, I was very skeptical. Have done bentonite masks for two decades and have never experienced anything like this. did the mask, per directions, scrubbing again midway through. When I went to wash it off, I literally saw black dots all over that WERE my blackheads. GONE. Last facial two years ago, so there was lots to remove. What used to take an estetician digging painfully for half hour for lesser results, took less than 10, with incredible results . Face is tingling. And clean. Wow.

I ordered this off of the actual website rather than Amazon although I definitely recommend buying it through Amazon it's way cheaper. I ordered this mask after watching a video on Facebook and reading multiple reviews. I don't usually get breakouts I was looking for a product that will help get rid of the blackheads along my nose and hoped this would finally be the product to do that. Unfortunately it just didn't work for me. I've been using it for about a month now (every few days) and it does leave my skin feeling very soft but it hasn't done much to improve my skin. It is kind of hard to put on as well because it literally starts bubbling as soon as it touches your skin and then rinsing it off is even worse. Usually I would just take a shower and wash it off in there which made it a little easier. Overall I did like this product but I probably won't buy it again I feel it was the same as a normal face wash.

reviews.review_header: After 2 minutes my skin was on fire! Quickly ...
reviews.review_text: After 2 minutes my skin was on fire! Quickly washed it off and my skin was red for awhile, but it’s softer today and some acne cleared up.

I got this as a birthday gift and it works AMAZING. my skin has never been so clear! i struggle with blackheads but after using this for only a week, there all almost gone! my skin is soft and feels so clean! the only thing i don’t like is when it bubbles up it makes some spots on my face itch lol, but that’s just me. 10/10 would buy again

reviews.review_header: This product does a pretty good job of getting the dirt out of your ...
reviews.review_text: This product does a pretty good job of getting the dirt out of your pores. The mask tickles while you have it on but your skin feels great after you wash it off. I would recommend this product if you are looking for something a little different than the regular, boring face mask.
Super fun to use. The bubbles give your face a feeling of cleaning. My face is so soft after using. The product is hard to get off which is why I only gave it four stars.
I ordered this from a different website but the same product. While it feels really cool from all the tingly bubbles I didn't see a difference in my skin. It didn't feel softer or look brighter.

This mask is amazing! I know I'm repeating what other users have said but it's the truth. It takes very little of this product each use, you want the thinnest layer possible or it will poof up into your nose, eyelashes and everywhere! Even using the thinnest layer imaginable it still poofs quite a lot and is tons of fun, as well as effective. My skin loves this mask, and I will be ordering again when I run out and as gifts. This would make a GREAT starter mask for kiddos. It bubbles, causing tickling, but also a soothing sensation. It would be the talk of any little girl slumber party. More than that it really works. Clears out stubborn gunk, and preps the skin for the rest of your routine. I can use this when my skin is dry or oily to balance.

This product doesn't quit! It keeps bubbling even after rubbing it out 3 times. I've only used it twice so far but I've noticed my skin getting clearer. There's a lot of product despite the size of the container. The only down side is that it's a bit tough to wash off, so make sure you use a sponge or wash it off in the shower

reviews.review_header: This is a very fun face mask
reviews.review_text: This is a very fun face mask! It foams up a bunch but I can also feel it working and leaves my skin tingling and glowing.

reviews.review_header: Your face hasn't felt nothing yet!
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!!! It made my face tickle with delight. I can't wait to use it again in a couple days. Hands down the best ever. Did have to look on amazon to find out how to use that would be my only negative comment.

I saw the video for the carbonating bubble mask and had to buy it. I love the feeling and noticed my skin appeared tighter. My niece spent the night and wanted to do a face mask, since this was the only mask I had on hand we ended up applying the mask and also got my 8 year old son to do it too! It was fun watching their reactions to the bubbles and clay. It was also pretty funny watching them attempt to wash it off, it is somewhat hard to wash off. Thanks!

This mask was great. There’s a little spatula that is included to apply the mask. It starts to foam almost as soon as you apply it to your face. Very bubbly and can be tickle near your nose but it’s so fun, I look forward to using this mask. Leaves your skin feeling soft, and amazing! Love it.

reviews.review_header: like I'm talking 3-4 times a week for the past ...
reviews.review_text: NOPE NOPE NOPE! My skin isn't sensitive to products generally speaking and I have a really clear complextion but this product made my skin FREAK OUT!!! Originally I thought maybe the product was pulling impurities out but my god, I have monster volcano breakouts in the weirdest places, places that never broke out even when I was a teenager. I use clay and charcoal masks on a regular basis, like I'm talking 3-4 times a week for the past 5-6 years; so I know that isn't the cause of my freak breakouts. I will not be using this any longer which sucks because it is a fun mask to play with. Womp womp :(

I use tons of face masks, from drug store brand to glam glow and I have to say this is one of my favorites. It takes a little while to get used to the tickling feeling! Fun to use with friends and great as a gift. It makes my skin feel tight and new with a noticeable tightening of pores after a couple uses. My skin as a brightened glow to it that people have commented on as well. Definitely recommend. Easy on sensitive skin, use it before washing your face. Can sting a little bit if applied to a feshy washed face. Otherwise no pain :)
I like the novelty of the product. It IS fun to use. And it smells nice! I began breaking out as soon as I started using it though :(

It's an amazing pack. Clay bubble pack is great. Apply to your skin and bubble a little after a while. I rub it around my nose with my hand. Blackhead, keratin is removed. After rinsing, the skin is smooth. It is recommended to use it strongly.

reviews.review_header: This mask feels amazing as it bubbles up
reviews.review_text: This mask feels amazing as it bubbles up. My face feels clean but not right after washing it off, and I'm able to get blackheads that otherwise refused to budge. As others mentioned, it's easiest to wash off in the shower, since it's think and takes a while to wash away.

reviews.review_header: I use it several times a week and my skin always looks and feels great! I do have a problem with the bubbles ...
reviews.review_text: This is the ultimate pore clearing mask! I use it several times a week and my skin always looks and feels great! I do have a problem with the bubbles getting in my nose and it's super messy when I'm cleaning it off but it is so worth it!

Let me tell ya, as a red head with crazy sensitive skin I was a lil leery at first...but OMGOODNESS!!! This is an AWESOME product!! I am a Chef and standing in a kitchen all day reeks havoc on my skin...between the steam and the oil, my face is a mess...it left my skin feeling super clean, soft, and dewey looking. I didnt break out or have any issues with sensitivity...I'm HOOKED...I got the Sea Salt Cream as well and it is fabulous too!!! Go Milky Piggy!!!

reviews.review_header: Give it a shot, well worth it...
reviews.review_text: Super fun, did it's job well. Face still stings though after a few hours. Pores are almost non visable. Sensitive skin beware...I have it and it did cause some redness and burning.

To be honest I bought this mask because of the bubbles. I used it once and didn't feel or see any difference so I thought it was another dud. That is until l used a nose strip 3 days after using the mask once. It was full! I always used nose strips and they took out some blackheads but nothing compared to what I took out after I used the mask. I was disgusted and impressed. It even got some where I didn't even think I had them. So it did work for me when I used it in conjunction with a nose strip a couple of days afterwards.

I enjoy this product for the pure look and feel of it, but other than that I do not see a difference when it is used. I do like the feeling of the tingling and popping bubbles and taking snaps as the bubbles swell

Not only is this mask fun, I love how my face feels afterwords! During the bubbling process it tickles my face, but it also tingles a little bit. The smell isn't my favorite but it isn't awful either. Also, when washing the mask off, it helps to scrub your face like you would if you were using face wash, and even then it still takes a minute to get it all washed off. The instructions aren't in English but it isn't hard to look them up and the application is mainly just common sense. Enjoy!

I will be giving this as a gift so I can't review the actual product, but I can review the packaging and shipping speed. The mask comes in a good quality box with the product name and info on it. The shipping was fast and excellent with Prime! Would definitely buy again to try for myself!

reviews.review_header: I was excited and really wanted to like this 'fun' mask
reviews.review_text: I was excited and really wanted to like this 'fun' mask, but like other reviewers pointed out, a few minutes after application, this mask made my face itchy and burned. I've tried this mask twice (hoping the first time was a fluke!) but it really made me break out, both times (three weeks apart.) I usually don't have such bad reactions to skin care products, but this really did a number on my skin.

reviews.review_header: This mask is great. I used it as soon as it arrived ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is great. I used it as soon as it arrived and it left my face very smooth. I let it sit for about 5-7 minutes and then I massaged the bubbles into my face, and rinsed off with lukewarm water. Would definitely recommend this and will definitely buy again.

THIS STUFF IS AWESOME! And fun! You can't help but laugh because it puffs up and you look like a swollen person. Lol works great, feels great after you wash it off too. Leaves your skin refreshed and soft.
Product arrived defective because it leaked all over. I dont thonk the product is sanitary to ise and will be all dried out! Unusable.
Love this mask. It tickles a lot at first and I didn't know how long I would be able to keep it on. Works great though. Face looks and feels great after.

reviews.review_header: This is pretty neat and fun to use
reviews.review_text: This is pretty neat and fun to use! The only thing I struggle with is getting an itch from the bubbles popping and I don't want to scratch the itch because I don't want to mess up the mask lol.

reviews.review_header: This is a fun mask! i use it sparingly
reviews.review_text: This is a fun mask! i use it sparingly, when I feel as though my skin needs a pick-me-up! It does tickle though and is torture when you're waiting for the 5 minutes to be up.

I love this mask!!!! It is the perfect pick-me-up for days when I need some "me" time! The first time I used it I could not stop laughing! It makes my face so soft and smooth, and it provides entertainment!
My daughter ordered this and I reluctantly tried...I'm a believer though...it felt like silky bubbles and smelled like lightly scented upscale hotel soap...my face was SPOILED! GOOD STUFF!!!

eel tingly while it's bubbling up, but once washed off it leaves my skin looking clean and radiant. Did not irritate or cause any redness. I suggest applying before a shower. It's messy when removing. My skin type is sensitive/combination

Honestly, I feel like this product doesn't do a whole lot. It's fun to watch bubble up, and that's about it. The softness and smoothness is just excess product, what's being left behind. Doesn't help in the long run.

Made my face feel very clean. It took a few applications to get the hang of it, if you use too much it expands as the carbonation activates and swallows up your eyes. I didn't find this to magically improve my skin or become a "can't live without" product, but it's fun.

reviews.review_header: After using it a couple times I sh*t you not within 2 week I saw pretty good change in my face
reviews.review_text: I brought about 4 of things awhile back! I was really skeptical about this product because I saw it on facebook. After using it a couple times I sh*t you not within 2 week I saw pretty good change in my face. (That also includes seeing less acne)
I love this stuff! it feels so great when I rub it into my skin - and a little bit goes a LONG way! I am definitely going to be using more of the Milky Piggy products in the future!
This mask is really fun, although I don't see a large difference in my complexion.

reviews.review_header: Feel like a moldy fruit at firstbut then have smooth clean skin after.
reviews.review_text: While feeling like a moldy fruit is a new experience for me I was pleased with the results. My skin felt firm and very clean. I will say it is a mess to get off your face though.

reviews.review_header: Love this! Makes your face feel amazing!!⛤⛤⛤⛤⛤
reviews.review_text: I love this clay bubble mask! It makes your face feel so hydrated afterwards which is what I needed! Thank You! Will be buying more products from Elizavecca Milky piggy!⛤⛤⛤⛤⛤

I love this mask. It definitely was slightly itchy while it was on but it made my skin feel super clean afterwards. It was affordable too. I'm going to look at the brands other products now! Very pleased with the purchase!

I absolutely love this face mask! I use a lot of face masks. (Lush, Glamglo, homemade, etc.) and this one does a good job. I love how it bubbles and smells. But it leaves my skin feeling extremely soft and glowing. I was a little nervous when it came in because the box was in a different language but it's just basic instructions, I personally left mine on for 7 minutes. Just be careful and don't get it too close to your eyes because it does bubble over and it will get in your eyes.

reviews.review_header: I do not recommend for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as birthday gift and it made my entire face red and itchy for about a week. I do not recommend for sensitive skin.
Definitely itchy on your face, but to me that's a sign it's working. Leaves face smooth but not dry.

This is so fun and interesting! The mask smells pleasant and not too strongly. It feels really nice on the skin, it feels like it cleans deeply with all its little bubbles. The more you put on the more bubbles and exfoliation occur. I used it sparingly around my nostrils for fear of it tickling too bad. When the 5 minutes were up I sort of rubbed the product into my face and it continued to bubble even after that! I am very impressed with this mask. My skin fet noticeable smoother and tighter (in a good, firm way) when taken off!

reviews.review_header: Super fun mask leaves skin feeling amazing!
reviews.review_text: I finally got myself one of these and boy am I glad I did! It's so fun to watch the mask fizz up. It has a pleasant smell. A little bit thick to wash away so you'll spend time doing that. My skin felt a little bit right after but it feels so smooth and looks radiant. Please get yourself one, it's really awesome.

It's an amazing and fun mask that makes my face super smooth after even though I don't use that much (probably 1 scoop?) or wait that long before washing off. A lot of blackheads usually gather around the sides of my nose and this clears out a lot of them. It also doesn't irritate my acne and only has a light clay smell so it's not overwhelming.

reviews.review_header: This product brings world piece and makes you fall in love
reviews.review_text: All I can say is wow. It has been my ultimate life dream to become Squidward Tennisballz. The day this product arrived on my front door step is the day I finally lived my life. I am 4 weeks into my transition and I've never been happier. 5 tentacles from me!!

Oh my gosh, I love this!! I received it as a gift and honestly didn't have high expectations other than it being fun. Well, not only was it super fun but it ended up cleaning the heck out of my pores and left my skin soooo smooth!! It's a win win. I just love it.

reviews.review_header: a really great product! Just make sure to rub it in ...
reviews.review_text: This really works! I was pleasantly surprised by how it made my blackheads disappear. It did irritate the parts of my skin with no blackheads though, so I would suggest using it only on the necessary places. Still, overall, a really great product! Just make sure to rub it in after five minutes, or you won't really get the results.

I love this mask. It is a holygrail. I didn't take a before photo but I know how big and dirty my pores usually are, and let me tell you after this mask there is no black/dirt left in your pores at all! Definitely going to be sharing with all my family and buying again! Great job Milky piggy 🐷❤️
I bought this for a friend and she told me this product works great with her skin. Her skin started clearing up since she got this.

I've got really sensitive skin but this is the best dang product i have ever used! First it's mud then it's bubbles ( must apply fast because bubbles start working fast) then add Watter and it's like a cream! Leaves my face soft and glowing. Gets rid of black heads and is fun too!
Left skin feeling refreshed. But my word this stuff smelled like aftershave!! Yuk. Not enjoyable. Why anyone wants a fragrance in a skin care product is beyond me.
It's fun to do with a friend! Really does it's job, not harsh on sensitive skin. It does tickle A LOT once it starts expanding and bubbling up!

reviews.review_header: I love this! It makes my face so soft and ...
reviews.review_text: I love this! It makes my face so soft and has already helped with acne after a week of using it. Plus it's a lot of fun to use! I read a lot of reviews saying it's messy to take off. I haven't had a problem with it. After about ten minutes I wet my hands and rub in all of the foam and then just rinse it all off with some water. Definitely recommend.
Loved this mask. It was not harsh on my skin but got the job done! My nose is clear and I have to admit, it is wicked fun.

Perfect!! Applies smoothly and bubbles accordingly! Has a slight sunburned/burning sensation if kept on too long and when washing off. No instructions are included with product, but it’s pretty self explanatory. Would recommend!

reviews.review_header: This stuff works. Clears pores out. The tingling ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff works. Clears pores out . The tingling is uncomfortable for about 3 minutes but it does the job!!
I don't notice a difference afterwards but it's cool to have on.
Love this stuff!! I use it 3-4 times a week and it has made my skin so smooth and has cleared my skin drastically! I can't say enough how fantastic this stuff is!!!!!!

reviews.review_header: Helps with skin issues. I'm a believer!
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this mask! Not only is it fun but it actually works at clearing and softening my skin! I have terrible skin and have tried everything there is out there in products! I've found that using this every other day and using sixth city activated charcoal soap has literally made my face flawless! If you've never tried this, do yourself a favor! Also try sixth city soap! They're a small etsy shop and their soaps are amazing!!
Fun to use! Works great on acne! Makes your face feel good and clean. Love the bubbly part

Ive been on that Korean beauty kick for a while now and this face mask is one of my newest favorites. I love this product. Super cute packaging and came right on time. It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized and was super fun to put on and laugh at. Did this with my boyfriend and there was still so much product left in the jar. I will definitely buy this again(:

reviews.review_header: It was ok, but face broke out.
reviews.review_text: It was a fun little mask. But broke out my face. Don't think I'm going to use it again.
Very fun product to use. Absolutely love it. Was shipped fast. Will buy again.
I love it... except mine came with the label printed in a foreign language so we had to look up the instructions online.

reviews.review_header: I like this stuff because its different and fun but I ...
reviews.review_text: I like this stuff because its different and fun but I dont really notice any change when I use it and its a pain to clean off.
I love this stuff! Not only it is fun to use, but it also leaves my skin soft and clean.

reviews.review_header: Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff! I got it for Christmas and I just now got around to trying it. My boyfriend tried it before me and he was wanting to do another!! My face feels SO soft and clean, also it looks really shiny. I applied it all over, and then when it started to foam, I got the plastic applicator and rubbed in the foam. It takes about 5 minutes for the whole thing! I'm amazed and very excited to order more in the future! It is a little messy, but as long as you have a hand towel you should be fine.

reviews.review_header: I've heard so much good stuff about this clay mask and decided to give ...
reviews.review_text: I never review any product but this is an exception. I've heard so much good stuff about this clay mask and decided to give it a try. Waited so long for it to arrive and it wasn't even the right item. I got a freaking digital alarm clock, good job

I have very sensitive skin, but I thought this product would be good and help my skin feel better and be less dry. While the mask was on it did bubble, but it also burned in some areas. I removed the mask and my face was pretty ruff, not at all better. The feelingwent away easily with some moisturizer, but it wasn't a good experience.

reviews.review_header: Cleanses the soul as well as the face
reviews.review_text: What the makers don't tell you is that the bubbling on the outside occurs because your internal energy is bubbling with delight over how fresh you are about to feel. I've never used anything that has made my skin feel so clean and freshy fresh. I want to buy this for all of my friends so that they too can bubble internally with marvel.
It smells good, feels good on my face, and is hilarious. The bubbles will tickle your nose but hey it’s part of the experience. My skin looks and feels smooth afterwards.
Such a fun mask. Also really does clean up your pores and your skin.
Came seemingly unopened but there was dried mask around the inside of the lid? But the mask looked unused and it is fun and made my skin feel soft after
Bought from a monthly box company. It fizzes and feel nice but it's done zilch. In fact I have to moisturize more after using.

In LOVE with this mask! Im a total fanatic for skin care products. Read so many positive reviews about this mask, I just had to try it out myself! Absolutely satisfied and is one of my new favorites. I love how it comes with a little spatula to help put it on. Once on it bubbled right away. Easy to take off and my skin felt so smooth and clean after. Everyone needs this in their lives!!

reviews.review_header: Good stuff ,but can turn smelly when it goes bad
reviews.review_text: Stuff works but ua e it fast because my jar went bad and it had a horrendous smelled I almost used the product on my face but the product looked bad and the smell was not right . I will buy this in the near future

This product is just as effective as it is entertaining! It does a great job for blackheads- my nose looks significantly better than beforehand. I wouldn't say it makes your face glow, but it definitely makes it super clean and smooth. The only issue with this product is that it can be a little itchy while on your face (I have more sensitive skin so this may not be the case for others). I break out often and this product did not make me break out at all. The bubbles are actually pretty intense so make sure you don't put too much in your face- a thin layer should do the trick. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_header: I USE once a week and my face feels so ...

reviews.review_header: Mild clay mask for a super cleanse
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask after seeing a video review online about how it was really popular in Korea to young women and men. The mask comes with a small spatula which is convenient as it prevents contamination of the product and can easily scoop out the mask. I use this mask after I shower for about 10-15 minutes and then rub it in for another few minutes if I want a little extra cleansing. The consistency is "slippery" and you only need a little bit of it because it will start to bubble as it oxidizes. If you put too much you will have a face covered in gray foam. One thing I want to note is make sure you only put a small layer under your nose or you will end up breathing it in once it foams up (guilty of this). The scent is not to unpleasant but its no lemons and oranges either, however it didnt bother me too much. Removing the mask at its consistency can be difficult but I use a make up remover towelette to remove most of it, then start to rinse with warm water and it seems to do the trick. Make sure to remove it all around the hairline because you can breakout if product is left over (guilty of this as well). My skin is oily T-zone, sensitive, and acne prone and I found that my face felt really clean and tight afterward although my blackheads on my nose still remain so I can say that its super effective for that purpose. I use an aloe vera moisturizer after prior to going to bed and that works well to moisturize my skin to prevent dryness.
Good face mask, my face feels clean after but not brand new. Super fun with the foaming, but sometimes it starts to itch.

I wanted to love this product. I have oily, acne-prone skin even at age 37, and my go-to masks are No Zit Sherlock by Bliss and GlamGlow. But those take at least 20 minutes to dry, and I don't always have that kind of time. So I love the fact that this one works more quickly, and I wanted to give it a try. Plus GlamGlow is soooooo expensive (No Zit Sherlock I can usually find at TJ Maxx, but it is a pain to peel off.) Certainly I agree with the other reviewers that this one is fun to use! It's fun to watch it foam up, and don't I look silly right before I rinse it off, and ha-ha-ha! But in my mind, a clay mask is something that needs to get in there and remove the impurities and grease from your skin. I'm not here to have fun, I'm 37 years old and my skin still breaks out, I need some results, people! And although this definitely leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth, I just don't see it getting in there and zapping zits before they develop the way No Zit Sherlock and GlamGlow do. So if your skin is pretty great to begin with, and you're mostly looking for a quick fun home spa experience, I would definitely recommend this product. But if you have some oily greasty acne-prone skin and need RESULTS, I would look elsewhere.

Cons: * it's hard to get the face mask on fast enough, it starts to bubble right away! *The tingling sensation of thecarbonation was almost enough to drive me mad! I wanted to itch my face so bad. This is not the face mask to relax with a glass of wine, that's for sure. *i can feel some semi dry patches on my face, so I will make sure to moisturizer well tonight. Pros: *it really does bubble, and that bubbling makes it feel like it is deep cleaning my pores. *its a quick mask, after 5 minutes I rubbed it into my skin for a minute or so, then added water and rubbed more before rinsing off. *my skin feels nice and tight *i always have tiny blackheads under my bottom lip and my nose, this mask really helped clean those out. Overall: *I did like this mask, but I can already tell that it dried my face out, but it did clean my pores out really well. I will use it again, but probably only once a month or less often.

reviews.review_header: This mask is SO GOOD. To be honest
reviews.review_text: This mask is SO GOOD. To be honest, I mostly bought it looking at the YouTuber, CloudyApples, experience with using the mask, and it just seemed really fun. But it also works so well. I have very acne prone skin, and this mask helps with acne a ton. I like to use this mask after a warm epsom salt bath so that my pores are open. When washing off the mask, you immedietly notice your skin feels so soft and smooth. Its interesting because even though it foams up, you would think its just washing off foam. But it is actually really thick, and suds up a lot when washing off - so it is quite the effort to wash off the mask - but it is worth it. The next day I notice any existing acne is significantly improved. With this mask, a little goes a long way. I have had this mask for 4 months now, and I use it 1-2 times a week, and im only almost halfway through the tub now. You only need about half a teaspoon for your whole face - which equates to one scoop of the little spatula that comes with it. If anyone is wondering, the mask does not fizz up when you open the container, it only begins to fizz once you rub it and agitate it - so I assume introducing air into it by mixing is what "activates it". Definietly will be purchasing this many times.

I really like the way this makes my skin feel! The product was neatly packaged and came right on time. The amount of face wash in the jar compared to how much you'll use each use, this jar will last you a long time! Overall, I like this product and would recommend friends to purchase.

In all honesty, I was reading the bad/critical reviews on this product, and it scared me a bit. I thought this would be bad, but I ordered it anywho because the people taking videos of themselves online using this was really tempting. It arrived very quick. I ordered it Sunday night and I just got it this Tuesday. I used it when it came straight to me. Of course with the carbonation in mind, I had to use this very quick. For $11 it is quite a small amount but bubble masks don't generally come cheap anyways. In the box it comes with a spatula to make for easy application/spreading without having to use your hands/fingers. It also has a reusable plastic seal which you should keep using due to the fact it'll probably foam up without it. The texture is really goopy and thick. It's not easy getting it on the spatula with how quick you have to be so it won't start foaming, but I'd imagine with some practice it'll get easier. I took some generous globs onto my face and started smearing it around properly. Do not apply with a very thin layer because if you do the thin layer will start to foam within seconds. From then on after the application, it was just very fun watching my face get all bubbly, I couldn't help but mess around and send pictures to a few pals while I waited to wash it off. It did tickle my face a lot, so if you're someone who doesn't like to be tickled it may be a tad uncomfortable for you. I left the mask on for about 10-20 minutes. Just to see how much it foamed, I stuck a finger through it and it went pretty far down. I used a warm, wet wash cloth to get it off my skin. The bubbles made my skin fairly sudsy and soapy and the grey did not come off my face very easily but I just had to add a bit more pressure to get it off. The cloth also became fairly soapy from it and I had to frequently wring it out. When my face was dry, I was very pleased to notice that the many blackheads on my nose vanished. I also noticed that the red around some acne had disappeared, and some dry patches of skin on my face were moisturized. Even more happily, I'd like to add that with masks I got from the pharmacy, they always seemed to leave my skin shiny/oily-looking, not soft but very uncomfortably smooth, and my skin was also very tight. With this, my skin was not shiny, was both soft and a bit smooth, and my skin was not that tight. Very pleased, and very excited to use once more. I look forward to purchasing again when this jar runs empty!

reviews.review_header: so I can safely attribute my skin's bad reaction to this product
reviews.review_text: Sadly, I'm in the minority on this one. I began using 4 Korean skincare products 2.5 weeks before trying out this mask and with favorable results, so I can safely attribute my skin's bad reaction to this product. I cleansed my face and applied the mask as directed; as others have mentioned, you need to work fast as it starts to bubble very quickly. I washed it off after ~5 mins, and did like that my skin and pores appeared clean and tighter. Over the next several days, a cluster of 6-7 painful, red pimples cropped up to the left of my chin and proceeded to camp out for the next week. Only today have I begun to find some relief, following 3 consecutive days of my favorite Benton sheet masks. My skin is normal with a semi oily t-zone, but is not sensitive to many products. I rarely break out except for a pimple or 2 around the same time every month, hence my belief there's something in this mask that my skin simply hates. 2 stars for the packaging and "fun factor" with the bubbles. Unfortunately, I definitely will not be using again.

reviews.review_header: This bubble clay mask is freaken AWESOME. I heard about it on Youtube and I ...
reviews.review_text: This bubble clay mask is freaken AWESOME. I heard about it on Youtube and I heard good things-- so naturally I had to try it for myself. The container comes with a spatula to spread product over your face (I would not suggest using your fingers because it will cause the mask to start foaming inside the container). You don't have to spread too generous of a layer as the clay starts bubbling up almost immediately-- but do make sure to spread evenly and cover up your face-- the product will then enlarge. Your face will get kind of tingly and ticklish as it starts to become a cloud-like substance. You'll look like a piggy haha. I left it on for a good 15 minutes and then removed it from my face. The foam was easy to get off, the clay itself kind of stuck so I had to use facial cleanser to get it off (though water alone is sufficient-- as my partner removed it with purely water). MY FACE FELT RADIANT. It was... SO CLEAN. Though it did not get the little white things out of the pores in my nose, it kind of sucked them out so I was able to easily remove. This is A GREATTTTT PRODUCT for such a great price. Try it! If anything, it is atleast a super fun mask.

reviews.review_header: Not what I expected, but worth the buy
reviews.review_text: I'm a guy with oily/dry skin. Fortunately, I'm pretty lucky to have very few blemishes, whiteheads, blackheads, etc. but still wanted something to help cleanse and soften my face. This stuff is like thick yoghurt in how it smears and cools. I have mildly sensitive skin (e.g. can't use most facial moisturisers), and this caused no irritation keeping on my face for 7-10 minutes. While letting it set, the experience was rather anti-climactic as one could hear faint popping but could feel really nothing going on. This mask stays relatively moist throughout. Upon wash/"scrub" off, it is easy to remove; there is zero abrasiveness; it takes but 30-60 seconds to get off completely. So why 5-stars? My skin has never felt so soft and smooth. I'm not going to equate my face to a baby's arse, but you get the idea. There was no oil left; there was no cracking, as my face is prone; there was no irritation or redness; it was simply and unbelievably soft and smooth. Although I won't suggest this for any level of deep-cleansing, I will recommend it as a once a week use especially if you're trying to impress a bird. There is a very, very mild linger of odour which is rather ambiguous, and won't make anyone think you've used cologne; instead, it has a scented soap linger, which -- if I must say -- is quite enjoyable.

reviews.review_header: Fun new mask with great result!
reviews.review_text: As strange as the carbonated sensation this mask gives it always leaves my face feeling fresh and clean. It takes out all the excess dirt and oil, which leaves my face feeling amazing. Don't apply too close to your eyes or nose, because when the mask begins to bubble up it will block your airway/eyes. Apply quickly as carbonation begins shortly after product comes into contact with skin. Try your best to take out what you need in the beginning and spread that over your face. Once you dip the spoon (it comes with the mask pack) back into the jar the rest of the product will start to bubble up. After 10-20 mins and little to no popping can be heard coming from your face, you know product is ready to be removed. I have found that heating up a damp towel for 1 min in the micro will be the fastest way to remove the mask. Just rinse the rest off with Luke warm water.

reviews.review_header: When you first put it on it tingles but in the best way- very similar to the way toner feels
reviews.review_text: OH MY GOODNESS I was so skeptical about buying this face mask. When I put it on, I felt as if I could feel the grime being lifted out of my face. When you first put it on it tingles but in the best way- very similar to the way toner feels. There are no English instructions so just to help: 1) Apply a thin layer to face with spatula. Let it sit for five minutes or until completely bubbled up. 2) Once the mask is completely bubbled up, press the mask down for a deeper clean. 3) Wait for two minutes for the mask to re-bubble, then wash off. The mask should feel like a cleanser. My face does not feel dried out and cleaner than anything. I've tried the clarisonic, every face wash I could find, oils, but this mask changed the game. My face feels soft, exfoliated and cleaner than anything. I highly suggest. I am addicted

I saw this on one of those BuzzFeed lists about stuff to try on Amazon, etc. I've always loved masks and beauty stuff in general, plus this boasted about cleaning your pores and blackheads, AND it bubbled. Seemed like a total win. Plus, a BUZZFEED employee liked it and they are infallible, right? Yup, like the Pope. Well, it didn't do any harm, but it did not provide me with any results either. True that the bubbling part felt fun--but I can achieve the same thing with a variety of safe acids and bases, like scrubbing with baking soda + coconut oil, and then adding 1/3 watered down apple cider vinegar. I still had all my blackheads, using a Biore strip afterward didn't help either (I thought maybe the mask "brought them to the surface") and same goes for said process in reverse. Turns out this item is non refundable. So Milky Piggy and I will be roommates for a while, until maybe I can pawn her off onto my teenage niece or the tweens I babysit for a "spa night"

Very cute packaging - a bit of wasted space by using a larger plastic container with a small bowl for holding the product itself... Makes you feel like there's more than there actually is! Pleasant fragrance - somewhat floral... it seems like most clay facial cleansers I've used have a similar fragrance, and I enjoy it. Easy application - there's a little scoop included that keeps it sanitary, and the product is thick but spreads easily. Interesting experience - it starts off feeling chilly and awesome, but by the time the five minutes are over, my face was absolutely full of carbonated bubbles that got more than just a little tickley... it sounds cute and fun, but it really gets kind of itchy Difficult removal - I washed the mask off in the shower, and that's what I would recommend... the bubbles get wet and reabsorb the mask into the skin, making removal a little strenuous Clean and clear results - my face felt super clean and I didn't experience any post-mask breakouts

I really like this clay mask, it is very entertaining to watch as it bubbles up and you can feel like it is working, but be careful about putting it too near your eyes or near the nose and mouth area as it feels very ticklish as mask starts to bubbles. It starts to bubble really fast too like within seconds of applying a thin layer on my face you can see and feel it start to bubble, so you might have to put it on really quick. All of the direction is in Korean so I have to search for the direction online and most of it was apply an even, thin layer on the face and wait five minutes, then "gently" massage your face for about two minutes before washing it off. Washing it off is a little difficult as the clay mask is really thick. I have combination skin and really oily around my T-zone, but after using this mask my skin feels soft and tighter after washing it off, so I usually put on some moisturizer. However, I do not find it work on removing my blackheads. After using up the whole product, my blackheads is still present as before. Another problem I find is that when I open up the container, the top layer of the clay mask is alway bubbling, so I am not sure if it is because I let the clay come in contact with the air for long. I take a glob of the clay with the small scooper they give you and quickly close it, but it does not work. I also wash the scooper to prevent any oil or dirt that came from my face to come in contact with the clay mask.

reviews.review_header: Love this - my skin does too!!
reviews.review_text: I saw a review for this on a social media site and decided that since the girl reviewing it liked it, then I would order it and see how it did. Can I say how amazing my face feels after using it??!! I am almost 40 (yes, I said it - or typed it) and I have a few skin issues (dry in the winter months regardless of lotion or moisturizer use). After using this 3 times a week for a month now, my skin is as soft as my toddler's. My dryness issues have all but cleared up and my pores don't seem as big. It bubbles and almost tickles as it dries. Then, once it is done, you have the option to smooth the bubbly solution on your face for more treatment. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with skin issues. My sister has sensitive skin and uses this when she comes to visit and she loves it. It doesn't leave any redness, just smooth and silky skin. The only downside is that the directions come in Japanese/Chinese and I had to google the directions (and watch the review video again).

Alright, so here's the full extent of the product! If I could this probably would get a 4.5 instead of a 5, but overall the product was pretty great :) Shipping: I ordered this maybe 2 and a half weeks ago (on standard shipping) and it showed up really early, so for that a 10/10! Very much appreciated, and will be buying this from this company again! :) Instructions: I knew ahead of time that I was going to need translated instructions. Many people said that in other reviews when I did my research. That, I'm totally cool with. The instructions I read told me to have this on my face (dry, so there's no washing before hand) for five minutes. I'm not gonna lie, I went ahead and did ten minutes instead, because I didn't set a timer, and my skin does feel better! So, I'm going to keep doing ten minute intervals instead of five. 9.5/10 (And finally...) Product: For me, I had a lot of fun using this product with my sis! The consistency of the mask is about the same as pudding, and smells like a really earthy hair salon. (which to me smells nice, but some might disagree) On my first go, I had a hard time getting this stuff on even. It starts to bubble pretty quick, so you're gonna need to hurry getting this stuff on! There are two lids, the outer lid, which is for decoration really, and the other to keep the mask air tight. It IS a bit difficult to get this open and perfectly closed without nails! When I went to apply this stuff to my sis, I applied a much more even coat, and it's definitely showing! Her skin is much softer and shines a bit better. The only problem I had here was after I used the mask for my sister, I started seeing the mask foam inside the container, which worries me a bit, hoping it won't effect the overall usefulness of this stuff! Make sure you keep this stuff closed when not using with the inner lid, and make sure it's on TIGHT! Overall 9.6/10! Will be buying again and scaring my family with the foam face (because they all seem to find it scary looking when it foams! 😂)

I used this mask once. There was no noticeable difference in my skin or how it felt. That by itself wouldn't have led me to leave one star, or even a review. I probably would have just given it to a friend and then forgotten about it. What makes me feel I have to write a review of this is the smell. If you are at all sensitive to scents or perfumes, DO NOT BUY THIS. I knew upon opening it that I shouldn't use it. I knew as soon as I put it on my face that I shouldn't have. I should have know better than to even buy it, but all the videos and reviews of people having fun with the bubbles were too tempting. I could smell it on my skin after an extremely thorough wash, and washing again hours later. Even my hands were perfumed, hours later. Again, this mask is extremely perfumed. If that's your thing, you'll probably enjoy it. If you're like me, you'll spend the rest of your day regretting even touching the stuff.

I love this mask! There is a small spatula that you use to apply the mask. When you first apply it, it's almost like clay. As others have said, it bubbles up very quickly. I couldn't stop laughing. It has a slight tingly feeling, as if something is brushing you with a feather. I apply it with a slightly rinsed face, with my makeup on still. After 15 minutes, I wash it off in the shower. You do not need cleanser afterwards. This takes off all makeup, dirt, etc. My face feels soo soft. I applied toner just to make sure that all the makeup is removed, and there is nothing on the cotton ball. Unlike other masks, my face is not red after washing it off. Instead, I look like I just got a facial. My skin is oily and clog-prone. This mask does not clog me and really does pull out all the gunk out of your pores. I did not experience any 'purging' after using this mask. I'm definitely very happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_header: My complexion has cleared up a great deal in the last few months since changing up ...
reviews.review_text: This mask feels very relaxing and seems to clean fairly well. My complexion has cleared up a great deal in the last few months since changing up my skin care routine, which includes this mask. So, while I can't credit the clear complexion solely to this mask, it's probably a part of it. I use it after doing a green tea steam every Saturday. Then I follow it up with rosehip oil. I have extremely dry skin and if you do, too, I wouldn't recommend using it more than once or twice a week as it is rather drying. However, if used with a good moisturizer, it seems to help keep pores clean. The bubbling sensation after the steam is quite relaxing and the mask has a good, clean scent. The price is reasonable and a little bit of this mask goes quite a ways so I anticipate the jar, while small, will last me quite a while.

reviews.review_header: I've struggled with combo skin for years, and finally found something that helps!
reviews.review_text: I relentlessly struggle with combo skin, really oily but dry and flaky at the same time; on top of having blackheads mainly on my nose and cheeks. It's been really hard to find a mask or any product really to help. I ordered this last week, and got it on Tuesday and tried it out that night. I am blown away by this. It was very fun to use, and I could honestly see results immediately after. My face felt amazingly soft, I could see my pores were actually cleaned out. Normally my face will feel clean after washing, but within a couple hours its really oily and gross. With this mask, my face felt soft and fresh all through out the following day (did not put on the next day). Was able to wear makeup without it looking cakey or greasy all day. It did not dry my face out either. I reapplied this morning to help maintain the oil production, and my face still feels amazing. I'm amazed with how well this stuff has controlled the access oil without drying my face out. It's been a long time since I have felt this beautiful and confident without having to cover my natural face. Will definitely be buying more!

reviews.review_header: Application process is very easy but you kind of have to hurry and get ...
reviews.review_text: I purchased this clay mask after seeing it on youtube. It comes with this little scoopy scraper thing that I used to apply the mask with. Application process is very easy but you kind of have to hurry and get your face covered quickly because the product starts working as soon as you put it on. As soon as you put it on you start feeling it bubble up and start doing its thing. I left it on for maybe 15 to 20 minutes and the mask expanded/bubbled up to an inch thick, so near the eye area you should be careful to how close you put it on. I feel like I put it to close to my eyes once it expanded when I blinked I would get it on my eye lashes. There are no English directions on the box or the jar so I really wasn't sure how to take it off. I had rubbed a small spot on the side of my face with my finger and it came off easily, but when I rinsed with water it seemed to thicken up and made it a little harder to rinse off. I really liked the mask I liked that you could really feel it bubble up and work, I do feel you should use a pore clearing peel off mask after (It had brought the dirt to the surface and could see some of my pores were clogged). It's a fun mask.

This stuff is a ton of fun! My wife and I tried it together for the first time and we're both pretty new to face masks. Applying it was a little tricky since you have to work pretty fast before it starts to activate and bubble. It has a small ticklish stinging sensation for the 5 minutes that you let it bubble, but I would equate it to a sort of pop rocks for your face. After that, we rubbed it into a mask and let it sit for 2 minutes before washing it off. Be warned, you will most likely need a wash cloth or towel to get this off as it sticks pretty well even with water. It's currently the day after first use and my face still feels pretty soft. Definitely looking forward to using this again and it's interesting enough to make the mask process fun instead of tedious.

reviews.review_header: I am actually pretty impressed with this product
reviews.review_text: I am actually pretty impressed with this product! Its also very fun to apply and watch bubble up hahah. It makes my skin feel really nice and smooth and clean. I think its also making the redness of my acne go away which is definitely a plus. I used it about 10-15 minutes before I shower and when I first apply it I leave it on for about 5 minutes until i see its completely bubbled and then I just rub the bubbles until they have the clay consistency and leave it on like that for about another 5 minutes. Then when I am in the shower I wait for the clay to soften a little and rub it in my face until it has like a soapy consistency thanks to a little bit of water and use that sort of as a cleanser. Anyway sorry if this was TMI but I just really like this product so far and no negative results or side effects yet!

Oh the joys you will have with this mask!! Not only is it fun to watch your face transform into a chubby bubble but then you get the after effects of having soft, clean skin...who wouldn't want a product that's not only fun to do but that also cleans and softens your skin? Saw this on a few social media ads and decided to try it out myself. I had to look up directions since it was all in Korean. You don't have to clean your face before you use it. There's a small spatula provided. I didn't want to keep dipping the spatula in the clay after it had touched my dirty face so I kept a damp paper towel and wiped it each time I needed to get more. After applying it...you get to watch your face grow!! It does tingle from the bubbles. After about 10-12 minutes, you pat it all down and massage it into your skin. You wait for another 5 minutes and then you rinse or wash it off! Dry your face and voilà, you're beautiful again! I gave my husband, my little brother, his girlfriend, my 6 year old son, and my mom the bubble facial and all you heard throughout our house was laughter! And I still have half the jar left...

reviews.review_header: Your Life is Lame Until You Try This Mask
reviews.review_text: Ok hi, I haven't even tried it yet but let me tell you about how great this stuff is. It got here in three days, nine days earlier than expected, and I was like, "well frick, not bad." So I open it up, right? First of all, the packaging is cuter than anything else ever, but you open it and, call me crazy but you can literally smell that this stuff is quality. So for about ten minutes I'm just sniffing it. It smells fresh and not even a little chemically and the only downside I can see is that if my face smells like this all the time, I will do nothing but smell my own face forever and lose my job, all my friends and my home, spiralling into a pit of poverty and despair, which brings it down from a solid 12/10 to about an 11.5/10. So, then I took a small amount and put it on the back of my hand and it bubbled, so I don't know but if that's not cute to you, no offense but you're Satan. I'll buy this forever, thanks bye.

My skin always feels awesome after using this, so I try to use it a few times a week, especially on those rough days.

This mask is more for cleansing purposes and not to cure acne. This mask does well to cleanse your face a couple times a week to remove excess dirt/grime/makeup/products that linger on the face. It activates within a couple seconds, so apply it quickly. It itches as it cures; which is around 5 minutes. After it has cured rub it in a little more for a couple minutes then rinse off. It takes some effort to rinse it off after which is kind of lame. The ingredients in this mask are no nonsense and non comedogenic. I wouldn't say this mask is super awesome, just because It doesn't have any AHAs/BHAs or anything that necessary helps with acne. But cleansing your face does, so I think this mask helps. Overall, good mask, good price, and serves its purpose. Shipping took around 3 weeks which though.

This clay mask is a fun idea. It makes you giggle and tickles when you put it on. You can hear the tiny bubbles foaming as it works on your face. It's fun to let your friends or family try it once just because it is so unusual. All that said, this product really did nothing. In fact I'd say it made my pores look more clogged. I found it difficult to wash off sort of a slimy mud-like consistency. If you're ok with spending the money to try out this unusual mask, go for it, although I will say the people I got to try this with me also told me it did nothing for them. I'm giving it three stars because it is cute packaging, a fun idea, a silly way to make someone giggle or look at you funny (in a mostly good way :)) but no more because of the low level of effectiveness.

reviews.review_header: So weird but I love this mask!
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I've been eyeing it for months but never ordered it. Buzzfeed included it in one of their lists so I finally went ahead and ordered it. Got here in 2 days and I put it on as soon as I opened the box! It's so weird but I love it! The bubbles started before I could get it on my whole face. I left it bubble for about 5 minutes then wet my hands and rubbed it in. 5 more minutes then I washed it off. I suggest using a wet rag to help take it off because it's really thick and doesn't wash off easily. My face felt amazing afterwards. It felt super clean without having that tight feeling most masks leave. And I have oily skin, but it didn't make my face more oily like most other masks. My face didn't even feel gray the next day! Love love love this stuff.

reviews.review_header: A Mask That is Effective AND Entertaining
reviews.review_text: This is the strangest mask I have ever used, which isn't a bad thing, it's just very different! It applies as a thick gelatinous dark grey substance and once applied starts to foam up until your face is covered in a pale grey bubbly foam. It looks like a strange mould growth, I kid you not. It tingles and tickles during this process, and after ten minutes I washed it off with warm water and a wash cloth. This is a clay mask, so it can be drying and is supposed to pull impurities to the surface of the skin. Be sure to moisturize properly immediately afterwards and avoid overusing any type of clay mask! Every skin type is different and different seasons and climates should dictate whether your skin needs a clay mask or moisturizing mask.

This mask is mild-scented and gentle to the skin. It seems as effective as the peel-off mask, but with none of the pain. Apply a fairly thin amount all over the face, but avoid your eyes and nostril-holes. It goes on creamy and then starts to bubble. The bubbles tickle! It foams up quite a bit, and you will look quite comical. After five minutes, massage it into the skin with some warm water, then rinse it all off. Finish with a wet washcloth if you feel the need. It cleaned up my pores pretty well! I used a moisturizer afterwards. I was pleased with the experience and with the results. Fun to use! One jar should last a long time.

reviews.review_header: Buy more than one! Great Product!
reviews.review_text: highly recommend! comes with a small applicator. applies very easily. be sure to close the lid immediately after you scoop your goop. best way to apply is start with the forehead. then place some goop towards the T section, cheeks, and chin...then spread from there. recommended chestnut size scoop will be sufficient. you could use more depending on coverage. evenly spread and within seconds, the bubbles begin to activate. most people say it feels weird, but i like the tingly sensation. and its amazing to watch. once the bubbles have fully activated and slow down, begin to compress the foamy mask into your face and massage evenly. at this point, it should feel like a regular mask. its very smooth, velvety, and clay-like. finally rinse off with luke-warm water and dry with towel... now your face is amazingly clean and smooth! i love this product and am now living by it. bottom line: you won't be disappointed

reviews.review_text: This is a great, fun mask that at this point is a viral sensation on it's own. The trick to getting the most out of it is applying a THIN LAYER! It took a few uses for me to realize this. When you apply a thin layer (one spatula full!), it's much less itchy and irritating when it bubbles up, easier to wash off, and in my opinion, more effective. It's a gentle mask that doubles as a cleanser, and it a great one to do with other boyfriend- my boyfriend is also a big fan. I love how quick it is, also, it's a nice boost when my skin is lackluster. When I've used it my skin is exfoliated, soft, and I notice soothed acne in a day or two. Another fast mask I quite like: Biore Self Heating One Minute Mask, .25 oz each, 4 Count

reviews.review_header: Fantastic Mask for a Good Price.
reviews.review_text: It took about 12 days to get here which is a little long but understandable considering it was shipped from Korea. I used it as soon as I got it and honestly it's my new favorite mask. I'm a mask addict and I've used a lot of gimmicky masks that just didn't work well. I can't speak for long term use but after using it my skin feels so amazing. It is slightly drying but I followed it up with a light gel moisturizer and it was totally fine. Application was easy and I actually really like the little spatula it comes with but, you do have to work kind of fast because it does start bubbly very quickly and once it starts to bubble it's basically impossible to put more in that spot. Waiting the five minutes is slightly uncomfortable because of the tickling from the bubbles but honestly I was laughing so hard because of how ridiculous it looks all bubbled up that it really didn't bother me. Once you rub it in its just like any other mud mask. When you begin to rinse it off it gets sudsy which is nice but I did have to use a soft washcloth to get it off. Overall it's a really good, fun mask at a good price. Definitely worth a try.

Oh dare I say it's so cute putting them on! I use about once per week, right before shower, and will just rinse it off after I'm done shampooing my hair (around 6-8 mins). You need to put on this mask very fast since they start to bubble up immediately, and I always just quickly put a couple of scoops on my cheeks, chin, and forehead, and close the container so the mask in the container will not start bubbling up. Then I spread it around evenly and jump in my shower. I do make sure my face won't get that wet when I'm washing my hair though. It's such a cute and interesting feeling to feel the clay mask start to bubble up, and I can hear them sizzling! After around 6 mins, I will smear them around my face, rub it in a little and just wash it off in the shower. It takes a little time to wash it off since it's not instantly gone like soap foam. And boom that's it. After that my face is super smooth! I haven't seen any other effect other than it takes my face smooth, and once I didn't put it on my forehead and I can feel a big different in terms of smoothness between my forehead and other parts of the face. It hasn't made me break out at all so that's good! All in all, I think it's fun and cute and makes your face smooth (gets rid of dead skin etc. etc.)

My husband bought this product for me as my birthday gift and it is one of the best birthday gift ever (actually, he always gives me the best one).I tried immediately on that night, the first feeling when I applied it to my face was shockingly cold and relaxed. However, what intrigued me most was the tingling sensation I felt almost immediately — before I'd even finished applying it to my entire face. It sort of felt like someone was popping a sheet of miniature bubble wrap on my face (note: you need to aware that you should not apply this stuff around your nose or eye because it will take you minutes to wipe it away from those areas before preparing for even bigger bubble). The mask had done a wonderful job since it manages to suck the gunk and dirty from my skin and still not be stripping . My skin was smooth, my pores were practically non-existent and even after all that scrubbing (with rough, office paper towels, no less), my face wasn't red or irritated at all. I highly recommend you try this at home.

Though I had much fun looking at my face turning into a cloud on first day, I realized that was not a right way to use this product. Some tips for future buyers : -Don't put too much at once. Apply as thin layer as possible (with your finger, since mini spatula scratched my face once) because it will get airy enough later on. If it's too thick, you'll need more force to wash it off later and damage skin more ! - Once it turns into cloudy texture, put little water to massage in a muddy texture. Then add more water. You'll feel the mud softening. In the end, add a lot of water and turn the mud into foam. It produces A LOT of foam, and I'm even thinking of using it everyday as my foam cleanser. If anything amazing happens after daily use, I'll add more words to my review for sure ! - Right after you're done washing off, apply a thick ! layer of moisturizer and sleep. The main appeal of this is the novelty/fun factor. It's worth doing once but is it really worth buying beyond that? That's a matter of opinion I guess. Quick pros and cons: the tingling sensation is pleasant, it left my face very moisturized, and the little spatula/cap thing is cute and sanitary. I liked using the mask but it's not my favorite. You don't get a ton of product but a little goes a long way (trust me, be skimpy otherwise your eyes and nose will be filled with bubbles lol). There's a mild smell that I didn't enjoy. There are no instructions in English so I just applied it after washing and drying my face and hoped for the best. It's pretty hard to wash off, I highly recommend using a washcloth. And I found the little crackling sound of the bubbles kind of annoying. But overall it was interesting and my face felt pretty good after so I'd say if you've got money to spare give it a shot, but if you're saving up for a go-to mask, there are better ones with better prices. Hope that helps

reviews.review_header: Fun To Put On, B**** To Take Off
reviews.review_text: Purchased this because I saw all the reviews and have been really into face masks. Tried it a few times already so it's safe to make a review. Texture: - Upon application it was a Cold, Gel like consistency. It was funny, kinda felt like I was putting pudding on my face. - After a few minutes it becomes a bubbly foam which you then press and work into your skin - Once you've pressed it in, you notice that it's now more of a muddy consistency. - Here comes the difficulty, washing it off took some time. I suggest wiping it off with a towel first and then washing the remainder Thoughts: It bubbled up before I was able to apply it to my entire face so I feel as though you have to work pretty quickly. I mean it was fun to take pictures and stuff. Safe for sensitive skin I suppose because I tried it on my daughter who also enjoyed playing with it. Results: - Face felt clean. Like bar soap squeaky clean. However, I feel like the same thing could be achieved with a good cleanser or bar soap. Didn't do much for my black heads and stuff. I mean, it got the makeup off but man oh man it was so much work. A bit pricey for the product and I wouldn't buy it again. It definitely isn't a go to mask or holy grail, but if you're looking for something fun lol.

This carbonated bubble clay mask is a blast to use! It can get a little itchy around the upper lip and nose area though. The longer you leave it on, the more it bubbles. I find the best results happen when you leave it on for 15 minutes and softly push the bubbles into the massage it into another soapy, bubble lather. Let it sit for 15 more minutes, then go back to rinse. It slightly dries out my face but it's the only mask I've had so far that has really made my skin feel brighter and cleaner. Instead of using it all over my face, I usually use it on concentrated areas now.

My kids and I all love to put on this foamy mask. You have to be kind of quick when applying it if you want to get your face evenly coated before it starts bubbling up, but the slight tingly sensation is nice and cooling, and your face feels soft and refreshed afterwards. I will say it took more muscle to remove than I would've initially guessed, but since you are putting clay goop on your face, I suppose it makes sense. I still have to wash, wash, double check, then wash more because there are always a handful of spots you didn't get washed off completely the first few minutes of rinsing. Like others, I watched a few youtubes for instructions first, and don't be mislead by people saying how messy this stuff is. I have had zero problems with it making a mess, and it won't "get everywhere" as long as you're not a mini-spatula-wielding maniac. I will say that it does expand once it bubbles up, so yea, if you put it too close to your nostrils initially, you will probably get some up your nose once it has puffed up. The kids are young and still have perfect skin, and I can't say that I have skin problematic enough to say that this "helped" in any long term way, but it's still a fun pampering activity, and your face will definitely feel and smell wonderful after.

A little bit goes a long way! The texture is jelly like and smells decent. Once on your face, you can feel it tingling and cracking cause it's creating bubbles on your face. When done your face itself looks like a huge bubble, it's quite fascinating. I kept the mask on for 10 minutes. Afterwards I used wet hands to rub the product in, then I washed with warm water. After using this my face felt amazing! Super soft and shiny, not oily of grimy at all. Will definitely buy again, 10/10 :)
