Then let it sit and the bubbles start to form. Your face may feel ticklish because the bubbles are forming and popping. After 5 mins or so, wet your fingers and rub your face in circular motions to re hydrate and work in the clay mask again. Then wash it off and you're done. The clay does take a little more time to wash off completely than a typical cleanser. The results I received made my skin look brighter and my pores smaller. I use this about once a week.

reviews.review_header: Milky Piggy Carbonated bubble clay will tickle your senses
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so much fun. It works great, if you can handle the bubbles tickling your face! The hardest part is leaving it on long enough for it to work. It just looks like gray clay mask. It comes with a little spatula to apply it to your face. I really recommend that you use the spatula, or you will be scrubbing clay out of your nails for days. I love the packaging, it's adorable. I just wish there was a sticker with english instructions. everything was in korean, so we just kind of guessed.

I saw a pop up ad for this on Facebook and decided to give it a try.. it's great! It does bubble the way it claims to and after one use I did notice that my skin was softer and felt very clean.. I didn't have a breakout of any kind so not sure how well it works on that but wanted to know so I got my 13 year old to try it.. he breaks out on his nose and chin so that's where I put it on him and after a couple of uses his skin showed definite improvement and he had fun trying it...lol.. I would recommend this !

reviews.review_header: A fantastic mask for those who can grit their teeth through the tickles
reviews.review_text: I love how it pulls oil and unclogs my pores without drying out my skin. I use this at the end of my workweek and feeling the makeup and dirt disappear from my pores. I was impressed with how much it foams when open to air. Because of this, I would tell users to close the jar immediately after opening to prevent the product from bubbling up in the container. But be warned: the tickling sensation is a lot more uncomfortable than I thought it would be. I'm particularly ticklish, so use it at your own discretion. The sensation disappears after you rub the product in as directed. Do know that after you rub it in, the product will bubble up again if exposed to air for a period of time. It's different from other masks, and I definitely recommend it for people who want to try something different and refreshing in their skin care routine!

This was fun. My high school / college aged kids, cousin, husband and I all did this together for the first time while on vacation. It really bubbles up and gets kind of puffy, so that's funny to see what everybody looks like. When I rinsed it off, my face felt wonderful. Very soft and clean. A couple of the other people doing it didn't really like it because I think they didn't like the feel of it bubbling on their face. I thought it was kind of neat and didn't bother me at all. I took one star off because of the people who didn't really care for it and because it doesn't come with instructions in English. You can find instructions (and lots of videos) online of how to use it.

reviews.review_header: its fun, and it doesn't leave skin over dry or ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff is hilarious. It works really well, its fun, and it doesn't leave skin over dry or stretched tight. It removes dirt and oil, and leaves skin soft. Its also really fun. This would be a great product for a girls night, or a spa night. Its just fun, and it works. It has a smell like the clay that is in it, which is a little heavy, but rinse off, and isn't artificial, its just what the clay smells like. I will totally buy more when this jar runs out.

When I first got this product, it exceeded my expectations. Left it on for 5 minutes, rubbed it in and let it sit for an additional minute and most of my blackheads around my nose were gone. However, the mask has become less and less effective with time. I was quite anal about only using the spatula to dispense product as to not get any oils into the container, and keeping it sealed tightly. I understand that products like this will eventually expire, but this did so in only two months.

I live masks and this one is very different and entertaining. Leaves skin extremely clean and just blank canvas feeling. I'm not in love with how it feels when wearing I can barely stand it actually because it is like 1000 like tickles in no way painful just tickles like crazy. I almost never take stars of from packaging and things of that manner because I really only care about the goods and if they work but this container annoys me a little. It includes a spatula which in nice but is hard to smooth around nose with small flat stiff spatial which is mine and the majority of peoples biggest problem area. A bendable spatula or just your finger would work better. And the second air lid gets stuck a lot, and is always a mess lol.

reviews.review_header: Tickley, bubbley fun that softens and moisturizes
reviews.review_text: First impressions: I received this product today. I was so excited to use it. Unfortunately no English directions are listed, so I came on Amazon. I still had questions, so I went on YouTube. So I started with a dry, clean face and only took out a small amount of product that I was using so I wouldn't expose the rest to air. I actually liked the included spatula, and I think it worked well. It was a unique feeling. After it went on, it did start to bubble quickly, so application should be on the faster side. It tickle/itches almost unbearably, but the sensation only lasts a few minutes. The second bubbling sensation is quite nice, and I really could have sat around all day with it on my face... If my face wasn't purple and I didn't have to go to work today. I had it on about 10 minutes. I did rub it in at the end with my fingers. I'm not sure this did anything but make the removal process a tad easier. It took a long time to rinse off. And it tastes horrible, so heed my warning and avoid your lips during the rinse process. After drying my face I had two thoughts. 1. Hey, good, my skin did not get dyed purple. This kind of was a fleeting worry I had throughout the experience. 2. My skin is so soft. I didn't even need to follow up with moisturizer, which is unheard of in my world. So now it's roughly 20 minutes past mask usage. Skin still feels great, but I'm thinking of putting on some moisturizer at this point. Bottom line: Can't wait to use it again! I'm also going to put it on hubby to giggle as he tickles uncontrollably!!

I’ve seen this product blasted over buzzfeed and other articles about “what our readers are crazy about” etc. I don’t typically have problematic skin so I wasn’t worried about it irratating or anything (which it didn’t). And it definitely did bubble up as promised, there was just much to be desired. There was no cool tingling feeling some clay masks give. My skin didn’t feel moist or softer after, honestly it felt dried out. With that said the bubbles were cool to look at the first time I used it, but after that they just made me want to itch my face If you’re just looking for the bubbles you can’t go wrong. Although, do make sure your face is completely damp or they won’t bubble (packaging not in English) But if you’re looking for something that is actually good for your skin I would move on

Super fun and made my skin feel extra soft. I love the feeling of the mask it also smells like mint. It bubbles up and then you rub it into your skin. My skin felt clean and smooth. Pores felt smaller though it just may be me. I use this once a week and love it. Makes for a nice trick on you SO if they have never seen it before as the bubbles get pretty big. Down sides is if its too close to your eye sockets it can interfere with you eyesight, but that's it. Totally worth the price, its more expensive on Memebox or other websites I have found. It arrived quickly and without any damage or hassle.

The most fun I've ever had with a mask. It bubbles and feels great. I don't know if I'd want too many people to see me with this on - some areas bubble way more than others so your face looks very comical. The last time I did the mask I took selfies and sent to my granddaughter (she's 21) and cracked her up. It washes off with a warm wash cloth and my face does feel great after.

reviews.review_header: It's a great product to have while doing slumber parties or something ...
reviews.review_text: It's a great product to have while doing slumber parties or something with friends. It bubbles up and tickles and its just fun to look at and experience. I did notice that it did get most of the blackheads out and my skin was smoother, but the biggest 'argh' of it..was that its a pain to scrub off.. since its a clay mask, it takes forever and I'm not a fan of clogging my sink with clay... I'm sure doing it a few times wouldn't hurt but I felt like this product went on thick and it could create future problems if used often lol

Most likely, you're looking into this mask because of the viral videos in which it is featured. If you're looking for a fun night in, a laugh, and a unique mask, then this is totally worth the fair price! The results are hilarious, just like they are in the videos. I don't think it does much for your skin, but it is highly amusing and it would do great for a beauty night solo or with your friends.

I have used this mask twice and so far I love it. I have acne scars and enlarged pores and blackheads and after 2 uses I can already notice a difference in the appearance of my skin. My pores look smaller already and the blackheads are clearing already. I have used everything on my face including proactiv and nothing works on my pores. I LOVE this mask it looks so funny and the only downside is that it's very itchy as it's bubbling but otherwise I recommend to anyone looking for results!

Ingredients listed on this listing is Ingredients green tea extract, aloe vera leaf extract, matcha powder, charcoal powder, pomegranate extract, fermented soy extract, alantoin, peony root extract, oregano leaf extract, white willow peel extract, portulaca extract, cinnamon extract BUT what I received was not this product. I believe I received their older version which I purposefully chose not to purchase. The expiration date on the box for this item did not match the expiration date on the item itself.

I can see this being a cool product if you don't have any sort of sensitive skin, but I really hated it. It felt like my face was on fire and covered in fire ants. Itching+burning is a bad mix. I could barely stand to have it on for 3 minutes. I definitely don't recommend this unless you have very tough skin. Then only if you think it would be fun. It was very drying- and I've always had extremely oily skin, so drying things only make my skin produce more oil. (Maracuja oil is the best skin product in the world!)

So far so good. it feels funny but I only have been using it for 2 weeks and 3 times a week. Found out i need to put on as thin layer, otherwise its hard to wash it out. face does feels good after. I used the mini scoop that come with the mask to scoop up the clay. don't let any part of your skin touch the rest of the clay inside the container or they will foam up. Only put 4 stars because I need to use more before I decide if they worth the 5th star. Will report back when I finish the container.

More of a 'for fun' cleansing mask than a practical beauty product that does much more than face wash. Very funny as well as silly looking, (as it bubbles up quite a bit) and also is a very quick mask (5-15 minutes) so I'd imagine it's good for young children to use during sleepovers, play-spas, etc! Also a good one to use on stubborn boyfriends who don't want long excruciating facial routines, lol. Scent is fairly neutral and while the product is a bit tedious to remove for my personal facial mask tastes, I still use it at least weekly! Makes the face feel super clean afterwards.

reviews.review_header: Fun mask that makes my face clean and soft~
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. Not only does my face feel clean afterward, but it also feels so soft. I've bought this before from a different shop, and I was running out so I got it again here. It's really fun to use - the bubbles can make you feel a bit ticklish, but it doesn't bother me. Fair warning, it can be hard to clean off and you may need a wash rag and a lot of water. I like to put it on before my shower so I can wash it off easily. I still really enjoy this product and I can't argue with the end result.

Not sure why such high reviews. This product is USELESS. I was expecting it to foam much more than it actually did. Furthermore, it was SO troublesome to get off. Go light on the application. I obviously must have layered on too much . I will give a second try again without going overboard on the application. Also quite jarring is the presence of "Sodium Lauryl Sulfate" as an ingredient in this product !! Known to be a skin irritant that can damage skin . I almost don't even want to give this a second try. Am debating .

Excellent, deep-cleaning mask. Make sure not to apply it to close to eyes or mouth because the bubbles will spread - they are more like a foam and will make you look like a werewolf while the mask is on, but your skin will be baby soft once you remove it. I recommend you do this in the shower because it's messy, thick and takes some time to remove. I like to mix in a little exfoliating powder to remove it or use makeup wipes in the shower for a faster process. I use it once a week or more often if I have been wearing a lot of makeup. Can't beat it for the price!

reviews.review_header: I love face masks at this looks like a fun one ...
reviews.review_text: I love face masks at this looks like a fun one to try it it was you put it on your face and then minutes later you feel a tingling sensation and you look in a mirror and you look like a monster then you wash it off and your skin feels smooth and your pores look clean I suggest people who are prone to get blackheads to try this out to get them clean out package came on time and in good condition

Just got this today and immediately tried it because I was so excited. Opened it up and thought it was supposed to come with an applicator. Found the applicator at the end bc it's hidden in the lid. Not as thick and creamy as I've seen in YouTube videos. Had to close the lid in between getting it out of the container bc the insides start bubbling. It started bubbling within seconds of being on my face. Wished it started a minute after so I had time to apply it all over before it started expanding! Definitely foamed up and bubbled A LOT. I say that with no exaggeration at all. Overall, not my favorite face mask but wasn't the worst!

reviews.review_header: It tickles and it’s kind of funny. My son just stared at me like „mom ...
reviews.review_text: I saw a review on Facebook about it and thought I should give it a try. It’s a mask that will tickle your skin while it goes to work. Just put in on with the little spatula and watch how it starts to bubble up. It tickles and it’s kind of funny. My son just stared at me like „mom it’s getting more and more“ The instructions say to put it on and leave it for 5 minutes. After that you should use wet hands and massage it for another 2 minutes. I have baby soft skin now. I know I shouldn’t touch it but I can’t 😂 I highly recommend it and will buy more as christmas gifts.

I just got this today and had to try it out right away. I loved it. Direction were easy to follow but I changed it And instead of rinsing it off after 5 minutes, I used a little water to turn it into clay mask and left it on for an additional 5 minutes. My skin feels tighter. It appears cleaner and my pores appear bigger (for now). It itch my nose like crazy and it ended up covering my eyebrows which got on my eyelashes it kind of concerned me. I plan to order the nose pour mask to take care of some blackheads. I plan to repeat again this week sometime and I will update this review at that time. I will add my photos at that time.

reviews.review_header: Really cool mask. I love the bubbles
reviews.review_text: Really cool mask. I love the bubbles. Anyone who says it bubbles too quick clearly applies it wayyyyyy too slow. Come on, it comes with a cute spatula, spread it on and be done. Also, it requires a VERY thin layer, not giant globs. Thin layer ensures even bubbling coverage. And anyone who says it's difficult to take off clearly does not know how to wash their skin well. You basically treat it like any other face wash - lather it onto your face with water (after about 15-20 min) and it actually will lather off like a regular facial cleanser. There is NO need to try and scrape it off. I'll likely repurchase Bcs it's my favorite clay mask so far, and I have tried many.

What a great fun product! The bubbles tickled my face, no burning or redness noted. I looked like I had greyscale from Game of Thrones when I first put it on. Within 5 minutes I was a bubbly cloud face, and had a great time taking goofy pictures! Lol After the bubbles died down, I rubbed the product in circular motions to clean my skin, and then I washed it off with a warm washcloth. My skin felt clean and smooth. I did my usual makeup routine after, and I swear my skin was glowing! I will be definitely be buying this again!

I have seen friends do this and also videos on how to apply. I tried it this morning and it is amazing. I have bad blackheads on my nose and put on a dollop of about a walnut size all over my face (a little spatula comes with the jar) and it starts bubbling immediately. Wait 5 mins then massage mask into face and wash off. I would suggest wiping it off because it is very sudsy. Your face will be nice and soft and glowing! I love it and it will last forever!! Oh it removed my blackheads.

reviews.review_header: Really fun mask that gets the job done!
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this face mask! I want to order another package (even though I have more than half left)! It feels so good on! And it is a fast mask that does not dry out my skin like other mud masks. Some mud masks have to be left on for 20 minutes - this one is about ten minutes or less. You do have to rub it off for a minute or 2 with plenty of warm water to completely remove it. It is very invigorating & feels like you are getting a good, deep clean from it. Just don't put on right under your nose - it will tickle like crazy!!

reviews.review_header: This is absolutely amazing. A completely removes all of the dirt from ...
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely amazing. A completely removes all of the dirt from my skin period the sensation of tingling due to the carbonation is something I needed to get used to, but after experiencing the results, it's just a mild discomfort. The only thing I will say is that it does not pull out impurities from the pores very well, but it does melt any type of dirt off of your face, and does leave my skin feeling very clean. I have pretty oily skin, so I don't need any type of moisturizer after work, but if you have dry skin I suggest using a serum and a cream.

I bought this due to all of the comments I heard on the internet about it. It comes nicely packaged with a little tool to spread she mask on your face. I washed my face and started to apply the mask. Only a few seconds later did it start to foam....and boy does it foam! It feels a little bit tingly due to the air bubbles. I let it sit for about ten minutes and then rinsed it off. It takes longer than I expected to remove it but left my face feeling soft. I only wish there were directions in English.

I first saw this on Facebook, thought it was cool but not realistic. I finally broke down and spent the $10 on it. Well, let me tell you it's the best $10 I've ever spent! It's so fun! I put the clay on my face and it bubbled within 30 seconds of putting it on. Once I got it all over I could hear and feel the bubbles, and watching it bubble was cool. I couldn't stop laughing! You know it's time to wash it odd when it stops bubbling, and taking it off was just as fun as putting it on. Now, it was really fun, but it also left my face feeling soft and you could see a difference in my face. My skin looked healthier, felt healthier. I did put moisturizer on after because I live in the northeast and right now it's dry and cold and my face is dry, but I don't think I really needed to. This stuff is legit! I don't usually do ratings on things I buy but I had to do one here because I am in love with this stuff!!

I have used this a handful of time. There is a slight tingling sensation; however, it does not burn. I use a thin layer all over my face. I give it about 5-10 mins to bubble, then gently use my hands to rub the bubbles on my face. It is a bit harsh to wash off. I suggest using warm/hot water to wash off the product, if not, take a hot shower right after to wash off the product. The next day, I have noticed my face is less oily. It feels more hydrated. And It looks brighter. I have noticed a couple reviews saying this product is burning their skin/face. However, it is possible that they are allergic to it. I STRONGLY suggest testing the product on your arm/hand first before applying the product to your face.

reviews.review_header: Fun and face felt clean but very drying
reviews.review_text: Used this for the first time the about two nights ago and was pretty happy with the results. As soon as I put the mask on it started bubbling. After covering my face, I waiting for five minutes for the bubbling action to do its thing. I had a hard time with the bubbles as they tickled and felt like little bugs were crawling all over my face. After about five minutes (which is how long I read online to keep it on for), I rubbed it in for a about two minutes (again read this online). The mask was a very smooth, thick consistency at this point. I washed it off which took a really long time so you may want to do this before taking a shower. Overall, my face felt really clean but it was VERY drying for my skin. I will probably only do this once a week or so because of that.

reviews.review_header: Fun to use and makes my skin feel soft
reviews.review_text: This mask is so fun! Make sure to use the applicator and do not get the container contaminated with your fingers. Apply a generous amount all over your unwashed face and once it bubbles, rub it in and let it fizz up again. I have to use a wash cloth with warm water to actually remove this mask from my face. But i's really fun to use and makes my skin feel very soft and clean

reviews.review_header: It left my face feeling clean
reviews.review_text: This mask is so fun! It definitely makes your face feel cleaner and tighter, however it did not get rid of the little black heads in my pores like it claims to. I applied it to my face after I exfoliated and cleaned it, then left it on for five minutes like it says to and rubbed the bubbles in with warm water. My face definitely feels better than it did before and it was a lot of fun to put on. The bubbles stayed in place the whole time and didn't drip so I was able to do other things while I had the mask on. I would definitely recommend it as a weekly deep clean, just don't expect dramatic results.

I wish I would have paid closer attention to the description to notice that this was shipped from Korea. It took over a month to receive the product. It arrived sealed and brand new, performed exactly as described. It does have a very strong fragrant that might bother some, but it wasn't too terrible for the short time the mask is on. The bubbles feel funny but it's an overall fun product to use. My only small gripe is the clear plastic inner lid used to keep the product sealed is very hard to pry on and off. It also sometimes pops open which can cause the product to dry up prematurely.

reviews.review_header: This makes my skin look very clear & flawless.
reviews.review_text: The product itself is kind of a pain to put on and take off, but the results are worth it. Every time i use this, it clears up all my acne and makes my skin look flawless. The day after i use it people always ask me if i’m wearing makeup when i’m not. It’s that great. The spreading tool it comes with is horrible, so you’re better off using a liquid foundation brush. I will buy this again.

I'm normally not a huge fan of clay masks, but figured I should give this one a try purely for the novelty. Regardless of my skin care routine, I always have bad breakouts along my chin. I used this once and the next day the breakouts were clearly smaller and my skin was clearer. Decided to use it the next night as well, and after using it twice, the breakouts are almost completely gone and I've been receiving compliments on how good my skin looks. Even after using it multiple days in a row, I'm not having any issues with dryness. My skin feels hydrated and soft. I would absolutely recommend giving this a try! Edit: because the the carbonation, this mask doesn't keep long. I just bought a new container but had a little bit left from the one I purchased a little over a month ago. In the picture you can clearly see the difference in how it activates after the jar has been opened for short increments over a month.

reviews.review_header: Skin type normal, with some dry patches, Oily T zone
reviews.review_text: This product wasn't for me, I didn't find any changes or better results in my skin. I'm sure it might work for others. Nothing wrong with the product, I just personally didn't find it worked for me. My skin type is normal, with some dry patches, and oily in my T zone. Read other reviews and judge to see if it works better for others. I'm thinking that for Oily skin it might be a keeper.

reviews.review_header: My skin is not sensitive skin. but after apply ...
reviews.review_text: My skin is not sensitive skin. but after apply this mask, I feel so harsh and itch. I washed out after 5 minutes, my skin became so red.

reviews.review_header: Don't know that it does much for skin, but it's still a fun mask.
reviews.review_text: This mask is a fun, silly thing to do. Scares cats, toddlers, unsuspecting husbands, etc., which can definitely be hilarious. But it can be a bit of a mess, and it doesn't really seem to be super effective. I'm just not convinced that it really *did* anything, in terms of actual skincare benefits? Didn't hurt my skin, but didn't seem to help either. But it's definitely entertaining! I'd recommend this one for a group activity; it's probably not so much fun if there's no one else around.

reviews.review_header: Smells great but it sure does smell STRONG
reviews.review_text: I think the product works well but if you have even a minor sensitivity to fragrances then I would steer clear of this product, completely. It isn't just that it has a scent (a lovely one, to be fair) but it's a very powerful scent as well. I'll be giving my container to a friend that doesn't have any sensitivity to fragrances. The only reason I docked a star is because of how strong the smell was, a lighter aroma would have been tolerable.

This mask is a pretty amazing. It's carbonated! You put it on like you would a regular mask, and as it sits on your face, it starts to tingle, and you can hear little fizzy sounds. The longer it sits, and the longer is fizzes, the thicker it gets on your face. It tickles!! I have found that after it puffs out to over a half inch, you can either wash it off at that point, but I have found that if you just rub it in again, it starts the process all over. My granddaughters would use this every time they were over. I got them their own jar, and they love it

I really like this stuff. I ordered one for myself and one for my best friend. We had a blast with these because its just funny looking after its all bubbled up. Sometimes it can be a little itchy which for us just added to the amusement. I've seen an improvement in my pores since using this. If I used it more often i'm sure it would be even better.

reviews.review_header: Great product overall and its fun to use
reviews.review_text: I've seen my friends use this product before so I've decided to try it myself. The jar/container it came in was smaller than i thought it would be. Also comes with a mini spatula to help apply it on your face. It didn't really come with any (english) instructions so i just went and applied it and left it on my face for about 15 min. or until the bubbles turned into a darker color. It did take longer for me to scrub it off than other face masks/clays, but it left my face glowing and feeling tighter! My face is kind of oily and after using this, it didn't leave my skin dry, as I've read other reviews about this problem. I'm not sure how many times i'm supposed to use this product (since i know other face clays say 2 times a week) but i guess i'll just use this as many times as i want. Great product overall and its fun to use.

reviews.review_header: SO GOOD! Just apply a small amount with the enclosed ...
reviews.review_text: SO GOOD! Just apply a small amount with the enclosed spatula, wait while it bubbles and fizzes, wet your hands and massage, then rinse off. Your face is going to be soft, smooth, and glowing. It's a science experiment and amazing skin care all in one. My favorite mask!

We had so much fun with this mask. It does tickle as it bubbles. Trying to resist the urge to scratch takes some will power. It smells amazing! My skin felt a little tight after I washed it off. I found that you have to be sure to wipe the lid and close it quickly or it starts to bubble inside of the jar.

reviews.review_header: Are you Ready to Feel Ridiculous?
reviews.review_text: I'm not really sure how much this actually works because I have only used it once. But I would buy again simply for the amount of hilarity that ensues when using this. I probably laughed most of it off of my face in the process. This mask is really just plain fun. It did reduce some of my redness, and my face did feel a little smoother and cleaner after using, but come on. It's just too fun not to try it.

Love this product. When i first tried it i wasn't expecting the bubbly sensation to be so itchy. Haha! I also had to check youtube for directions on applications & steps because the package isn't in English. So by the third time i used it i knew what to do. After 5 min. of applying a generous amount & you survive the bubbling, you pat the bubbles and rub it into your face. It turns into a clay mask!! Once the clay mask is dry& you start to wash it off, it lathers into a facial wash. So cool! Face is super soft afterwards.
2nd time ordering this and it has arrived with the contents exploded. I can't tell if it is a good product or not because again still unable to use.

reviews.review_header: Wish I could read the instructions, but otherwise GREAT!
reviews.review_text: The only thing that could possibly be better on this product would be to translate the instructions/directions/ingredients? into English! Sure, it's a mask, how hard can it be to figure out? But still it would be nice to be able to read the ingredients in case your skin is sensitive to certain things, etc. However, once you decide to muddle in on your own, this is as entertaining as you may have seen on Snapchat or Instagram (my daughter and I couldn't stop laughing every time we looked at each other!) and it does wonders for the skin. We both felt toned, firmed and cleansed. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_header: Funny & entertaining, but not too functional.
reviews.review_text: No instructions in English (at least that I could find on the packaging or container). Kind of had to figure this out on my own, which of course, there's always YouTube, but usually I don't watch tutorials while I'm trying to clean my face... haha. It could be that it's user error, but I wasn't really impressed with this mask. It's fun and it's kitschy, but not really big on a wow-factor in terms of performance.

There is no transparrency with the ingredients in this product. I noticed there are many great reviews and read over the product information, to find out only natural ingredients listed. So, I think -"let's try it!" Then i received the item, and the natural ingredients were at the bottom of the list and the heaviest components of this product are chemicals ( includind sodium laureth sulfate, methylparaben, fragrance, disodium EDTA, butylene glycol). If you care about what goes on your skin, I would say stay away.

I love this mask. I love that it makes me look like a little cloud. I love how it makes my skin feel. I love that it doesn't break out my VERY sensitive skin. I mean really. It's skin care and entertainment all in one. You do have to be careful to close the plastic lid as soon as possible to keep the air out. I like to put it on about 10 min before my shower, get in, pat down the bubbles while still leaving the mask on, and rinse off the mask at the end of my shower. I follow up with moisturizer immediately after. I have recommended this mask to friends and will be purchasing again in the future. PS: As other reviewers have said, it can tickle quite a bit!! Make sure to go easy around the nose, lips, and eyes.

I absolutely love this mask. I used it for the second time tonight as an addition to my 10 step skin care routine. As it was bubbling up, I noticed that it was really cleaning my pores. After it completely enveloped my face in gray bubbles, I rubbed in the product a bit more, let it sit for another minute, and rinsed off. Make sure you really rinse it! I had some left over on my chin that I had missed, and it stung from being on there a bit too long. There are so many gimmicky face masks out there that claim to really clean your pores and I swear that I've tried them all. But this one? This one truly works. The proof is in the fact that 99% of the sebum on my nose is gone, and that a couple of stubborn blackheads on my chin came to the surface after rinsing it off. They were easy to extract and hopefully I can get more blackheads removed in the future from using the mask. The only advice I'll give you is: If you have sensitive skin, this mask stings just a bit. I think using it once or twice a week would be ideal, but DEFINITELY NOT every day! Elizavecca products have yet to disappoint me and my skin care routine has a lot of EV products in it. :)

reviews.review_header: Fun mask that works great on my skin
reviews.review_text: Really great to use and you can feel it working on your skin. What I usually do is I wash my skin with a cleanser, then I wash my face with warm/hot water to open up my pores before applying this on. You can definitely apply it on before showering and wash it off in the shower but I usually use it every once in awhile in my skincare routine. Try not to apply too much because then it will take longer to all bubble and you will have to deal with the weird sensation of it bubbling on your skin for longer. Its also a great mask to apply on with friends and take funny photos together.

reviews.review_header: Itches like crazy, but seems to clear pores
reviews.review_text: This is the craziest feeling stuff!!! Never in my life have I wanted to scratch my nose as bad as when this was foaming and fizzing. I first did this with my 16 y/o niece. We laughed and laughed at 1) how ridiculous we looked and 2) how horribly, awfully, miserably bad it itched when it was foaming. I was pessimistic that this was anything more than a gimmick, but when I washed off the mask the pores on my nose were opened and the white gunk was coming out! So I guess they really do work at pulling out the stuff. Also afterwards, my skin felt SO soft.

Amazing! This mask is not only fun...but you can feel the results instantly. The packaging is all in Korean but you can find the English instructions online if you need to. Apply a thin layer -- this is important -- as other reviews state, don't put much around the eyes or mouth or nostrils because in 3 minutes you will have bubbles! I left in on for 6 minutes then massages it for 1 more minute and then added water to massage and slowly start removing. The results were incredible. When you have it on, it tingles and may not smell the best...but once you remove it...your face smells fantastic, feels clean and hyper smooth. You can even see that your pores are less visible and overall the product works. I definitely recommend it!

I have tried so many clay masks, but this one is the best out of every single one I've tried before!!! You put the clay on your face, and it starts foaming up right before your eyes! After 5 minutes, it has taken over your face with bubbly, foamy clay! I rub it into my skin before I wash it off with warm water. After I use this, my face is SO SMOOTH and vibrant! My pores are always so clear after, so I know it gets deep down and really works. I love this product, so much I even made my boyfriend try it! Lol

This mask was fun to use. I do not believe it has any particular effect on my skin, but it gave me a good laugh. It's very... "slimy" is too negative... gloopy? It's as if there is a gelatin-like textural component in the mask. It isn't unpleasant so much as strange. My mom could only keep it on for a few minutes before the bubbling sensation drove her nuts, but I find it fine. In the end, I would not purchase this again since I don't see any different in my skin, but it's fun and makes me smile.

At first I didn’t put enough on and thought I had received a defective product. I put more on and that’s when it bubbled. Rubbed in and left on for about 10 minutes over all. Didn’t noticed immediate effects and I do have larger pores, but I will say afterwards this product did make it VERY easy to clean existing pores with a blackhead removal tool, so it really does soften your skin up. I have oily/combination skin. Best benefit after one use was definitely easy lite removal with a dermatological tool.

Very interesting. It doesn't work as well as the pictures show, unless you put a crazy thick layer. You also have to put it on really quickly because it starts bubbling almost immediately. It was extremely difficult to get off my face with cold water. I would probably recommend warm water. My face is really soft now though and you could feel a tightening of the skin while wearing it.

Wow I love this stuff easy-to-use I used it once I got out the shower my face was clean I know it says you can use it to take makeup off but that's not part of my routine so I used it on a clean face a little goes a long way I waited about 10 minutes got my hands wet and massaged it off for me it was easier for the product to come off with a wet washcloth afterwards my skin was super soft it's not a lie it's glowing and soft definitely will keep using this product love the bubbles

Even though I JUST started using this I've seen a HUGE Improvement on my skin! I tend to break out really bad during my time of the month so I washed my face with this miracle facewash and the next day all my blemishes were gone and my skin felt amazing! I have honestly never been so happy with a face wash before until this one! I only use it once a week (Sunday) after a long weekend of horrible damage to my face and my skin wakes up feeling so refreshed and feeling great the next morning. Definitely, buy it!

I really enjoy this mask. I've gotten 5 uses out of it and it isn't yet half gone. The smell is nice, the carbonation tickles a bit but no burning or pulsing, and it comes off easy. My skin is very soft afterwards. I've been using this as my fall back mask since it's nice and gentle, and doesn't cost an arm and a leg. I will say, this doesn't get my pores as clean as others but the benefits I mentioned above make it an ok trade off for me. Also my kids get a kick out of my "puffy" face.

reviews.review_header: Didn't work for me, but workes wonders for my sister!
reviews.review_text: Great product! It worked amazing for my sisters skin! Unfortunately for mine not so much, it first my skin felt soft but then the next morning i broke out like crazy! I waited about 3 weeks to retry this mask and again same problem :/ it was fun going through the process but it just doesn't work for my skin and I don't really consider my skin very sensitive...my sister on the other hand has "more sensitive skin" and it actually brings out a natural glow to her face every time she used this mask!

Honestly, I am not sure about this mask. For starters, the instructions are in Korean, so I had to google how to use it. ( you only put it on for 5 minutes at a time) It looks really cool when it bubbles, but it did not really affect my face. However, I did buy some for my roommate as a gift, and she loves it!! She uses it all the time, and said that it makes her face more vibrant and soft for a few days after. So it works for some people, and it does not work for others. It does look really cool though when it bubbles up! and it tickles a little too

I haven't got to use this product that much, but when I did use it I liked it. I have VERY sensitive skin, and I was afraid that it would irritate it, but I didn't have any problems with the first use. I also have oily skin and I noticed it did take some of the oil out of my skin. Other than how it works on my skin, the product is really fun to use. I honestly bought it because I thought it would be fun, and enjoyed watching videos about it. The bubbles feel amazing on your skin, and feel refreshing. Just an FYI, a little goes a long way, so you don't need to glob a lot on at first. Also a helpful tip, the container has a cardboard like layer under the lid that keeps the product air tight, get the amount of product you want out and then over it back up ASAP. The air activates the carbonization, and it will ruin your jar of unused product if you don't keep it covered. ENJOY!

I love this mask! It cleanses and tickles my face which is oddly relaxing. The scent is nice as well although I don't believe that it's intentional. The only advise I have to give is to not leave this mask on for longer than stated on the package. It's important to follow directions to avoid any irritation. When used properly, it will leave your face incredibly soft and fresh feeling. Definitely will purchase again.

What a fun product. Even the rest of my family tried it and we thought it was fun. My skin is sensitive and rather dry. This product wasn't overly drying and did not cause my skin any problems. Everyone described the feeling as either tingly or itchy. It was kind of itchy for me, but not overly unpleasant. It made me laugh really. It is a little difficult to wash off so I would recommend a soft cloth instead of making a mess splashing water everywhere. It left my skin feeling soft and clean. The whole tub lasts for more than 12 applications. Tip: keep this away from your eyes and don't put it above your lips or you'll be breathing it into your nose and sneezing.

reviews.review_header: I like the tingly sensation of the carbonation
reviews.review_text: I was excited to receive this item. Packaged cute. Seems to work well but for me it was a little guess work as the directions are Asian print. So there was some guess work involved. I like the tingly sensation of the carbonation. Once it foams up, I just rubbed it in and let it sit for a while. Clean up is easy. Does come with a small applicator that is helpful. Four stars and not five due to the limited directions.

This didn't bubble on me as much as it did on others, strangely enough! Sure, it did bubble and drove me crazy around my nose where I'm ticklish, but I was expecting so much sillier :P I didn't notice a huge different using this mask as compared to others, and after ordering I was afraid most of the hype was because of the bubbles. I still think that's the case, but my skin was softer after. I will update after further uses :)

reviews.review_header: I thought it might be fun for them to use at a sleep-over party
reviews.review_text: Very strange mask! I think the appeal is the carbonation as I don't feel that I get any actual benefits from using this mask. I will say the carbonation makes it very difficult to endure keeping the mask on for any length of time. It give you a tickling / itchy feeling that makes it hard to resist touching your face. I've packed it up as a gift for my friend's pre-teen daughter. I thought it might be fun for them to use at a sleep-over party.

I got this for my daughter and myself. We love using this mask. There is quite a bit of product in the little jar. We've used it 3 time each and my niece has also used it and there's still a lot left. After you apply a thin layer and let it bubble you rub it into your face, it feels nice. It is a little difficult to wash off, that is my only complaint.

I love this mud mask! When my friends and I have girls nights at my house this is our go to mud mask! It is so much fun to put on and watch the mask interact with your skin! It also works really well of pulling all the embedded dirt in your face up to the surface. Don't be alarmed if the next day after you put the mask on you start breaking out, it will clear out the next couple of days and you will be left with beautiful baby soft skin!

I've been using this for almost a month now. At first I had some breakouts, and I have read that that's normal because it draws out the impurities in your skin. Now, my skin feels and looks great. Some tips: -after about 5 minutes, rub the foam on your face again and wait around 2-3 minutes -after scooping about a chestnut size, just use your fingers (I use my 2nd and 3rd fingers of one hand) to quickly apply it on my face. -----I tried to use the plastic scoop to apply the product, but it took too long and it started bubbling before I could finish

I am disappointed at all the misleading information for this product. It absolutely does have parabens, fragrance, sulfates, etc. which they are claiming it does not have. I just received mine so I'm posting a photo of the ingredients list for those concerned about allergies.

I bought this to give my niece a special spa treat as a reward for her hard work in school. We both used it and we both love it! Not that her precious skin needed much help but it certainly had something to offer for both of our skin needs. She's 13 and really doesn't have major skin issues yet but does have some trouble with dry skin. I'm 33 and battle an unforgiving dullness to my skin as well as blackheads, dryness and a blemish now and again. Her skin was brighter and more radiant than I've ever seen it and mt skin mademe contemplate tossing out my makeup and just doing this mask all the time. Our skin is exquisitely soft after just one use and if you're lookingfor some fun bonding time with a niece, daughter, sister or friend this is definitely good for laughs as well. We both really enjoyed the tingling as it worked. Also fun to be a cloud briefly. This stuff REALLY bubbles up!

Finally got the chance to try this out after hearing so much about it....very interesting, and I can see why it is called skintertainment! I apply as a first cleanser to "dirty" skin. I know a lot of people complain about how messy it is, but I put it on and let it marinate why I go through my pre-shower rituals. I wash it off in the shower after letting it steam a bit while I am cleaning. Then on to my second cleanser. Minimizes the mess and the clean up. I use it once a week, because of the fluctuating winter temperatures, I am drying out. I can see the improvement with including a clay/charcoal step during my normal routine, and this makes it easier. No burning, stickiness, irritation to my normal/combination skin. I could definitely see my increasing the use to twice a week during the hot, humid spring/summer months. Definitely a cool way to incorporate a clay and charcoal step to the beauty routine.

I'd seen many YouTube reviewers absolutely rave about this bubbly clay mask, so I decided to give it a try. While it was fun to watch the mask bubble and foam, the novelty quickly wore off after posting a few selfies to social media. My first disappointment was that there are no included instructions... at least not in English. The mask is difficult to apply without ruining the entire batch; you must remove a portion with a clean utensil and avoid the mask coming into contact with any type of liquid or oil (otherwise it begins the bubbling process). No double dipping! Likewise, it's difficult to tell how much of the product to use, because there is no way of knowing how much the mask will foam until it's already on skin. Once the foaming is finished and it's time to wash off the mask, rubbing it in isn't the most pleasant sensation. The mask becomes an incredibly odd texture and it takes a bit of effort to remove it. The mask DOES leave one's face SQUEAKY CLEAN (literally!) but it can be occasionally drying or irritating. I wouldn't recommend this for someone with dry or sensitive skin; it was almost too much for my combination/oily skin. I'd only recommend this to someone whose skin is truly oily, or someone who really needs a deep-clean.

I cannot believe how nice this mask turned out to be. You apply it with the mini spatula it comes with, and slowly it starts to foam up. After a few minutes I wet my fingertips and started rubbing the foam down into my skin. It felt weird at first because for a minute there I couldn't get the product off my face, but once I started to wash it away it came right off. My skin felt tight after and I applied my toner with no weird reaction. My skin also appeared nice and bright so I'm very satisfied with this!

reviews.review_header: Bought for laughs but loved it!
reviews.review_text: I saw this product being shared online due to how silly it looks when it bubbles up, but I was so pleasantly surprised by how awesome it works! It comes with a little plastic applicator you use to scoop the product out and apply to your face. Don't place it too close to your nose and of course eyes as it bubbles up a lot! After it finishes bubbling (and you take pictures because it looks hilarious) you rub it in and use a wet washcloth to wipe it off. It leaves my skin extra soft feeling.

I have an extremely stressful job, so I purchased this as a way to pamper myself in addition to reduce the amount of stressed-induced acne. Well, it definitely succeeded in helping me to reduce my stress! After the 5 minutes was up after applying the mask, I looked in the mirror and cracked up! It is a super fun mask. It tickles your face, and makes it feel tighter after you rinse it off. After a few uses, I haven't noticed a reduction in the size of my pores, but I haven't gotten any new pimples! 4 stars for fun and some success, just wish it would clear out these blackheads and shrink my pores like I thought it would.

reviews.review_header: I have dry skin that occasionally breaks out with 1-2 ...
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin that occasionally breaks out with 1-2 pimples on my cheek or forehead. I was worried that a clay mask would make my skin dryer, but it actually leaves my skin feeling very smooth and refreshed. Since receiving my mask in the mail, I use it once a week after work and leave it on for about 15-20 minutes. I let it completely bubble first (which yes, tickles a lot) and then rub it in and allow it to completely dry before showering. Since using I haven't had any breakouts and have made it a part of my weekly beauty routine.

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product. My skin feels amazing after each use and overall seems healthier. The bubble do tickle a bit, but I personally enjoy the sensation! I haven't had any issues with it bubbling in the container, but I've been careful not to touch the product with my hands, only apply with the included spatula, and to rinse the spatula after applying it to my skin. I'm not sure that's why I haven't had the problem, but it's working for me! Give it a try! Of all my skin care products, this is my favorite!

I really enjoyed this mask. I have combination skin so my T zone has acne and is usually oily and my cheeks and forehead are like the Sahara desert. When I used this face mask, it was really fun and relaxing. When I washed it off, it felt clean and super soft. We're talking Charmin Ultra Soft soft. I was amazed because I didn't think my face could ever feel that good but it did. I am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend it. There is also a pretty good amount that will last a while but when I'm out, I will definitely buy more.

reviews.review_header: good product, maybe work on the packaging.
reviews.review_text: Love this product, it was really beneficial to my acne prone skin. However I think packaging needs to be improved because each time you open it and the product is exposed to air- it carbonates, and i found it to be less effective the closer i got to the bottom of the pot. Maybe sell it in a tube? Or in packets? Nonetheless, still love the product- just think that you really only get half your money's worth because of the air exposure (i used this a lot and quickly!).

reviews.review_header: Weird but fun mask that's great for blackheads
reviews.review_text: I've seen this product all over facebook and youtube and I knew I wanted to try it. It is a clay carbonated mask that's perfect for blackheads. It comes with a small spatula. It bubbled pretty quickly, so make sure to work face and start on your more blackhead prone areas of your face. I always started with my nose and cheeks but watch out that you don't put too much on your nose; the bubbles might go into your nostrils! Anyway leave it on as it instructed and massage the bubbles into your face. It is kind of hard to wash of but my skin looked great afterwards. I would sometimes extract afterwards but I usually just followed with a blackhead serum. Love this fun mask and will definitely purchase again!

My favorite skin care purchase so far! This stuff works perfectly. I don’t have very sensitive skin anyway but didn’t have any adverse reaction to this (no burning or tingling, just tickled a little). My skin has been glowing since I started using it! I’m using it about two times per week. It is kind of difficult to wash off but it’s worth it, just use a warm washcloth. If you’re curious, BUY IT NOW! It’s a steal!

reviews.review_header: I am very annoyed with this product
reviews.review_text: I am very annoyed with this product. I wanted to love it and was so excited about all of the reviews however when I received this product it was already half fluffed and the consistency of separate piecy-ness. I have looked at the packaging and noticed no cracks however I am convinced that before I received this it had been exposed to air for a long time. I tried to apply this to my face and it just falls right off. I would really like to try this product again however probably won't due to the inability to return and scared that I would get the same product quality.

I've done many masks but none like the bubble mask. It's so much fun to do, definitely different but it's actually a lot of fun to go from having a clay mask on to having tingly bubbles all over your face. You have to get used to the tingling, it makes your face itch as it's bubbling up, you'll want to touch it but don't just let it continue to bubble for the five minutes then you can rub it in your face and wash it off.

A friend and I bought this after seeing all the whacky youtube videos. It definitely foams up very quickly after putting it on, and I kept almost breathing it in through my nose and getting it in my eyelashes. I was skeptical, I thought it was probably a gimmick, but this stuff really works! I wanted to do a pore strip afterwards because it's said to soften sebum, and was disappointed when it barely pulled anything out... But then I looked closer at my face and realized most of my blackheads were severely minimized or gone completely! My skin felt very smooth, clean and tight once I took the mask off. I love this stuff. I'll probably use it once a week!

Where do I start? Love, love, love. I use this as my final cleaning step on days I wear makeup, which isn't everyday. But normally When I wear makeup there's always a new pimple(s) when I get to removing. After using this for a week, all over my face, there is a HUGE noticeably in less acne, dark spots, oil and dullness. Like, holy cow. How can something so inexpensive AND fun, be apart of my nightly regime?! A lot of people complained about no instructions because it's in Korean but this is what I've been doing because I don't know Korean either. I wash my face very well (oil cleanse, then water base cleanser) and before any toner or moisturizer I apply a thin layer of the mask on my slightly damp skin, let it bubble up and leave it on for 20-25 minutes, then I get some warm water lightly move all the foam off and massage in the rest and then I rinse off. My skin is glowing and I will definitely keep buying this! I need a larger container! Lol

reviews.review_header: This was great because the instructions are not in English
reviews.review_text: I had seen this product on beauty blogs and then the Today show did a quick tutorial/review. This was great because the instructions are not in English. :) It arrived fast (within the 2 day amazon prime window) and I put it to use right away. It was easy to apply and I left it on for 10 min. It immediately reduced the size of my pores and cleaned them out. My skin felt soft and clean. I will definitely use this product once a week and will likely extend the time I leave it on. Tip: I didn't put on a real thick layer, I kept it on the thinner side and kept it far enough away from my mouth, nose, and eyes. When it bubbles it kind of expands, so giving it space to do so is recommended.

reviews.review_header: No fumes to burn sensitive eyes!
reviews.review_text: Very kind to sensitive skin and eyes. I got some right next to my eye and expected immediate burning and watering but no fumes at all. You must be fast when applying because it fizzes up like a Mentos in a coke bottle. I looked like a zombie from Atlanta. This stuff bubbles like soap when I wash it off with a cloth. Altogether a great weekly mask. Im 53 and have oily/combo skin that is extremely sensitive...to the point of absurdity. But luckily no problems so far. I knocked off a star because I found it kind of difficult to wash off, but then I let it dry so maybe that was the problem.

reviews.review_header: Don’t recommendable if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: This clay mask is very fun because of it starts to foam after you apply it onto your skin. But the downside of this product is that after you apply it, you’re going to feel this really itchy feeling on your skin. I have sensitive skin and this product makes my skin itch so much to the point that my skin has burning/ aching feeling

This is a fun mask. I have no idea what is in it. The directions are not in English. Pretty self-explanatory, smear it on wait 10-15 minutes rinse. It's really weird because your face will bubble up like you have a bubble beard. It's kinda thick and sticky too, but not in a bad way. Leaves my skin soft, but I enjoy the bubble sensations.

reviews.review_header: This is the best face mask I've ever used
reviews.review_text: This is the best face mask I've ever used. It's great because you only leave it on for five minutes.It bubbles every ounce of dirt out of your pores. After using it, I used witch hazel and the cotton ball came out completely clean. It leaves my skin feeling very soft. The only downfall is that it tickles a lot. Keep it away from under your nose.

Really fun product! I even got my boyfriend to try it ha! Make sure to put it on quickly, as it starts to bubble soon. Also, make sure to keep the scooper clean, otherwise you'll contaminate the rest of the jar full and it will start bubbling inside the container. As to the effectiveness of it as a facial mask, I can't really vouch. I didn't see much of a difference in my skin after using it a few times. It does make my face seem a little tight though, so I make sure to use moisturizer afterword. Use the instructions listed on Amazon because it's all in a different language on the product.

reviews.review_header: Fun to try, but didn't do much for my skin
reviews.review_text: This was really fun to try, but didn't do much for my skin. As soon as you open the container the oxygen starts activating the bubbling. I don't think that matters or damages the product, but it's unsettling. I felt like I needed to really rush to get the mask applied and shut the container. It smells clean, like soap. Didn't see any change in my skin, but it fell pretty clean after using. Compared to other masks, you don't get very much product for the price.

reviews.review_header: The down side of this product is that it dried the skin around my nose out so badly it's painful. The mask did bubble as it shou
reviews.review_text: I didn't notice any difference in my skin other than the fact that it felt so soft after using it. The down side of this product is that it dried the skin around my nose out so badly it's painful. The mask did bubble as it should, but when the bubbles are on it is extremely itchy. I will continue using this but will only use it once in a while because of the excessive dryness after.

This mask is great. It doesn't irritate the skin so I think it's good for people with sensitive skin. It also lasts a while. Make sure to keep the jar covered as you apply the mask because it will react and start to bubble up slowly. Also, you want to apply the mask quickly to each area of the face because the bubbling will occur quickly. It's a great mask if you want a gentle cleansing.

I needed to really clear out my pores and heard really good reviews about this mask. I love how it bubbles the longer you wear it! You really don't need too much so do over do it like I did or it will really puff up and be hard to see! Once I rinsed it off, my skin felt clean, smooth and a little tighter. Exactly what I needed. The ONLY thing I didn't love about this mask was that it was VERY...earthy smelling. I know that it's the clay but it did bother me ever so slightly.

I love this stuff! I have combination skin, so depending on the season, my face can either be oily or dry. My face is also pretty sensitive so whenever I try new products I usually break out. With this product, I don't think I broke out as much. It made my face feel soft and clean. Works really well with taking off makeup. However, if you have dry skin, I don't recommend using it everyday or maybe even every other day depending on how dry it is. I use it 1-2 times a week. Works great for me!

This is a super fun product. It cleans out large pores well, and is fun to use. My skin always feels clean but not tight after use. I even convinced my boyfriend to do it with me. He wouldn't let me take a photo - ha! But overall, great price, mild lovely scent, feels like spongy jello, but you can put it on with the applicator provided. Also, I would suggest using it because if your wet hands get in the container it will make some of it start to carbonate. Just a tip.

reviews.review_header: A valuable addition to my skincare routine!
reviews.review_text: I ordered this on the recommendation of a friend and I just love it! I tend to have combination skin, but after using this a few times per week, it seems to have really improved both the dry and the oily parts of my face! Putting it on is an experience. It is cool when first applied, and then starts to bubble like crazy! I left it on for five minutes, and it was really starting to tickle by the end of the time period! Not in a bad way, but it was interesting, that's for certain! I washed it off and my skin felt really soft and smooth. I've noticed a difference in makeup application as well, it seems to go on more smoothly, especially the day after I've used it!

reviews.review_header: Fun, unique mask. Good for a laugh, at least. :)
reviews.review_text: Worth it to just see it puff up. Not sure if it does anything to your skin that is beneficial but it's really hilarious to see your face get all fluffy. When we opened the box though, the mask had leaked out of the container and was kind of a mess which sucked because it was a gift and it looked kind of cheap since it leaked. Luckily it was just my own daughter so I don't really need to impress her. lol She loved the mask and I loved watching her get all puffy!

I bought it for fun but then was so impressed by the cleansing power of this mask. Unused mask touches like gel and after it bubbled, you can play with it and massage it to a very sticky, mud textured mask. Althogh taking a long time to wash it off, my face was literally glowing after the first use! Never felt so clean! Also it smelled artificial but I still love the smell. Can't imagine how can I live without it.

reviews.review_header: No matter what I do this thing foams up like crazy and some ends up getting somewhere
reviews.review_text: So... this mask is weird. But it works. Make sure you have a shirt on you dont care about getting anything on and maybe a towel around your neck.Everything washes out but it makes a mess. No matter what I do this thing foams up like crazy and some ends up getting somewhere. That being said - I have been doing it every week to 10 days and feel like my skin is looking awesome. It does tickle/itch a little as it gets going but in my mind thats when its working the best.

This is just a fun product. I've tried better products but none that were as conversation worthy as this one. It did make my face feel clean and soft but watching it and showing family and friends how it bubbled friends best part. I got my sister it try it even though she was scared because her face is rather sensitive to most products. She said that she didn't like the way it felt when it bubbled up but she liked how soft her face was and it didn't cause any redness or sensitivity. That was a big win for her.

Not sure if it actually does anything, but it feels good and doesn't irritate my oily, acne-prone, sometimes sensitive skin. Plus, it's fun :) I like to use it in the shower a couple times a month. In my experience, it takes a while to rinse off, and whenever I try rinsing in the sink I just make a huge mess! It makes my skin feel fresh. I think it claims to clear pores (?) but I'm not sure if it truly accomplishes more than a pleasant sensation. Remember, your mileage may vary! Check the ingredients for anything that might upset your skin. Cheers!

This is a really fun product. I bought it for my son to use (he is just starting to break out), and because of the bubbling he gets good use out of it. The little spatula that is included is worthless, but I spoon it out on a broad rice spoon, then use a brush to apply it. Your skin oils activate it, so you don't want to dip into it with your fingers. The fragrance is negligible. I would buy it again.

I ordered this mask as mostly for good laughs...mission accomplished! I will say that my skin is a little more on the sensitive side as far as how it reacts to products. Its also more normal to dry. A day or 2 after applying the mask, my skin started to have fine bumps almost like a rash and became a inflamed. I wouldn’t recommend for dry/sensitive skin. I applied the mask with 2 other people that have oily/acne skin and they seemed to be just fine. The mask seems like it reacts w the oils in the skin because it started bubbling on their face faster than mine. Overall, I think the mask is fun to use (on the proper skin type) but it doesn’t seem to make any miraculous changes.

I honestly thought this was gimmicky, but I bought it anyway because I was intrigued and I'd heard a few good reviews. It surprised me with how good it was! I put it on with my fingers right after washing my face and leave it for around 5 minutes to fully bubble up (which tickles SO much but its bearable), and then I wash it off with lukewarm water and pat dry with a towel. My skin feels really smooth and soft after using this and It looks really nice and glowy. I almost prefer using this on lazy mornings because it makes a great flawless 'lit from within' base for makeup. I didn't notice a huge difference with blackheads, but I would guess you need to use it consistently to see a big change. Its fun, effective and fine on sensitive skin! What's not to like?!

LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! Now, I am a huge Milky Piggy fan, and their products have not let me down yet. Also consider, I am a sensitive skin kind of girl. And have been battling skin issues since I was 10, and am now 28, and I am pretty sure I have in vested enough money to buy a house in skin care products. This stuff feels great on the skin, the bubbling effect is hilarious for me to watch as I turn into a gorgan. It tightens my skin nicely, and clears it out. Just FYI be SURE to use a moisturizer after toning with this product. but a light one.

It's definitely more a product for the experience not the effects. While it does leave my skin feeling soft after washing it off, it's like many other masks quite temporary. It doesn't seem to change the appearance of my pores and I've used it several times. Though I haven't steadily used it weekly per se; it's rather a hassle to wash off so even though it's fun to see it bubble, I haven't been drawn to use it very often. So maybe if you use it more regularly it's more effective. It does tingle, but tickles primarily. I haveto fight the urge to itch my face. Also little goes a long way don't use too much or it'll get overly bubbly which may give you a laugh but you may regret when it takes you 5 minutes to wash off. I think it works better when a thinner layer is massaged in anyway. Also while you're massaging in, especially if you're slow paced, try not to leave the container open to air long. Top layer will start to react and bubble after time.

This mask is so funny and what's even better is it WORKS. It smells great and really made my skin feel wonderful! I think I used too much, since the instructions said apply an "appropriate" amount but it foamed right up and my skin feels incredible! 10/10 would recommend and I'll be trying their other products too!

Arrived 17 days after purchase and it was nicely wrapped in bubble wrap! It even came with little samples of other Korean face products. How nice of them!!! I opened the package and used to the spatula to smear the mask onto my face. It started to react right away! Bubbling away. It continued to bubble for a very very very long time... I even wiped away the bubbles into the sink... And another layer of the mask was under! And it bubbled some more!! I finally wanted to wash it off and it became the consistency of thick shaving cream (and continued to react)... It was a hell of a time washing it off LOL... SO MUCH CARBONATION! I think next time, I'm going to put a thinner coat... It'll make things a lot easier. Tips: Keep the layer thin Leave a large area around your eyes (it will bubble up and get on your eyelashes!!!) Remove the bubbles BEFORE ADDING WATER TO YOUR FACE. (Makes it easier to wash off)

I enjoyed using this bubbly mask. All of the labels and directions were in Chinese. I found that if I left it on for 10 minutes it dried out my skin. But, leaving it on for 5 minutes was great! The bubbles were fun. Like any mask it's a pain to wash off, but not more so than any other brand I've tried.

reviews.review_header: I love this cleanser for my face
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser for my face... It does tickle your skin, I put the top back on while I was apply it to my skin to keep the air from getting into it.It foams up fast as you are applying to your face so I worked quickly to get it on. But it does tighten your skin and I like how my face felt after washing it off. And yes it does last a long time I'm not half way through the jar yet.

The other reviews are definitely right about the mask tickling when it starts to bubble. I recommend a small test patch be done on your face to check for a reaction. I tried my hand before putting it on my face and my hand didn't react, in fact it didn't even tickle, but when I did my whole face it kind of tickled and itched and I wasn't able to keep the mask on too long. My face didn't break out despite the odd feeling when it bubbled. After I washed it off, my face was super smooth. No regrets. Its a really great mask if you can handle the tingling feeling.

reviews.review_header: What a fun mask! Had a great time applying this bubbly ...
reviews.review_text: What a fun mask! Had a great time applying this bubbly mask on myself and my kids-the bubbles tickle and we had fun comparing who had the biggest foam on our face. It comes with a little spatula to apply the mask but I prefer using a brush. As soon as the mask is applied, it starts to bubble, so you need to be quick when applying it. I did notice that the mask inside the jar started to bubble as well, so I made sure to cap it up quickly. I will say that it does take quite a bit of time when rinsing the mask off-the bottom layer is hard to scrub off and takes a bit of work. My face was nice and fresh feeling and didn't feel dry.

OMG this mask is a pretty good mask. When i saw this mask i had saw it from a youtuber who was reviewing this and i wanted to buy it and try it for myself. When i use it, it makes my skin clean and my skin feels soft too. It bubbles up like crazy but crazy good and fun, it does itch because the bubbles start to grow and pop and it makes me want to just take the mask off but when i mean itch i mean it in a non irritating way.The mask is not bad for the price and didn't make my skin irritated and it is not bad and i do recommend it for any one.

This is easy and fun to use. It smells nice too. It is best to use sparingly at first because it grows into a foamy glob on your face. My skin feels great after I use it, although it's debatable how much effect I actually see. On the other hand, my 12 year old son used it with me and we could tell a HUGE difference in his skin. He tends to break out in the forehead area and the morning after using Milky Piggy his forehead always looks much clearer. He's normally hesitant to use masks and such, but the foaming action makes this fun to use, even for an almost teenage boy.

This mask was a trip, but so much fun! I got it for a girls weekend of fun and frivolity and everyone loved it!!! It feels so strange but in a good way. It's definitely one of those masks you only use once in a blue moon bc it really cleans the crap out of your pores(to the point that a few of us had some redness the next day) but nothing a bomb a** moisturizer couldn't fix. Would recommend if you've been wanting to try a bubble mask. *** If you have sensitive skin I would highly suggest you pass on this one.

reviews.review_header: It is a fun skin care product
reviews.review_text: ​After I had laughed myself silly looking into the mirror, I really appreciated this product. It came in a cute box, and the applicator is a real help. It is a fun skin care product, and while I can't attest to it removing blackheads, it did leave my skin smooth and silky after application. I plan on adding this as a mask into my skin care routine. The bubbling is a unique aspect and while unsure of its purpose I did enjoy watching it doing its thing. It is a little tricky to remove as it foams like soap. Overall, a great 'novelty' skin care item

I saw a video of this on FB and had to buy it immediately. I'm actually contemplating ordering a second one right now! I like sheet masks and cool peel off masks, but hands down this is the most fun mask I own! I have moderate to heavy acne which I've finally taken a serious stance against in the past month, a big problem being that I had huge pores from always picking at my face. I wish I had the sense of mind to take a before and after shot because I saw instant results :) great to use as a firming agent and nifty defense against further acne! Also something I think would be an AMAZING gift for someone..

reviews.review_header: 3 jars later I'm still loving it!
reviews.review_text: IDK what is in this thing, but it sure as hell makes my skin feels super soft after using it! It's also really fun to wear and I consider it one of my faster masks since it activates really quick. No need to wait for it to dry like other face masks! Tip; after the bubbles have form, wipe it off with your fingers and then use some water and massage your face because the extra residue will feel like a gel face wash that's already been applied on your face. Then continue on with another face wash or just go tone/ moisturize your face afterwards.

reviews.review_header: This stuff is THAT good, you guys!
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this stuff! I was shocked how good my skin looked instantly after use. It's a little itchy while it's bubblin up though. Just means it's working. And you gatta work quick to apply before it starts foaming. That said, it's my favorite beauty product! I look like I've had a spa facial after and my skin instantly looks younger and smoother.

it was fun to use but taking it off was a pain in the bum. i had to start whipping it off with a towel because it just wouldn't get off my face. it did feel very soft after using though..maybe that was because i scrubbed all the dead skin stuff off with a towel. ill probably use it again just so it doesn't go to waist..its fun to watch bubble i scared my boyfriend with it so that was fun lol. but yeah its fun to just try it out my complaint is just trying to get it off and applying with the spatula they give you is difficult i recommend diving in with your fingers.

This mask is pretty amazing. You do have to work a bit quickly so the mask doesn't start to bubble up in your hands. When you put the mask on, it starts to bubble instantly. It does tickle a bit, but it is nothing severe. Also, it takes a bit of TLC to actually rinse the mask off of your face when you're done.

reviews.review_header: Novel for a girls night. Messy. Great cleanser, not masque.
reviews.review_text: More of a cleanser than a masque! This product is good, but the novelty is what really gets you. I was hoping this would really clear out my blackheads, no such luck. This is a fantastic cleanser though! It's IMPOSSIBLE to get off except in the shower, beware! You will scrub for 10 minutes and get it all over your mirror and sink. My ideal results were when i used it in the shower. I washed my face, then put the mask on liberally. Let it sit for as long as you can without spraying water on it, then massage (or sonic cleanse, or both!) it into your skin. If you're using a sonic cleaning device or something that rotates or vibrates, be more gentle than you think you should be. Its very foaming, but a little grainy due to the clay. I saw a reduction in oil with the clay, but you use a lot of it for the price tag. Get it for a fun girls night!

This was the most fun I've had doing a facial! I want to use it daily! It was inexpensive and it tickles when it bubbles! I'll be having my friends over for facials soon. It leaves your skin feeling very clean and soft!

I am very surprised how well this product works. I have been using GlamGlow for a few years, but I came across this on Amazon.
