I am not sure how much the carbonation really adds to this mask, but it is fun to use. My skin is slightly red right after use, but that resolves within a few minutes. My face is very oily, and this has really helped. I suggest trying this if you have oily skin. If you have dry skin, this may not be for you.

Do you love cute packaging? Do you like fluffy bubbles? Sweet smelling things, soft skin AND reducing your pores?! Try out this Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask! It bubbles as it sloughs off dead skin cells and lifts pore-clogging dirt and sebum. Its powerful nutrients also replenish the skin, softening and smoothing for a youthful glow. It tickles so much too, you can't resist giggling while using it! I think all of you guys would love it. It made our skin so soft and shiny and you can definitely see the difference in your skin before and after. I'd definitely buy this again. It's so worth it.

This was so much fun! I have been putting it on everyone's face so they can experience it! 🔅Packaging is all in Korean so make sure to save the English instructions on your phone 🔅A little goes a long way. 🔅Close it as soon as possible so it doesn't all bubble up on you. My skin was super soft and even when I used this. I think it's called "milky piggy" because it has a brightening effect. It was a bit of a struggle to get off (including blowing bubbles with my nose in the process 😩😂😂😂) But it was worth it when I saw my face! Planning on using it once a week.

I absolutely love this mask. It leaves my face feeling so smooth and clean. It tickles a little when it bubbles but I just imagine that as the dirt being sucked out of my pores. It's a fun and quick mask to do. It stops me from breaking out. Just be careful when applying near your eyes and nose because when it starts bubbling it expands!

After reading the review I HAD to try this mask. Although it was lots of fun to watch the mask bubble up on my face, it left my skin VERY dry and itchy. I could see this being useful for someone with oily skin (this is what skin type the mask is advertised for) but for someone with normal skin like myself, or dry skin, this is probably not a mask you want to add to your beauty routine.

This stuff is awesome! You can really feel the carbonation working on your skin. It has a bit of a strong tingle though, like if you were to make a mask of sprite and keep it there. It needs to be put on the face very quickly though because it starts bubbling very fast and if you attempt to put any more over the already bubbled areas it will not stick. It left my face feeling smooth, soft, and completely oil free. Did not irritate my skin whatsoever. I was very pleased and you can't beat the price!

reviews.review_header: Disappointing amount of bubbles, slight burning when applied
reviews.review_text: I saw pictures all over social media of this bubble mask and thought it looked hilarious. Unfortunately, my expectations were not met. The container comes with this spoon-like applicator to put the mask on with. Other reviews said it made their skin tingle. It made mine burn. Not so horribly it was excruciating, but enough to make it uncomfortable. It also didn't get as bubbly as I'd hoped, which was a bit disappointing. It irritated my skin and around my cheeks and nose it felt sunburned. Maybe I put it on wrong, maybe I applied too much, I don't know. I might try it again at some point and see if I have a different experience. EDIT: It's been a couple hours since I've washed off the mask and the redness has subsided and my skin feels SO SOFT, I can't stop touching it lol. Around my nose it still feels sensitive, similar to how it feels when you rub your nose raw with tissues when you're sick, but it isn't too bad now.

This is the most fun face mask ever. It tickles a whole lot during it and looks hilarious! Then when you take it off, my skin feels so so soft! I have naturally oily skin and it didn't leave my skin feeling too greasy, but also didn't leave it feeling tight either. Only downside is the directions aren't in English, but I just copied what they said on buzzfeed. Place on unwashed skin, leave for 5 minutes, rub into skin and rinse. You'll definitely want to use a wash cloth for rinsing it off though!

reviews.review_header: Get it. Like, seriously. Get it.
reviews.review_text: Hello, all. This is my first ever review and, to be honest, I never planned on writing one for anything, but then this little gem of a product came into my life, and now I have different priorities. This stuff is AMAZING. Firstly, it's just fun. The bubbles tickle your face, and after about five minutes become so large that your face looks like a cloud. I take this stuff with me to sleepovers, and make all of my friends try it, and it's a big crowd pleaser. Secondly, and most importantly, it does wonders for my skin!!! I wasn't expecting that. Yesterday my face had uneven redness around my chin, several small pimples trying to make an appearance, and overall blotchiness. I then put some of this on, waited about fifteen minutes, then went to sleep. Then I woke up this morning to a straight up miracle! My skin tone is even, and my pimples are much, much less noticeable. What kind of magic is this?!?!

More of a novelty item... it's a lot of fun to put this mask on and watch it bubble away, but I don't think it does a whole lot of anything. All the instructions are in Korean, so there's a bit of guesswork... but it's a facemask, not an organ transplant. I figured it out. This stuff does tickle a heck of a lot while it works, which is also kinda fun. My face was clean afterwards, but not remarkably smooth or moisturized. I'll keep using to see if there is any improvement. Heck, for the price, totally worth making your face look like a science experiment.

Very fun mask! Had to look up the directions (everything in the box and on the product was in Korean). Face felt clean, smooth and fresh. I’ve only used it twice. Haven’t noticed a visible difference yet. Make sure you use the spatula and clean it before putting it back in the jar so you don’t contaminate the whole thing! It was so fun my 8year old daugther and I did it together.

I'm not so sure how I feel about this product yet...I've used it a few times once a week...I don't notice anything different really...it irritates my skin a bit and afterwards it feels dry... but it is fun to use! Oh yes, I've also had some issue with it foaming up in the container also..

This is one of those products you have to try to believe. I am a huge Korean skin care convert, and I thought I would try this gem out because of the reviews, and it doesn't disappoint! Be aware that this will pull out any impending pimples you might have, so afterwards you might have a few spots that weren't there before, but with regular use it keeps your pores nice and clean so the pimples won't be there! So when you see those bad Larry zits, it's a good sign it's doing its job! (I just wouldn't use this the night before a big event or presentation or something unless you have used it a few times!)

reviews.review_header: It's fun, but it's extremely difficult to wash off.
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this. I like how it smells, and there isn't a burning sensation, just a tingle. My only problem is that it takes longer to wash this off than it does to wear the mask (5 minutes). My face does feel soft though. I wound use once a week. But I would anticipate washing it off again.

This is a decent product and worth a try. Definitely kind of a gimmick but I love that kind of stuff so that's why I bought it. I bought this thinking it would be exfoliating but it's more smoothing/purifying. It makes my skin feel soft and smooth so that's a plus. However, the texture is really weird. The bubbles tingle so much so if you don't like that I don't recommend this. It starts bubbling really fast, almost seconds after I put it on the my face. And it takes FOREVER to take off. If you have sensitive skin I don't think this is for you. But I don't, so I was willing to try this and I think this would be good to use maybe once or twice a week.

Not only is this mask fun to use, I notice a difference in my acne. I use this facial once a week, and tried it for about 2 months before making this review. I would highly recommend this for people who face blackheads, or people who have an oily T zone, or just a really oily face. This also works great as a relaxer if you've had a long day and need something to cool down with.

So much fun! My kids and I all do our mask face twice a week. And all of us have clearer skin. Will definately buy more! The amount of foam is differnet on each of us, everytime we use it. Like scrubbing bubbles. Sometimes there's extra foam, sometimes not so much. But everytime my face feels clean and refreshed. I think this brand is my favorite go-to for facial care.

reviews.review_header: Unique Skin Product. Definitely worth a try.
reviews.review_text: More gimmicky than effective. I think my regular clay mask (Aztec Secret mixed with Apple Cider Vinegar is better at deep cleaning my pores. However, this product did leave my face feeling clean and did not cause me to break out. I will use the remainder of the product, but do not think I will repurchase. I will come back and update my review after I use it a few more times and see if there are any improvements after several uses.

reviews.review_header: My face feels so clean and looks about 5x brighter!!
reviews.review_text: It doesn't really bubble though. More like a foaming effect. I was only able to keep it on for a 2 minutes because I put it on too thick and the foam started trying to drip into my eyes. After I washed it off, my face felt very clean. It also looked a lot brighter. It did seem a little dry, so I just added 3 small drops of oil to my skin and when I woke up, my skin looked better than it had in YEARS!!! No joke! I'm not sure if it was the clay mask or the combination of both but I will definitely continue to use this product as long as it's working!!

I was very concerned when I got this because the only English on the entire packaging is the part that says the name of the mask!! No instructions or ingredients in English! I had to get online to make sure I was using it for the proper amount of time. Having said that... I love the mask! It feels so funny but it removed almost EVERY blackhead that I had! My skin felt so clean afterward, too. I recommend this product!

I really like this product and it's fun 😊 I like the bubbly sensation that you feel on your face. I also see that people say it's hard to take off and to be honest is NOT. When you are going to wash your face, start by parts of your face not just rub the whole thing because than you are just spreading more bubbles all over again. Start of with your forehead and than move on to the rest of your face. That's all. Other than that i love it..

reviews.review_header: but it's certainly a fun face mask
reviews.review_text: I can't say this product changed my life, but it's certainly a fun face mask. It's a little fragrant and I don't think it'd be great for those with super sensitive skin, however, it didn't leave my face red or patchy after using it. I think it did a job and a half on the blackheads on my nose, better even than the black peely masks. My friend and I used this together and it was pretty fun.

I'm obsessed with this. It's so much FUN to use! It only takes a few moments for this to bubble, and if you let it sit for a few minutes, your face will be covered in foam. More importantly, it's effective. While it hasn't changed my overall sebum production (and nothing can), it cleans all sebum plugs from my pores on usage and keeps my skin that clean for a full day or so after. I have oily skin, so that's a long time for me! Highly recommend.

I loved the mask altogether. The bubbling effect was amusing and I loved the way my skin felt afterwards. I didn't like how careful you have to be to not activate the carbonation with the spatula. If you don't thoroughly wipe the spatula after use before getting more product it will cause the product inside the tub to carbonate. They do warn against that though. Product arrived well packaged in a timely manner and although the box was in another language they did take the time to print instructions in English and place those on the box.

reviews.review_header: Beware - test on skin before using!
reviews.review_text: This product did NOT do anything but make my face incredibly itchy and uncomfortable. It was fun, don't get me wrong for the first 3 seconds of it bubbling, but then I had to wash it off fast and then deal with a red and swollen face. Make sure you don't have a reaction to this before use!

reviews.review_header: Its a fun mask to try for fun
reviews.review_text: Its a fun mask to try for fun, especially with friends but I didn't like it for practical reasons. The bubbles really tickled my face and even though I don't need the mask on for long, I always felt the need to scratch my face. Also, I don't know if it's just me but this mask seems to take forever to wash off. It really adheres to the skin. However, my skin did feel super soft afterwards!

reviews.review_header: ... used this product once and I am already in love!!
reviews.review_text: I have only used this product once and I am already in love!!!!! I only wish the directions on my container where in English! So I used it this evening and the whole time I wanted to rub my face from the bubbling feeling. Once I finally started to massage my face with a little water I could feel the difference. My face feels amazing and it brightened my skin up so much! I look forward to seeing contributed post ice results and trying some other products from the company!

reviews.review_header: It was amazing and so much fun to look at while it ...
reviews.review_text: It was amazing and so much fun to look at while it fizzed on your face:) I will be buying it again if I run out and recommend it..... Once it starts bubbling it will be come itchy but don’t itch it!!! It’s just cleaning out your pores and while it’s doing that, it’s bubbling and that’s how you will kno it’s working..... I give it a 5 star rating and I think you should try it !!!

reviews.review_header: Fun to use with friends, bubbles, messy
reviews.review_text: Nice mask! I feel this is a thing to use before bed or with a friend. Putting it on, the bubbles start to form real quick before even finishing Applying the product and the clean up after can be messy. It's fun to feel the bubbles and my skin feels nice and clean however I don't SEE any difference on my skin from before to after No directions on the container in English
Would not buy again. The product was shipped upside down in product packaging. There was nothing really left in the tub to use on my face.....

reviews.review_header: ... rid of my forehead bumps and whenever I feel like I have under skin issue I use this the ...
reviews.review_text: I have a dry skin and this stuff works for me it's not too drying it got rid of my forehead bumps and whenever I feel like I have under skin issue I use this the only thing that I hate about it, is that it's so hard to clean you are gonna need a cloth water isn't enough

This stuff is amazing !!!! I could not wait to get it and when me and the hubby used it alll I can say is wow!!!!! First of all the packaging is so cute and the product smells good . I used it on my husbands face beard and all and he loved it and then I did mine and we left it on for 20mins and our skin was sooooo soft and brighter!!! I am in love with this product and it's a must have .will repurchase again🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗

I think mine was old. The product had leaked out of top. There was a thick gel type of goo on top that I peeled off the top of the product and then the product looked more like the mud you would expect. Then the manufacturer label on top of the box was so old and faded so bad I couldn't even read the label. I didn't use it in case of bacteria from the unsealed lid leaking. I was excited to try this because of all the good reviews, but sad to say I am disappointed and don't plan on buying again.

reviews.review_header: Not the most beautiful treatment, but really effective!
reviews.review_text: I really loved how clean my skin felt after using this mask! As you can see from the picture, it's ridiculous how foamy it gets! But that only makes me feel better about the purchase. The price is right, you should try tit!

LOVE this! Kind of strange sensation as it gets into every pore (somewhere between tickle and itch), but really does a great job getting your skin squeaky clean. Even though my skin is not oily and currently live in dry place, this is good for summer, beach, vacations to humid climates and camping - really gets every ounce of sunscreen off your skin, limited chance of breakouts. Highly recommend!

This product got a lot of hype for great Korean skincare products but honestly, there are much better products on the market. I think it's primary value was in its weird/cool effect when it bubbled up. I personally did not find this bubbling to be effective. Rather, it came off as rather gimmicky. There are much better and cheaper products that pull the gunk out of your pores.

reviews.review_header: Works well but feels itchy / awkward
reviews.review_text: This product does a great job of making my skin look clear, bright, and my pores look smaller but the itchy feeling of actually having this on while it bubbles up on your face is the reason why I won’t purchase again . A huge part of the reason why I do masks is for relaxation so I don’t really want to feel irritated and I can easily find a clay mask that does the same thing minus the itchinesss.

reviews.review_header: It's a fun experience the first time you use it
reviews.review_text: It's a fun experience the first time you use it. I just don't know if I will ever really use it again though. It takes alot of washing to get it off your face. It keeps this slippery feel for a long time. Personally it made my skin tingle and slightly irritated around the eyes. I don't have sensitive skin either so I'm not too sure what that was all about. Overall, it is a fun mask to try with family and friends but not a necessary item to have in your face mask collection.

reviews.review_header: He says it looks like we've gone moldy
reviews.review_text: I would buy this again simply because it freaks my husband out every time my daughter or I use it. He says it looks like we've gone moldy. As for the product, it is great fun to use - the novelty still hasn't worn off and the pot's almost empty - and leaves my skin feeling clean and soft. It's also not one of those masks you have to keep on for hours, which I like. My only complaint is that it's a little hard to wash off, but then it is mud.

Tried this product one time. It was a neat experience and felt pretty cool, however it made me break out. I have not had a break out in over a year and within a week of using this mask I had a breakout of 5 large, under skin pimples pop up around my T zone area and chin. My face didn't feel any cleaner or more refreshed after using the mask.

I love this mask. It calms small breakouts and leaves face feeling clean! I would suggest putting a large amount on your face then spreading with the plastic spatula provided or a mask brush you own. If you take small amounts out repeatedly (double dipping) then it causes the unused touch parts to bubble in jar.

reviews.review_header: This is fun to apply and has a nice soothing effect after ...
reviews.review_text: This is fun to apply and has a nice soothing effect after you wash it off. However, after using a few times I didn't notice any real benefits to my skin. I still got breakouts in the same places and my skin didn't seem brighter/more radiant. I'm keeping it around for fun, but I haven't incorporated it into my regular routine.

Everything is expected it to be...mined you I just slapped it on my face when it came instead of washing it first. Let it sit for 5 minutes to bubble, rubbed the bubbles down and let it sit a bit more (my forehead bubbles again, GROSS!) then rinsed with lukewarm water. It was a bit crazy to wash off bit the final product was great! My face is so refreshed feeling!

reviews.review_header: The best face mask i’ve Used yet
reviews.review_text: The best face mask i’ve Used yet! It’s clay and washes off easy! The directions are not in English but all you have to do is apply to face, leave on and let it bubble for 5 mins then rinse off with warm water and then i like To wash my face to make sure i get It all off! I could Tell a huge difference in my blackheads and how soft my face was!

reviews.review_header: Definitely not an exfoliate but baby soft!
reviews.review_text: The bubbles!!! I've been wanting the carbonated bubble clay mask for awhile and finally saw it on amazon and gave in. Goes on smooth then u can hear and feel the bubbles form. After 5 mins, rub it in, and then rise. While rubbing in it starts to form more bubbles. I think I applied too much because u only need a thin layer. I love the way my skin feels. Super smooth especially on my nose but it doesn't take out any dry acne scaring the way exfoliating scrubs do. Will definitely use this once a week if my skin needs some baby softness.

I use this only once every 2 weeks or every month since it has strong reactions in the solution and it can dry out your skin if used frequently. Since it does have some ingredients that will dry out your skin a bit, I recommend using moisturizer after, other than that it does the job. Once washing it I use cold water instead and rub off the puffy parts with water. Leave the layer of the mask on me and gently rub it around my face. Do not leave the jar open because it reacts with O2 and will release the energy needed to do the carbonation on your face. Open it, grab what you need and close shut. You don't want to waste what is inside the jar

It's fun, that's about it. Bought it for removing blackheads purpose but it removes none. It's also super difficult to wash it off completely. I have to wash my face 2, 3 times to make sure there's no residue left. Lots of reviewers claim that it makes their skin smooth but it makes my skin dry..........hmm so why am I giving it more than 1 star? I guess it's....fun! LOL

reviews.review_header: It's like a bath bomb for your face
reviews.review_text: This is the strangest thing I have ever purchased.....that is oddly satisfying. It's like a bath bomb for your face. I have super sensitive skin (especially on my face) so I was a little hesitant to buy this. I can report I did not have any skin reactions to this face wash and my skin actually looked noticeably better after using.

This is one of the best things I've ever bought! This mask is AMAZING!! today makes the 3rd time I've bought it because u ran out. I bought it several months ago and loved it so much I got one for my sister too. It feels so awesome and tingly and once its washed off my skin feels fabulous! Lifetime customer here!

I used this for the first time the other day. It went on smooth, and the bubbling was a really weird sensation, but it really felt like it gave my face a super deep cleaning! My face was a little dry afterwards and I applied my usual moisturizer afterwards. I have acne prone skin and this helped clear my face up.

reviews.review_header: Was awesome! Super fun and u can feel it working ...
reviews.review_text: Was awesome! Super fun and u can feel it working just don't get it in your eye! Leaves your skin super soft The only thing was everything was in Chinese or somthing so u couldn't read the directions or ingridients

Are you looking for a mask that actually makes your face look like a soft cloud? This is the mask for you: it makes you feel clean without the tightening aspect that a lot of other masks have. It doesn't dry out my face as much as other masks do and doesn't make my face tingle. It does when the mask is bubbling up tickle, so doing this with friends is fun because you can laugh with each other. Do not put the mask too close to the mouth, nose, eyes or when the mask expands it will enter the areas and make it hard to see\breath. Once the mask has bubbled for 6 minutes just massage your face and it goes back to its original texture; after that remove the mask. (I recommend using the mask directly before taking a bath\shower) that way you feel cleaner after taking the mask off. I wouldn't say it's extremely difficult, just can get a little tedious. Someone mentioned that this brand is also cruelty free; I couldn't find any more information about it but that is something to also be happy about while using it. Knowing that there is a high possibility that it wasn't tested on animals (especially pigs). ;)

I love this face mask! I originally bought it just for fun (which it is) it bubbles up quickly and makes your face look huge. It definitely got a lot of laughs from the family. When you apply it, you can actually hear it bubbling up. One thing I would suggest is not to apply very much around your upper lip/nostril area because it tickles quite a bit. I wasn't really expecting this mask to do much for my face. So I was pleasantly surprised at how soft my skin was, once I washed it off. I would definitely recommend this face mask, if your looking for something new in your skincare routine. Or even as a gift for someone who loves fun beauty products like this :)

I love this product! I have used this 4 times (there is still a lot left in the jar!) and I have seen results and clearer skin after each use. I have also noticed that it has brightened my skin, which is a plus. This is a really good price for a product of this magnitude. One thing to note is that it dried out my skin a little bit. I already have dry skin, so that's a factor but make sure to moisturize after each use. I will definitely be purchasing this again when I run out!

I adore this stuff! I have hormonal acne like crazy because I have pcos. This clears most if not all of it! It works well on cystic acne and helps bring it to the surface of the skin, it also helps with some black heads too! I've got my best friend hooked as well! Highly recommend ! (Plus it's just really fun!)
This was packaged very nicely! Even comes with a little spatula so you don't have to stick your finger in it! I'm giving this to my daughter as a little Christmas gift, can't wait to try it with her!

This product is so fun and useful! It really gives your face that deep cleanse you need after a long week! Watching it grow on your face is truly the most unique part about it. It is a bit itchy once you put it on for the first 3 minutes. Make sure to wipe the applicator before putting it back in the pot. It will foam up in it and ruin your mask. Also, close lid while using it because the air will make the bubbles in the pot fizz up, so be careful!

reviews.review_header: The Best Product for My Face!
reviews.review_text: I have an oily face and usually prodcuts will cut down the oils and then the next day the oils come right back. This product is different though. After one use I felt my skin feeling soft and tamed. After one week of using this product the oils on my face were under control! When using this product you use a spoon (it comes with it) to place the product on your face and then wait for it to bubble up. After some time passes you wash it off and you’re ready to start your day. I love this product and can’t wait to buy more!

Bubbly fizzy mask. It's a little bit of a pain in the ass trying to get it off, it almost gets rubber-y. Fun to try but I wouldn't buy it again just because of how difficult it is to get off, and because I have other masks that do a better job. Not a bad mask by any means though. I would recommend trying it!

I bought this as part of a “spa gift” for a teenager. She loved it! It left her skin feeling super clean and pampered! The bubbles were completely hilarious! I saw this product as part of a buzzfeed list of “cult following products under $20” I thought I’d give it a go and it didn’t disappoint!

reviews.review_header: Just for fun, don't think there's any benefits to it
reviews.review_text: It's cute, but overall I think the product is just okay. The bubbling is cute, but that's about all there is to it. Seems mostly for novelty, my face didn't feel any better afterwards, except just more refreshed maybe. There are other products that actually leave your skin feeling much better and smoother. Also, applying it seems like a hassle because of the extra led you have to seal it with.

I really enjoyed this, however, it was hard to keep on since it tickled as it foamed up. It is messy, so I used it right before I showered and washed it off in there. I noticed my skin was soft afterwards and a lot of my blemishes came to the surface the next morning. I had a couple of fresh whiteheads that surfaced so... I wouldn't use this the first time if you have a big date the next day :p The only reason I gave it four stars was because it was messy and I thought I would get a larger container of product for the price.

It felt kinda weird while it was on but not as weird as it looked! Also I'm loving the end results so I would definitely recommend! My skin is super soft and I think my pores actually look smaller....I got another mask from the same company (it had 24k gold in it for wrinkles lol) that also had great reviews. I can't wait to try it!

reviews.review_header: I'm not sure I love the product
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure I love the product. It's fun to use, especially with friends, because of the fun bubbling aspect. However, the bubbling is kind of irritating (not in the "my face is burning" way but in the "I can't wait to wash this off because the bubbles are annoying my skin). Overall I use my mud mask much more frequently

Well, I lost the box that had the English directions for use, and the tub is in Korean except for the title--so I have no idea if I used this correctly. Even then I liked it! I was really surprised when the mask started foaming almost immediately. I left it on for about 5-8 minutes; the foam was tickling my nose and I couldn't help myself. I recommend using a medium layer--I put it a little to thick on my cheeks and had some trouble rinsing it off. My skin felt so soft--I didn't even have to use a moisturizer after I rinsed. Giving note to all the other users who have large pores like I do--this will enlarge your pores for a bit. Even my boyfriend noticed that mine had distended a bit a few hours after I used it. They shrank back to a normal size by the next morning, but I won't be using this regularly because of that affect.

reviews.review_header: Not for normal/dry and or sensistive skin!
reviews.review_text: Ok I’ve only used once. My initial opinion is do not use if you have dry and or sensitive skin! It made my normal/dry skin feel like sand paper! It has an ok smell right out of the canister but then as it sits I detected a strong amonia type smell and even faint peroxide smell. It stung only a tiny bit but it did sting. I will not use again, but if your hace very oily/break out prone skin it may be perfect for you.

I am very fair and have somewhat sensitive skin and this mask was amazing for me. It did not irritate my skin at all, and when I took it off everything that you could ever want from a mask had happened. My skin felt clean and incredibly smooth and soft and my pores looked smaller. This is a miracle product

reviews.review_header: My skin feels super clean. I was expecting it to bubble as ...
reviews.review_text: Pictures out of order, my apologies. Despite some delivery issues (amazon's) this product came relatively quickly. My skin feels super clean. I was expecting it to bubble as fast and as much as it did. The directions aren't all too great. Do not use a lot, very thin amounts to avoid a messy cleanup. It tingles while it's on and kind of itches but it's not unbearable. My skin feels softer and brighter after one use. Will update review after multiple uses.

reviews.review_header: If you are wanting something fun to do with your kids
reviews.review_text: If you are wanting something fun to do with your kids.....this is it! We had a mini spa night at our house and even the hubby wanted to get involved! I was concerned because I have VERY sensitive skin but didn't have any issues after using this product. My skin felt soft and clean. My kids (2 girls, 15 & 13, and 1 boy, 9) had the BEST time with this mask. This isn't something I would use all the time.....but I am happy with this purchase and would recommend.

reviews.review_header: I bought this mask expecting it to be cool but not very effective
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask expecting it to be cool but not very effective, as I normally do peel masks and prefer them because they pull out all of the yucky stuff. This mask did the exact same thing, and I was pleasantly surprised. The carbonation felt so soothing and refreshing on my tired skin (it's been a very long week!) and my face feels just as tight, smooth, and clean as it would after a peel off mask. Another bonus, my skin was left very rosy and glowy which I don't usually get from peel off masks. I like how bright, firm, clean, AND soft this product makes my skin feel. This mask is more than a trend - by far. I will be reordering when I run out. Oh! And this mask smells AMAZING! After proper application (and using this once a week) this could easily last a month and a half with the generous amount you will receive!

Im so glad i bought into the bubble hype. This was a lot of fun to use, the smell was really pleasant, and a little goes a long way. Word to the wise: be careful applying to your upper lip. It can expand and get up your nose. LOL

reviews.review_header: Feels great, but a little disappointing
reviews.review_text: I had seen photos of this online where it was extremely foamy, but I have never had that affect. It foams a little and feels really tickly, after a few minutes it's all you can do not to scratch your nose or your face. My skin feels really smooth after I use it, but you have to use a lot of it at a time and I wish it foamed more.

reviews.review_header: Afterward my skin got tight and started feeling dry but a good face lotion cured that
reviews.review_text: Just tried it out for the first time and it left my skin feeling sooo soft! Afterward my skin got tight and started feeling dry but a good face lotion cured that. Definitely going to use again! The instructions aren't in english, but a quick google search helps with that.

reviews.review_header: This is single-handedly one of the best things in the entire world
reviews.review_text: This is single-handedly one of the best things in the entire world. I can honestly say I have no idea if this helped my face at all, but the pure joy I had from using it was worth every penny. This is something fun and different, it would be fun to have for sleepovers or just to lighten your day. I highly recommend!

I use this after an intense work out right before a shower and it works wonders. All I do afterwards is apply a moisturizer. Fair warning, it's pretty thick, so if you aren't taking a shower after, you'll be in front of the sink for an extra minute or two. Also, it starts to bubble almost immediately, so apply quickly and give yourself enough space around the eyes and the mouth because the bubbles expand a little bit.

I purchased some of this off Wish, and received a damaged, subpar product. Immediately, I ordered this off Amazon and I wish I would have done that from jump street. The mask carbonates quickly, and is loads of fun! The only thing I don't like is that it's very thick and slimy when you wash it off, but really, that's fairly typical for a mud mask.

Love this product! I just tried it for the first time. I have rosacea, combination skin, and large pores. This product did not make my rosacea worse. It actually made my skin feel very smooth and my pores looked clean. I think this product is great for deep cleansing. The only negative I can think of is it's slightly itchy as it bubbled up and it took long to take off. But I will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_header: This is definitely one of the most fun masks I've ever used
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of the most fun masks I've ever used. A really great product to use for a little girls spa themed birthday party or a for a fun sleepover! There's two minor cons though: 1. You have to put it on REALLY thin. The bubbles get WAYYYY more inflamed than what you would imagine. If you don't put it on thin the bubbles will eventually grow out so large that it will close around your nostrils and then your lips and eyes. So be careful! 2. Even though it made my skin feel kind of soft it didn't really.. "do" anything for my skin. I feel like it's more of a fun/wacky type beauty product.

Opened the package and there it is, the clay mask that I've been waiting for. But that's not all. I also got some free Etude House lip tint and Lioele BB cream samples. I have to wait until I try the product to decide if this deserves another star. Thanks Jolse! <3

This mask is really fun and has a cool bubbling effect. It is a bit time-consuming and difficult to wash it off though. Also, it starts to semi-bubble in the container after it has been opened which is a bit weird. It leaves my skin feeling really smooth and clean after though, which is awesome!

reviews.review_header: I must have got a bad batch
reviews.review_text: There were ZERO bubbles. I was so excited to receive this because the one I really want is super $$$ and I was happy to read the positive reviews for this item so I decided to try this. However, there was no carbonation when I used it. Very disappointing. What's worse is it can't be returned...

I love this product! The only reason I give it 4 stars is because it takes a little longer to wash off than other face masks (it bubbles up quite a bit). Which I know, is the point of the product to bubble, but I didn't think it would take longer to wash off. The scent is light, and I didn't have any "instant" bubbling once applied to the skin, it took a while (which was nice, made application less messy). Overall I really like this product! It's a nice little mask to do a "quick pamper" with. Just make sure to steer clear of the eye area!

I am really in love with this product when I first started using it it tickled but then I got used to it. I use it two three times a week but usually before I shower so it's easier to wash off. It leaves my face nice and soft. I will be order another soon.

reviews.review_header: It feels funny, don’t apply too much clay
reviews.review_text: I used it on my unclean (make up on after 15 hours working) and dry face (not wet) and applied the clay for 5-6 minutes, then washed my face with warm water. At the end, my skin was totally clean... absolutely clean, kind of dry too. It feels funny, don’t apply too much clay, It could go into your nose and eyes... Lots of bubbles.

Looooooove, love, love, love. Yeah, just in case you weren't sure, I really like this mask. Application is easier than other carbonated clay masks I have tried. Some tend to be crumbly and messy and foam up instantly. This goes on like a thick paste and then takes a minute to start bubbling up. Hee, when it does you'll look like a troll because it rises so much that your face week look massively swollen. After lathering and rinsing off; however my face was smooth and glowing, and my pores were practically invisible. I can't recommend this highly enough. Love it!

reviews.review_header: Was not as impressed as some reviews made it seem ...
reviews.review_text: Was not as impressed as some reviews made it seem to be. I used the entire jar and did not feel any improvement in my skin. The bubbling does tingle a bit but nothing that is uncomfortable. Maybe if I stuck with it longer I would have noticed a change, still worth a try.
I tested the product on my hand before use on my face. The scent isn't overpowering like most clensers. Made my skin EXTREMELY soft and brightened it. Would recommend to anyone.

I love buying new beauty products. I had been seeing this mask advertised a lot. I especially love Asian skin care products. This mask is a good size amount for the price. It is a different consistency in that it has a weird feel to it when air touches it. It goes on really nice but you have to be quick about putting it on because it instantly activates with the air. Once it goes on it feels like it is removing your dead skin tissue and impurities in your pores. It's not overly fragrant and the results are amazing I love this product

reviews.review_header: The bubbles are super fun too
reviews.review_text: Since I've started using this mask my skin has shown a noticeable difference! My skin seems smoother, my pores are smaller, and my skin is less oily during the day. I use it about every other day or so and it's a welcome addition to my skin care routine! The bubbles are super fun too! I will absolutely be ordering more.

This product is fun and leaves the skin soft and smooth but I have dry skin as it is and it made me even drier. I put tons of jojoba oil and moisturizers on afterwards and I was still really dry and flaky after using this. After a few days my skin went back to normal so I tried it again a week later and it dried out my skin again.

Face looks like a cloud and when you look in the mirror you will be unrecognizable. It's hard not to laugh when you have this mask on. Be careful not to put too much near your nostrils as it can block your breathing once it starts getting poofy. My skin feels sooo much softer afterward and I swear it has helped with my blackheads.
I just got mine in the mali today an Omg I love it !! It works great!!! I'll get another one when this finish.

reviews.review_header: Leaves face smooth but not for pimples or blackheads
reviews.review_text: This face mask was a present for my sister and we both use it and love it. I have so many face masks at home, but this one is the most fun and unique. It does not work as well as other high end face masks, but we use it when our friends come over for fun. The mask left our faces smooth and clean, but did not reduce pimples or blackheads. I would recommend this product for anyone who wants to have fun with a group of friends or is looking for softer skin.

reviews.review_header: Fun and cool except for the strong smell.
reviews.review_text: Lots of fun but it does have a very strong perfume smell that could be hard for some people to handle. I love that it came with a little spatula so I don't have to worry about making a mess on my fingers! It was super fun and even my son enjoyed poking the fluff! 😂

reviews.review_header: sisters and roommates all love it. I will mention that it is quite ...
reviews.review_text: I purchased it for me and my roommates to try. Between the three of us we each have very different skin types. I was worried about trying a clay mask because my skin is so sensitive. However, this is gentle enough to use once or twice a week without drying out my skin and clears up the top layer of dead skin and junky pores. My mom, sisters and roommates all love it. I will mention that it is quite difficult to wash off after it bubbles due to its thick consistency. This is not a drawl back for me, but it is worth mentioning.
It makes my skin dry and itchy. Don't recommend for sensitive skin
Love love love this. Makes bad days happy again with all the bubbles

Man, I love this mask. I have pretty sensitive, acne-prone skin so I’m really careful about the products I use. I decided to give this a try based on other people’s reviews, and I am not sorry! It smells great, only takes 5 minutes, and after I use it my skin feels amazing. My skin tone evens out, my pores look smaller, and I feel like I can go without makeup and not scare away little children. I have six sisters, and I love this product so much I bought one for each of them for Christmas. I’ve almost used all of mine up and I will absolutely be re-purchasing.

reviews.review_header: Seems more gimmicky than anything else.
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried this a few times and my face was pretty dried out after. To the point of flaking in areas. Didn’t notice any improvements in my skin. It tickles like crazy as it bibles up larger and it’s a pain to tones off. I got a refund. Would not recommend.

We used this in a YouTube video. I was shocked that it actually does bubble up on your skin. I buy foaming facial wash to lift dirt out of my pores, this is just like that but better because it starts out as a clay that packs into your pores and then lifts the dirt up into a sudsy bubbly texture.

This mask is very interesting! I've never had a bubbling mask before, so I was very surprised when it started bubbling quickly on my face. Warning: It can bubble pretty intensely, so apply it conservatively around the nose unless you want to either have stuff going up your nose or tickling it so that you sneeze, haha! I found that leaving it on for 5 minutes is the perfect time, and make sure to apply it quickly because it starts bubbling immediately so if you want to add more onto your face, you may disturb the other bubbles. I recommend it!

Oh my foaming fizzy bubbles upon bubbles upon bubbles mask. Lol seriously it's hard to get it all off it just keeps foaming. I really honestly think thisis for philly skin types only it really really really does your skin out. I worked not purchase it again.

This does absolutely nothing for your skin. When I put it on, it began to foam up. When I washed it off, my skin felt almost water-logged and rubbery. So weird. People are commenting saying the mask is "fun." I guess it is since I've never seen a mask foam up like this one, but shouldn't the mask also do something for your skin?

I mean... it does what it says, I guess. Something few other reviewers noted it is how itchy it is when it’s foaming on your face, ugh. I’d rather just use another bentonite clay mask, or the Yes to Tomatoes Charcoal clay mask, which is my go-to. Fun for novelty purposes, I guess, but one use was unfortunately enough for me.

reviews.review_header: I’m really impressed and I recommend it!
reviews.review_text: Now I’ve seen a lot of beauty gurus talk about this on YouTube but I thought it was just a fun weird trend. But I’ve been looking for a new mask since I have really sensitive skin and most good masks are too active in their ingredients my skin breaks into a rash. But THIS mask, my skin has never felt cleaner and smoother!! I absolutely recommend and it’s so affordable.

I can't stress enough about how amazing this product is. I work in a very nasty oily environment, and I breakout all the time. I've used several different types of masks, and other products. This right here is the best one. It's not expensive either!!!

I'm nearing the end of my second jar. I love this product! I don't know if it pulls out any impurities? But It does make my face SUPER DUPER baby soft and glowy after I use this. It has a light floral sweet green tea sent to it. The only con is its a bit tricky to get off. My pro tip is with a light finger I scrape the bubbles off and with lightly dampened fingertips and massage the product all over my face then rinse it off. If there are any particularly stubborn patches I'll use the little spatula that it comes with to scrape off the scraping the excess mask.
No t disappointed! It's fun, smells good and leaves your face soft. Apply as is, wait 5 min and then rub into your skin. It turns into a mud mask and rinse.

reviews.review_header: ... have never really known what a tickle would feel like on my face until i tried out this product
reviews.review_text: I have never really known what a tickle would feel like on my face until i tried out this product. It's so much fun and makes my face feel clean and soft afterwards. I ran around my house the first time I tried it because the tickling sensation on your face is so different and you can see the foam form on your face like a shield. My boyfriend thought I was lying about the tickling until he tried it too. HA, but he agrees that his skin incredibly clean and soft afterwards and we now use this product at least once every couple of weeks.

Very fun to use! Be careful and leave plenty of space around eyes and nostrils because it gets VERY puffy lol. It does a good job of clearing dirt from your skin as well. Make sure to read instructions and not leave container open for long because oxygen is what causes it’s foaming reaction

A nice skin cleaning product.. It gently but thoroughly bubbles away unsolvable skin issues with a single use. It does tickle the nose if it gets too close so keep a tissue handy, the rest of the face is gently tickled as it works too but it is not unplesant!.

reviews.review_header: A fun mask that really works!
reviews.review_text: I like this mask. It did make some impurities much easier to pop out. Just took a little touch and a clogged pore came out. The mask was silly, and fun to do on a stay at home pizza night with my husband. I would probably buy this again when I run out. The tingling was a little much, but not be able to itch it was part of the fun!

reviews.review_header: I would not recommend. I have sensitive skin and it made me ...
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitive skin, I would not recommend. I have sensitive skin and it made me break out on my cheek. It didn't burn or anything while I did it and it was "fun" to see the bubbling. BUT the next day I got multiple red irritated blotches on my face that looked like a rash. My friend doesn't have sensitive skin and he had no issues whatsoever after using it.

reviews.review_header: ... once after seeing a youtube video because I am easily manipulated into buying products I don't need
reviews.review_text: I used this once after seeing a youtube video because I am easily manipulated into buying products I don't need. It was incredibly messy and I didn't notice any difference in my skin. Totally NOT worth it.
My face has never felt so soft and clean before! I could tell a difference in my pores right away! Plus watching my husbands reaction to the whole process was priceless!!

This mask is quite the experience! I like to pull it out when I have friends over! It bubbles up just like it says and then you get to have the pleasure on smushing it down! It is a bit difficult to rinse off, you just have to be patient. My skin does feel refreshed afterwards, but I wouldn't say it causes any dramatic changes.

Love this mask! It's easy to use - simply apply a even layer of clay to an unwashed face using the application spatula and allow to bubble and clarify pores for five minutes! Then rub and wash off with tepid water. It cleaned my pores, leaving them looking tiny and my skin feeling super soft. It's also just a fun mask to use - it doubles in bubbles and absolutely tickles! And unlike other clay masks, it isn't super drying. I use 1-2/weekly as part of my 10 step Korean skincare routine and I love love love it!

reviews.review_header: Left pores smaller, skin clean and soft
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! It is clay based, and does a good job removing oil and impurities, it also made my pores look smaller and my skin feel smooth and soft. After you open it, I recommend scooping some out for your face, then replacing the lid quickly before taking the time to spread it on your skin, as it will start to bubble up even in the container. You can use this mask before or after washing your face, leaving it on for about 5-6 minutes before rinsing it off.

It leaves your skin pretty soft afterwards but i only did it twice, dont know what else it can do for you. Its close to impossible to wash off. I tried with water, it just made it slimier and harder to take off. I had to scrub it off with a towel, which left my skin pretty irritated afterwards. Literally spent more time taking this off than i did with the actual mask.
Super fun thing to do! It tingles a little bit and it left our faces soft but also left behind a slightly sticky feeling. You don’t need much on your face, a thin layer will do the trick.

It's tingly. I love the way my face feels after using this product. The smell isn't bad but it's not pleasant either so it loses one star. I don't particularly care for the consistency either, but the effects are incomparable. I will probably buy this again and I recommend you try it at least once, but if you do make sure you put something else on your face after, the smell isn't strong but it leaves an almost unnoticeable vinegar like aroma... Almost.

OMG I love this stuff. I have to keep it in stock and part of my skincare regimen.You can even put the mask on over make up and it takes it right off. It gets really foamy and sucks the stuff out of your pores. Leaves my face so smooth. soft, and clean. I tend to be very dry and have to avoid some harsh products like scrubs, peels, or charcoal masks. This one is gentle but effective and doesn't dry me out.

reviews.review_header: The most fun you can have with a face mask!
reviews.review_text: I mean, it's a carbonated bubble mask. Are you really buying it for its amazing quality? No! You're buying it to have fun! And yes, it sure is fun! Give it a shot and buy it if you're curious! While I wanted to give it 5 stars, I had to give it 4 because of one thing. I must have gotten some mask in my wet hair while using it, because I woke up the next morning, and my pin-straight hair was super frizzy! I've never seen my hair do that before, and it weirded me out.

reviews.review_header: When it arrived there was the mask all around it and it wasn't clean and good when it arrived
reviews.review_text: This product is difficult to say the least. When it arrived there was the mask all around it and it wasn't clean and good when it arrived. When I applied it on my face it was ok, it did bubble. However it's really hard to apply it all to your face fast enough without contaminating your jar. It tickles your face and makes you want to scratch it. Washing it off is a little difficult and nessy as well. It left my face feeling ok. I think I was more excited for this product than I should've been. I wouldn't want to buy another one after this one is gone

This is so great! For anyone who has concerns about this... DON'T listen. I'm really not sure how the product is supposed to help my skin, but this is honestly so much fun to put on and watch as it forms into a big cloud. It's a little hard to take off, so make sure you have a towel you can spare (the product does wash off). Also, I've there is a LOT of product in here, so it's perfect for some type of sleepover face mask.

I have never had a face wash that I enjoyed using. This one was awesome! It went on easily with the little spoon provided and it bubbled up to give my face a nice sensation. I also liked that there was an additional step after it bubbled up to further massage the product into the skin. The only downside is that it can take some time to wash off, but it's not enough of a reason for me to give less stars! It left my skin feeling and looking great! Let me note: I have sensitive skin and it did NOT bother me one bit!

This product has hydrogen peroxide in it and it WILL bleach your clothes. I was rinising my face after using the mask and water got on the sleeve of my favorite long sleeve shirt. It turned it from teal to a pale yellow color so be aware. The product dried my face out more than would like for it to have. I felt like the tickling of the mask was unnesscary to point it was uncomfortable. I recommend Younique’s detoxifying mask. It is a much more gentle mask on my skin. The results I got from that mask where twice what this mask gave me and it doesnt bleach my clothes.

reviews.review_header: but she seemed to like it a lot
reviews.review_text: If my daughter wouldn't be too embarrassed I would post a picture of her using this mask for the first time. It was hilarious! Hard for me to judge the actual quality because it is one of many items used in her overly-complex facial regimen, but she seemed to like it a lot.

This mask is so much fun and made my skin feel great. Just as I thought it was done foaming, I went to look in the mirror and it was still going. I seriously looked like squidward in that one episode of spongebob lmao! My skin felt amazing afterwards and made my pores look invisible. I absolutely love this mask!

reviews.review_header: I finally know what it feels like
reviews.review_text: Decided to purchased this from all the hype. The application process is actually kind of fun and so it the waiting process. It foams up pretty quick, so you'll need to be fast with the application. However, the fun stops there. It's a pain to wash off. After the first use, you might think little goes a long way, but it doesn't. Good for an one-time purchase to see what all the commotion is about, but wouldn't purchase again.

reviews.review_header: I purchased it on March 31st and received it on ...
reviews.review_text: I purchased it on March 31st and received it on April 6th. The directions were in Korean so didn't know how long to keep it. I applied it and left it for 10 minutes it was all bubbled up or so I thought and when I started scrubbing my face with it there was still some clay under it so I left it for a while longer and when I felt it was all bubbled up I scrubbed again and it was very difficult to scrub it and when I tried washing it off that was difficult as well. And I didn't see it do anything to my face other than making it soft. Maybe if I keep using it there will be progress.

I give this three stars for a couple of reasons. 1, there are no instructions in English! I totally get that it's not an American made product, but if you're going to sell to other countries, at least put instructions in the package with the language. So I had to turn to Google to figure out how to use it properly. Don't get me wrong, Google was helpful, but you don't really know if you're getting 'what worked' for one person, as opposed to the actual instruction. 2. It burned my face! I I do not have sensitive skin at all, so I was surprised when the sensation went from the typical tingling/tickle of the bubbles to full on 'OMG I have to take this off immediately!'. All in all, I'm actually being a little generous with the 3 stars. I've used the product twice now, with the same results. I will probably toss the almost full container and try another product.

What can I say about this product. It is AMAZING! The mask really pulls out all the dirt and impurities on my face, but does it super gentle. I can't say enough good things about this product! It feels a bit weird at first, but you get used to it. Be careful when applying the mask as to not get to close to your eyes or mouth. Since the product does "expand" on your face, leave a little extra room for this! Other than that - this product makes my skin feel amazing!

Fun but doesn't do much. I do facials often and have tried many types and brands. This one was by far the most fun. I got it for my teenage daughter. We had a nice laugh and a moment of bonding so that was worth every penny. But my skin....meh, did very little if anything at all
Loveeeee this product ! It's fun . Just move quickly when applying . And keep a lid on it so it doesn't go to waste snap chat -ibrownskinnx

reviews.review_header: This mask is extremely fun to use
reviews.review_text: This mask is extremely fun to use! It bubbles pretty quickly, so you want to keep the oxygen seal inside the packaging. I find that it's easier to spread with my hands than it is with the little applicator it comes with. It is messy though, so I would suggest using it before a shower to wash it off a bit easier. Definitely recommend this product and definitely suggest having fun on snapchat with it :) PS: if your skin is extremely sensitive (like my boyfriend's was) and you can't handle tickling or tingling, do not use this mask!

reviews.review_header: I absolutely love this bubble clay mask
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this bubble clay mask! I use it once a week. I started off by removing my makeup with regular makeup wipes, rinse my face with cold water, apply this mask all over my face (avoiding eye area) with my fingertips, I leave it on for about 45 seconds and then I rub it all over my face with my finger tips for about 1-2 minutes and I rinse it off with temperature water. It leaves my face so soft and it looks so healthy after cleansing off. I'm currently running out of my first jar, purchasing my second jar today.

reviews.review_header: It was a cool experience, but I have sensitive skin and it ...
reviews.review_text: It was a cool experience, but I have sensitive skin and it made my skin burn during and after removal of the product. I probably wouldn't use it again just how my skin felt afterwards. I don't suggest for people with sensitive skin.

This mask makes me laugh!!! What a fun, quirky mask, great for friends or even yourself! Only negative thing I have to say about this mask is when the bubbles start to build on your face, it becomes extremely itchy so fight the urge to scratch! Also, there's a mini applicator located on the seal when you open up the top, which helps tremendously!!! Make sure you don't miss it!

I like the way this bubbles back up after putting it on. I feel like it just keeps on cleaning when it does this. When you look in the jar, you can see the burst bubbles. Afterwards, my skin is not at all dry, unlike some clay masks. Then I put some argan oil on my face and it looks and feels terrific.

reviews.review_header: One of my favorite AB products
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite AB products! A little of this mask goes a LONG way! Be especially careful applying around the eyes, nose, and mouth--as even the most minimal amount of product produces an ENORMOUS amount of foam! Some users complain that it is difficult to wash off...but with warm water and a soft wash cloth--I've never had any difficulty!

reviews.review_header: I question the authenticity of the product that I recieved, it does not "Bubble" or "Foam" the way that it's supposed to.
reviews.review_text: I think my product was fake, the packaging looks ok but it definitely does NOT bubble at all! Disappointed.

Love it! I didn't really see a big difference in my skin's appearance but it felt incredibly soft and velvety. The bubbles start forming almost right away so you have to be quick! It was a fun time, no complaints.

Saw a video on FB promoting this product. It is a manageable price so I wanted to give it a try. The clay is thick and is applied with a little spatula. At first, you anticipate for something to happen and as you are almost done the clay begins to bubble! It's an interesting sensation but I thought it was great. Definitely a little tickly around the nose but my skin was nice and smooth before bed. I did not experience any irritation and or redness. Will definitely implement 1-2x a week. The only downfall is that the instructions are not in English so I had to google - no biggie!

Tried it and it works! It does tickle some so if you’re really sensitive, it might be a deal breaker for you. When it was done, my skin felt really clean. It also felt a little tight but that’s becuase of the clay. A little moisturizer after and it felt amazing.

I love this mask!! It is so fun and leaves your face feeling clean and refreshed (no residue or squeaky feeling). The only reason I don't give it all five stars is because while it's on it does make you want to scratch your face, it was a relief to get it off and rub my skin. Other than that, no problems, didn't irritate or break out my skin and its super fun to look at!

reviews.review_header: Love it! No break outs thus far
reviews.review_text: The Bubble Clay came with a scoop and was sealed properly. I would advise to use the scoop and not your fingers; to prevent from contaminating the product and causing your jar to bubble. Avoid placing it so close to your eyes and nose because it does bubble and expand. You don't want to breathe it in. It tingles a little bit. Once it bubbled I massaged it thoroughly around my face then rinse. The texture is very slimy, took me a while to fully wash everything off. It left my skin very smooth and hydrated. Love it! No break outs thus far. My skin is combination.

reviews.review_header: Don’t spread too thick or it may clog your pipes...
reviews.review_text: Daughter likes the mask - parents not so crazy about having to remove a rock of hardened clay from the sink drain pipe. Thankfully, we were able to clear out the mass of clay without calling a plumber or this would have been one expensive face mask.

I have pretty large pores, nothing too insane, so my blackheads can be very visible. After using this mask, my pores were pretty clean! It didn't completely wipe out my blackheads, but still did a pretty good job. I like that it came with a little spatula to apply the product to your face which made the process easier and allowed me to apply the product more evenly. What I didn't like about the product is that the smell can get a little funky and that the foaming action (which is cool) can tickle your face and it irritates me a bit, lol.

reviews.review_header: Nevermind the healing qualities of this product. This is ...
reviews.review_text: Nevermind the healing qualities of this product. This is an experience in a jar you absolutely must do with friends. Need to laugh? You will not regret a girl's spa night or an at-home date night with your spouse. DO IT. You will thank me.

This stuff is wonderful!! I'm not quite sure why people are complaining about the smell, it smells like a face mask lol and it does not get rid of your blackheads, but it does make it easier to remove them. It does seem to help with breakouts and makes my skin so smooth! Just me sure to moisturize after! I recommend that after you put some on your face, wipe the spatula with a towel to remove the oils from your skin. This will help prevent the container foaming up and becoming useless!

This stuff is a miracle! I have been using this for months and I love it! I immediately notice clearer skin the moment I wash it off and the day after compared to all other masks I've used in the past. You look like Squidward when the bubbles expand but its fun! I LOVE THIS STUFF!!!!

LOVE THIS MASK! Hands down the best mask I have ever used. I am a Murad girl and have added this to my regime several times a week. It is so much fun and feels amazing. FINALLY something that actually clears my pores. Bye bye blackheads! I have: -combo skin -large pores -sensitive skin -30 to 35 age range

I am really impressed with this mask! I honestly bought it more for the novelty of it, but I’m pleasantly surprised by what it’s done to my skin. I’ve been using it once a week for the past three weeks. I changed my makeup and moisturizer around the same time so i honestly wasn’t sure what was causing my insanely dry skin to be so supple and smooth. My friend was over last night and showed me a video of the mask on Facebook saying she wanted to try it. So we used it again last night even though i just used it Sunday, and i can now say for sure it’s the mask helping my skin. Buy this mask. It’s fun, quick, easy, cheap, and effective.

I have been using it for a month now and can say it is a very good cleansing mask for sensitive skin. I use it twice a week and it is perfect for my combination skin. I give it 4 stars only because it doesnt help to reduce blackheads on my nose, so I am not sure how it will work for very oily skin. Other than that I am happy and will repurchase.

I use this right after I take my makeup off. It tickles more when I use after taking my makeup off than any other use. MAKE SURE TO COVER IT WHEN YOU'RE USING IT. It WILL start to bubble up in the container. Also, try not to use too much in one go. You'll look like the blueberry girl in Charlie and the Chocolate Factory.

My fiance has used this mask a few times, and found that while her skin feels soft after use, it hasn't really improved the quality of her skin. She only experienced a mild tingling and did not find the mask uncomfortable in the least bit. We can't really see a reason for purchasing again after this container runs out.

Bought these for my cousin's birthday and she had to stop using it after the first application due to her breaking out and having a burning sensation from this product. Not sure what ingredient would cause this, but beware.

I bought this product for my grand daughter and i. The purpose was to introduce her to facials and this one fit what I was looking for. It needed to be fun yet effective, as it was the introduction to facials for her. We enjoy this product because of the foamy look it achieves and our skin is so soft after.

This mask works surprisingly well for how quick and easy it is. It's really fun, and actually cleanses too, which was a surprise for me! I particularly love this mask because I literally only leave it for 5 minutes. It's easy to tell when it's done too, because that's usually when the mask foams up so much that I can't breath through my nose anymore LOL!!

This mask is fun to use on a girls night. I love how it makes my face feel after. Other than hydrating a didn't notice much difference and it lasted maybe 5-6applications. You have to make sure the lid is on tight or what's left will bubble in the jar.
It didn't clean any better than any other face mask - and was hard to rinse off. However the fun we had doing this made it 100% worth it. 10/10 would buy again!

Bubbly and airy, this mask feels ticklish and is definitely an unique experience. Even after using this 5+ times, I still am surprised when the face mask starts rising and the bubbles just keep growing. After deflating and washing off the mask, my face is left feeling clean, soft, and oddly, not dry and parched. I really love the slight glow it gives my skin and enjoy using this twice a week.

reviews.review_header: If you like clay masks, this is one to try!
reviews.review_text: Bought this during the bubble mask craze as a bit of a joke to share with a friend, but turns out there's a reason why the Elizavecca Milky Piggy Bubble Clay Mask is voted as one of the best on the market: it works! While the initial use is a bit messy compared to your average clay mask (I'm a big fan of Origins Clay Masks and don't find it falls off or cakes. The Milky Piggy did have a little bit of fall away product when it reached maximum bubble), the results - I think - are better with the Milky Piggy mask. My skin felt soft and supple after using it, and not at all dry. Will repurchase again.

I bought this because I saw an article in Buzzfeed about it. It’s super fun to put on and watch your face bubble and grow into a cloud! Other than that, I don’t notice much of a difference. My face doesn’t feel any cleaner than before.

Like everyone else, I gave into peer pressure and got the mask! Yep I'm easily swayed by Internet beauty articles... The downsides...English instructions not included, had to read Amazon reviews for those! Specifically "Joey" from March 3, 2016. I agree with others this mask has the torture itching factor! But overall a great and fun mask.

HOLY WOW. THIS CREAM IS AMAZING!! My skin has literally never felt younger, fresher, cleaner, etc. I'm not even exagerating, my face has LITERSLLY never felt so clean and fresh. The bubbles happened faster than I thought which made putting the cream on a little more difficult. I know I'll get used to it when I do it more often, it definitely didn't affect my satisfaction or anything positive. SO HAPPY!!!! BUY IT!!!

reviews.review_header: Do not use if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: This mask made my face burn while on and after removing, my face was red and puffy. Gave me bad dry skin and then even more breakouts. Only good thing about this mask is that it fun to use, but is hell for sensitive skin.

This is easily my favorite mask ever now! I've been using it twice a week. It's soo bubbly and tingly. It really has helped improve my skin. I wish I could read the manufactures website to try other products <3

I have been obsessed with skin products since I was 13 and have always made my self a skin care regiment for the week . This mask was delivered day before mask day! So this morning I tried it and I absolutely love it . You apply it and instantly feel your pores open and breathing . It almost tickles so keep yourself busy! I washed it off and my pores were noticeably smaller, my skin looked brand new ! I will absolutely buy again and again! This is awesome

reviews.review_header: Mask that bubbles! So much fun.
reviews.review_text: Such a fun mask. As soon as you put it on your face it starts to slowly bubble up. Face feels really ticklish but bearable. Once the mask has reached maximum puffiness, I smash the bubbles down and massage it around my face. It takes a lot to wash off but skin feels very smooth after. Not sure if it's making a huge difference to my complexion but I like the mask overall.

reviews.review_header: This product is effective and fun to use
reviews.review_text: This product is effective and fun to use. It's a little bit messy, and you have to make sure you do not touch the mask in the bottle with your hands or it will start oxidizing. It did not cause any sting, any I have sensitive skin. My only concern is it was a little bit hard around the eye area, even when I did not apply it near my eyes, when it swelled up and had bubbles, it almost touched my eyes.

So fun~ My face always feels really clean afterwards. I know that this is a mask itself, but this is an excellent pre-facial mask option (like if you're going to use the green tea or charcoal masks, or anything that says you need to wash/wash-and-tone first).

This product does exactly what it says it does. As soon as you apply the clay mask, it begins to foam and bubble. It will tickle like crazy as it foams up! After about 5-10 min when you finally go to wash it off, you will notice your face looks like a cloud. It will amuse you. But then when you wash it off, your face is going to feel like silk. Especially if you moisturize afterwards, your skin feels great. It is incredibly messy to wash off, but if you are careful then it won't be an issue. Also, most clay masks smell horrific, but this one has the most pleasant herbal flowery type scent. I only use this mask once a week, but each time it is great. One thing to take into consideration, don't use it when you have a cold like I did. When it gets itchy, and your nose is running... it is absolute hell and you will wash it off within two min. (trust me, I learned from experience. You just don't know if it is the mask itching or your nose is running and it is dripping down your face. It is unpleasant but I blame the cold not the product.lol)

I just finished my first jar of this and am now on my second. It’s definitely bubbly and makes my skin feel super clean after I use it. Not sure if it really does much, but my skin has a certain glow after I use it. I did notice that when I got to the last couple uses of my first jar that it really didn’t foam up as much as before for some reason. I ended up throwing it away before it was all gone because it had essentially stopped working (even with closing it right away and proper storage). The new jar is fantastic and has no issues with bubbling, however.

reviews.review_header: I love the way this feels on the face
reviews.review_text: I love the way this feels on the face. It really feels like it's working miracles when you feel the bubbles. My face is left nice and soft afterwards with a noticeable difference with blackhead removal, especially on my nose. It took a couple of trial runs to figure out how much product I should be using, but overall I love this product and would definitely repurchase when the times comes.

Not sure how well it really works for facial purposes, but its pretty fun to use! Bought it as a small gift for my mom so we could giggle and use it. The mask tickles a lot and definitely produces a TON, if slightly alarming amount of foam. I liked it!

I am not really sure how this benefits my skin but it is fun to use! I haven't really noticed any change in my skin by using this mask but it is fun to do on a girly night before a bath. Doesn't have a strange smell at all, didn't break me out (and I have sensitive skin) and is easy to use and wash off. Just not so sure if it actually helps my skin become clearer or more soft? Still fun to try!

This stuff is really neat to use. I feel like it is really cleaning my skin and pores out. My face wasn't dried out at all once I used a little moisturizer after I used it. I have super oily skin with clogged pores. I think this will help! It does itch BAD! I can deal with it if it makes me beautiful! LOL
It's so bubbly! My husband even tried it. I like that it doesn't dry out my skin like some masks do. I've gone through a whole jar and plan to order another.

Great cleansing mask! I applied it on my dry skin with all my make up on it. Left it for 10 minutes until it bubbled all up. I then massage my face like getting rid of the bubbles and left it on my face for another 5 minutes and rinse all the product out. I applied toner with a cotton pad and I did not see any trace of make up on the cotton pad. It removed my makeup 100%. I might use it as my cleanser. I love it!

reviews.review_header: The sensation of this mask was a terrible creepy-crawly feeling that I could not wait to wash ...
reviews.review_text: The sensation of this mask was a terrible creepy-crawly feeling that I could not wait to wash off. It felt like I had 100 centipedes crawling all over my face. I literally had to sit on my hands and bite my lip to try to keep from taking it off too early. And when I finally did wash it off (oh, sweet relief), I didn't notice a difference in my skin at all. It looks amusing on, but unless you're doing it just for the selfie, save your money.

reviews.review_header: this product is so much fun!! You end up looking like a foamy ...
reviews.review_text: First of all, this product is so much fun!! You end up looking like a foamy chipmunk, and it’s honestly fantastically funny. My husband and I got a good laugh out of it. But what’s really great is how well it works! My skin felt clean, refreshed, and soft once I took the mask off. I would definitely recommend giving it a shot.

reviews.review_header: Kind of a novelty, but kind of not in ...
reviews.review_text: Kind of a novelty, but kind of not in that it actually works. It kind of stings when applying but I haven't had any reactions to it. It bubbles up quickly, making actually spreading it to cover my face completely a bit difficult. I usually leave it on for five minutes then rinse. The results are immediate; my skin is brighter and clearer and my nose, which is usually full of blackheads, is smooth. The mask lost its carbonation after I used it a couple of times though, so I'm not sure if I left it exposed for too long to open air or if this is how it usually is. It works extremely well when it does work though.

This was so fun!! It keeps on bubbling even after 15 minutes. It's a little hard to wash off but all the the bubbles are worth it. My skin feels so clean!
