reviews.review_text: I love this product I have a cyst on my upper right cheek bone and went to a Dermotologist she said she wouldn't drain it and I needed to goto a plastic surgeon I used this mask everyday and I saw a saficiant decrease in its size I was prescribed a topical ointment to put on the cyst it didn't do much this face mask has improved not only my cyst but my blemishes on my face all together I would recommend this to anyone

reviews.review_header: A really fun way to do your own facial
reviews.review_text: A really fun way to do your own facial. The bubbly foaming action starts almost immediately and is a very unique sensation. The mask itself is very cooling on the skin. I usually do use it in two phases: I apply the mask in a thin but full layer on my face using the small spoon (avoiding the eye area, because the foam spreads a little). Then after about 5 minutes, I rub the foam into my skin for a second pass, and wash it off completely after a minute or two. Washing the mask off can be a small chore, so I tend to hop into the shower to wash it off, rather than bend over my sink for a few minutes of scrubbing.

reviews.review_header: Left my skin rough and angry
reviews.review_text: I like how it felt going on, and I think I noticed a difference. However, I used it twice in three days (took a day off) and my cheeks were left rough, angry and stinging. It took weeks for my skin to recover. It may work for your skin, but it didn't work for mine.

reviews.review_header: Good for a laugh or a sleep over/beauty party, but not for a real skin remedy
reviews.review_text: I think this product is either too mild for my needs or that it is more of a novelty- to see ones face get bubbly and deformed while wearing the mask. It tingles and it feels cool on my face. The bubbling up seems to be more for other's reactions to me using this clay mask than for lifting out impurities from my skin. It is a mild mask even though it has a menthol-like sensation. The product is a grey clay mask that bubbles up once it is applied on the skin. It feels fresh and tingly on the skin... the clay should draw out impurities from the skin. But I have found that it does not really dry up on the skin. The instructions are in another language, so my different occasions of using this mask I have tried different things such as leaving it on for different amounts of time. It just does not dry hard. I have also tried smoothing the mask back into my face after it had bubbled up- that does not seem to make a difference in performance. Removal of the Elizavecca Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay mask takes some work. I find it easiest to remove it while showering- lots of water and rubbing. Conclusion: I have used it a few times and shared the product with friends... along with taking photos to share the puffy face. After using the product my skin is left feeling velvety soft, it is nice, but I do not think there is any other benefit... no pore tightening, no deep cleansing of pores or drawing out impurities, no reducing the size of my pimples, no exfoliation, no hydration.

reviews.review_header: It does a good job making my face feel soft after use but ...
reviews.review_text: As soon as I opened my bottle it started to bubble. It bubbles a lot quicker than I expected. Didn't even get half my face before it started to bubble. It does a good job making my face feel soft after use but the quickly bubbling bothers me. Besides that good product.
Feels very clean after, but the carbonation made my face itch super bad so I had to wash it off early.

reviews.review_header: I really wanted to love this! However
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this! However, it irritated my skin. The second i put it on my face it started to itch, like a lot! I could only tolerate it for about 3 minutes. I will say that my face felt SUPER soft after i washed off the equivalent of a wool sweater off my face. I'm so jealous that everyone else doesn't have my dumb skin.

I picked up the “Elizavecca Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask” after seeing so many video’s on YouTube about it. I really didn’t know what to except. If it was really worth the money or just Hyped up. For me it was really a great fascial mask. It left my face feeling smooth, clean and not overly tight. And the bubbles were a Plus. It was fun and different. I would repurchase this mask once it’s gone.

Overall a great and fun product. Has a refreshing subtle lemon sent and the consistency is pleasing to apply. As far as the bubble part it almost triples in thickness through the bubbles expanding which is fun the watch. I feels a little tingly during the process as well. I have found that once the bubbles have expanded as much as possible, you are able to rub it back in the skin and they still expand. As for the results from the mask, I didn't notice any huge improvements but my face did feel nice and clean.

reviews.review_header: whenever my skin is SUPER oily (more than normal and I have pretty oily ...
reviews.review_text: First off this mask only takes 5 minutes which is a blessing. Second off, whenever my skin is SUPER oily (more than normal and I have pretty oily skin as is) one quick 5 minute session with this mask and the oil is all under control. I love it.
This stuff is amazing!!! It kinda tickles my nose if I put it between my nose and mouth but that's the only downside. I notice a difference after one use. My skins so much softer!

reviews.review_header: It feels great and it is fun on top of everything else
reviews.review_text: This stuff is incredible. It feels great and it is fun on top of everything else!

This clay mask is great. The bubbles are very tingling and the mask has a cooling sensation. You might need to bring your elbow grease to remove it, however, but it works great. It left the skin feeling cool, tight, and smooth.
I bought this after seeing pictures on Instagram. Thought it would just be fun to use... but it actually works. Unclogs pores very well. Would be five starts BUT it is a pain to wash off.

I tried this with my sister. We both found it itchy and tickly while it was on our faces and couldn't wait to get it off. It doesn't really help your skin; it's more of a novelty. I thought it would be kind of fun but it was just annoying.

reviews.review_header: reduced puffiness under eyes, removed oil and left skin smooth
reviews.review_text: It removed about 90% oil. It left face very smooth and reduced puffiness under the eyes. Its very easy to use, don't need to use too much. it smells like laundry detergent. not terrible

It had a weird consistency going on, almost slimy like it would drip off. But once I got used to that it was fine. A little went a long way too. After I rinsed it off my skin was so smooth & soft. Felt like I’d had a facial.
The bubbling is cool. It will definitely tickle before the 15 minutes or so is up. Making you want to get rid of it. But i like it, my face feels clean after.

reviews.review_header: I tried this mask after reading the amazing reviews right here on Amazon
reviews.review_text: I tried this mask after reading the amazing reviews right here on Amazon. I've used this mask 3 times now, and each time it's left my skin soft smooth and much brighter. I have found the next day that pimples which were taking forever to surface, surface right away and go away much quicker. This mask is good for anyone with any type of skin. It's fun and it works!
Such a fun mask! Don't put too much near your nose or the mask will turn against you and try to smother you with bubbles.

reviews.review_header: Made my skin feel nice and smooth afterwards
reviews.review_text: Made my skin feel nice and smooth afterwards, also felt as though it reduced the size of my acne and made the dullness in my skin go away. It was kind of itchy when the bubbles were in full effect though. Looked ridiculous and it scared my baby haha

Fun to use made my face super soft but does not store well after 3 weeks it was watery and ruined I made sure to never use my hands to apply and always kept it in a cool dry place and still got ruined
It itches soooo much.

reviews.review_header: Brilliant! I love this mask so much
reviews.review_text: Brilliant! I love this mask so much. It's easy to apply and comes with a tiny spatula for application. Apply quickly as product begins to bubble once oxygenated. Produces a tingly feeling while on as the product continues to bubble. Easy to wash off and leaves face soft and bright.

So this mask felt pretty cool initially, but unfortunately I am very allergic to it. My skin was a little irritated after, but early the next morning I woke up with hives. Sadly I won't be able to use it again, but I liked the idea of it!

reviews.review_header: This product is great. Leaves your face feeling very clean
reviews.review_text: This product is great. Leaves your face feeling very clean. The bubbling effect is pretty awesome as well. You don't need as much as you think.

reviews.review_header: It bubbles and foams great. Really really fun and shrunk some of my ...
reviews.review_text: It bubbles and foams great. Really really fun and shrunk some of my pores. I dont recommend it on dry skin though because it caused me to break out a little on my cheeks. However, on my nose where i had a LOT of blackheads, they disappeared. Amazing.

reviews.review_header: This was a very fun mask. It bubbles
reviews.review_text: This was a very fun mask. It bubbles... a lot. You really don't need much. I know I'm not the first to say it, but it is very true. The first time I applied too much. I wiped the first layer of bubbles off and the layer underneath bubbled all over again. It did make my skin feel smoother and cleaner. No super crazy transformation, but the carbonation makes it a unique experience. All I can say is this would be a blast for a spa night with friends, but also enjoyable alone as a treat.
This was so fun to use and see my family's reaction hahaha

This is just fun to use with your friends. We got a good laugh at it bubbling up on our faces. It made my skin feel pretty nice too. After you apply if you need more be sure to clean off the spatula before dipping back into the jar. It causes the rest to bubble up on you.

I've only used it twice so far so I can't really say whether it truly works to get rid of black heads or blemishes or not, but it is really fun to watch and feel bubble up on your face. It is drying so be sure to moisturize after. Just be sure to reseal the jar, because it will start to bubble up too.

reviews.review_header: i enjoy a thorough clean feeling and it really gets into ...
reviews.review_text: i thought this was just a gimmick but it does really work! i enjoy a thorough clean feeling and it really gets into pores.

Love love love ! Great amazing product, its a refreshing mask you can feel. I did facials on my entire family because of how fun and eady this product is to use. Comes with small paddle/spatula to spread the mask on face. Leavr on for 5min, rub in then was. Turns soapy, easy to wash off . Results are instant!
Foaming is so fun!!!! Face broke out about a week later but then was sooooo fresh and clean. It really pulled the impurities out!

This is by far one of the best masks I have ever used. The bubbling let's you know it's working. Leaves your skin fresh and soft. Helps my daughter with her blemishes, reduces redness and helps them disappear faster. We use it as part of our regular skin regime.

reviews.review_header: I did a review on my YouTube channel it was ...

i have been using it for a long time now. i has been good. skin is super smooth after every wash. however now my skin has develop some sort of issue (not sure if related to the product or not). my face gets really really red. i have stop using it just in case, and I'm going to the doc to check if its related or not.

reviews.review_header: Super fun to watch this mask grow
reviews.review_text: Super fun to watch this mask grow. Also fun to sneak up and scare the hubby with it on my face. It will make you look like a troll while it's on. But once I rinsed it off, my skin was left feeling really nice. I try to do this mask at least once a week.

reviews.review_header: but it was a lot of fun to use
reviews.review_text: No idea if it changed my skin, but it was a lot of fun to use. Feels like you rubbed poprocks on your face :)
This mask is so fun! Easy to apply, but it does start bubbling up right away so put it on quickly. It made my whole family laugh.

I truly love this product. I am on my second jar. It's a little strange to put on and really tickles as it bubbles, but after you rub it in and wash it off, your skin looks and feels brand new. So soft, clean and supple. If you want a great complexion and a fun mask to use - buy this.

reviews.review_header: Makes your face feel great! This jar tends to last me a good ...
reviews.review_text: Makes your face feel great! This jar tends to last me a good 7 months or so, and it'll bubble up every time. It makes your skin feel fresh and tight.

Me and my sister used this product last night. We had so much fun with it and we could not stop laughing. It bubbles up fast so make sure you hurry up and apply it to your face. I used a cloth to help take off the product just becuase it does kind of stick to your face. If anyone has recomindations when taking it off then please comment on this. Other than that it left my skin feeling so soft and bright. Im going to continue to use this and see the long term effects.

reviews.review_header: This product is rather innovative and it is fun to put the product on your face and feels ...

This mask is a lot of fun! It's so neat to see and feel the mask bubble up! Although be careful on placement, it took me a while to realize how far to place it from my eyes. It would always foam up and get into my eye lashes. I would've given it 4.5, but I only gave it 4 out of 5 because of how difficult it is to get off. I have to practically scrub my face with a washcloth to get it off, and it soaps up as well, so sometimes you can get bubbles in your nose or mouth when trying to rinse off. However, my face always feels amazing after and looks so bright and refreshed, so it's totally worth it.

reviews.review_header: Great product, took awhile to get here.
reviews.review_text: Took awhile to receive but when I finally got the product it was pretty fun! Made my husband try it too! It didn't burn or irratiate my face and I have VERY sensitive skin! Great product!

reviews.review_header: Don't get the hype. The bubbling sensation irritates my ...

reviews.review_text: Works well and ffn to use. Only complaint and it's minor when it bubbles it starts to feel like I have an itchy nose. Nothing wrong with the product just that I really want to itch my face while trying to wait out the 5, 10 mins this is on.

Great product for having a fun facial. Feels great, makes skin feel clean after using. Just like any other clay mask, it takes some effort to remove. I didn't notice a wow factor result, but it was definitely fun to use!

reviews.review_header: It felt like a growing fuzzy storm cloud on my face

reviews.review_header: This product is one of my favorite masks ever

reviews.review_header: Fun for men, women and children

reviews.review_text: I love the bubble part, as far as clearing up acne or spots , I didn't see any improvement in that , however I did see a difference in the silky and brightening of my face and skin.
It is a great product, makes easier to clean blackheads, creates a lot of foam, but under the foam you can feel a layer of the mask. 100% better than the black masks everyone is selling right now.

So much fun to use. Downfall is all the instructions are not in English but there are plenty of YouTube videos that show how to use it. It did come with a few samples of other products as well when I ordered it. But bubbles up LARGE on face and leaves skin feeling so clean.

reviews.review_header: I love this mask because it makes my skin feel great
reviews.review_text: I love this mask because it makes my skin feel great. It bubbles up and tickles a bunch lol but it definitely cleans my pores and works as a makeup remover. It is a fun mask and I definitely recommend

This stuff is really cool. It made my skin soft, but also tightened it (I'm 32, and will take any skin tightness I can get!) It does a pretty good job of cleaning out pores, too. I would get it again.

Right now I love this stuff I just got and my skin is really sensitive didn't bother my skin and left it feeling clean plus it's really fun Cons right now it's foaming up in the container I just got it today so by morning if it survives and doesn't leak out everywhere I'll be keeping it if not and it in fact gets everywhere I won't be re ordering it because it's not worth $10 for a one time use
This is one of my go to face masks to give to my friends. They all love it and It’s just a fun face mask

reviews.review_header: Just as fun as you would imagine.

reviews.review_header: the bubbles aren't for me, but it does clean very well!

Warning, if you're ticklish... this might not be the best clay mask for you because once the bubbles start to activate you're gonna want to scratch your face.

Great mask, i don’t really know what it’s supposed to do for my skin but it feels great and is really fun! instructions were not english! I don’t like the wash off factor it is thick and messy but hey it is a clay mask so i didn’t expect anything different!

It also made my face very soft when I was done rinsing it off. The only bad thing I can say about it is that once the 10 minutes have ended & your face is full of bubbles, it is a hassle to rinse off.

It was really fun at first. It smells really good and it tickled my face but sadly it stunf afterwards and idk if it's Cuz I have sensitive skin or what. It also didn't really clear my skin up. My skin felt a little softer I guess but it was more of the fun of putting it on

I got this for my girlfriend. She left our bedroom Looking normal, came back looking like mold had grown on her face. After she washed it off her skin was so smooth and felt nice. At times she has sensitive skin, but so far so good. No break outs. Other reviews made her hesitsnt but she was like "hey.. I wanna be a grey bubble monster."
I absolutely LOVE this mask. It tingles and foams up so fast. I'm addicted to it. I have sure dry skin and my fiance has oily skin. Perfect for the both of us.

Such a fun mask! The novelty of this doesn't wear off (for me at least). It does make my skin feel soft and smooth right after use. I love the light scent, as well. Have added this to my weekly skin care routine!
Definitely one of my favorite go to face masks when I don’t have a lot of time my skin feels so clean after use and you’ll definitely have a good laugh when you see your face full of bubbles 😅
I got this after seeing it viral online, and it IS entertaining but it is too drying and harsh for my sensitive skin, so I don't recommend if you have sensitive skin like me!

Love how it bubbles. But unfortunately after using it for a few weeks. I have broken out all over my face. Don't think it's a reflection on the product.my skin just doesn't like it. But definitely a fun mask to use.

reviews.review_header: This must be the most fun face mask I own - it looks ridiculous when ...
reviews.review_text: This must be the most fun face mask I own - it looks ridiculous when it bubbles up and has a kind of "Pop Rocks" sensation on the face - and it definitely seems to clean out my pores very well.
Love this product! I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin and I can use this with no reaction. Leaves my skin feeling smooth and clean! The bubbling action makes it fun.
It's a fun product to use. I don't feel an improvement in my skin after regular use

reviews.review_header: its just a fun thing to do
reviews.review_text: dont put it around ur nose it tickles. i dont think this does much for my skin. its just a fun thing to do.

reviews.review_header: Not Like Your Typical Face Mask!
reviews.review_text: I love to try different beauty products, especially face masks. I bought this after my friend introduced it to me. It is AMAZING! It feels like no other mask I've ever tried before! I love how you can feel it working, cleaning deep into my pores. You do have to apply this mask quickly, because it is fast-acting.

I love this product. It's so fun. Works great. Takes off makeup. Cleans my skin wonderfully. I have oily skin. May not be great for sensitive skin. I have, since buying this, seen reviews on you Tube for this product also! Will buy again!

reviews.review_header: This stuff is fun to use and makes your face feel really clean
reviews.review_text: This stuff is fun to use and makes your face feel really clean! It doesn't dry out or irritate your skin at all, which is great because I've had that problem with a lot of masks. You do look like a lagoon monster while it's on your face, but that's part of the fun!!

reviews.review_header: The mask is fun to put on
reviews.review_text: The mask is fun to put on. The only thing is that it is hard to take off. I've come to put it on right before taking a shower so that it doesn't make a mess when I take it off. Skin is smooth after the mask is off. The plus side is that it is fun to put on.
It's fun EVERY TIME. I keep making my friends try it with me which is great girl time. It does make my skin feel soft after, but it's more about the experience.

Very fun mask that always leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth, and also provides loads of entertainment. I would recommend putting it on before a shower because it does take quite a bit of washing to get it off. Also do not exfoliate before the mask, it burns a little (my skin is a little on the sensitive side).

reviews.review_header: This product also made my face itch like crazy the entire minute that you are suppose to ...
reviews.review_text: I used this product until it was gone hoping that it just took some time to work, but it never made a difference on my oily skin. This product also made my face itch like crazy the entire minute that you are suppose to wait until you rinse, I could barely stand it!

Don't recommend for sensitive skin. I'll stick to face washes/masks that don't pink my face. Nonetheless the experience of seeing the mask expand was fun ... once. At least I can check it off my "must try" list

Really pulls blackheads to the surface! About once a week my daughter and I will wash or faces and use this mask. It only has to be on for a couple of minutes, then as soon as we wash it off we look in the mirror and everything has come to the surface! We'll both be using this product from now on.

reviews.review_header: Very fun mask! It's a messy mask so I would ...
reviews.review_text: Very fun mask! It's a messy mask so I would recommend to use it before you take a shower so it's an easier clean up! But it's basically a clay mask that bubbles up! Help

If I could give this product 10 stars, I would. This was the most entertaining face mask I have ever done. I have shown my family the mask and now all of them are waning their own jar. Makes your skin feel great, silky smooth. I have sensitive skin and didn't react to the mask, so that was awesome. Definitely buying again when I run out, which will probably be soon :)

My new favorite clay mask!! Not only because it fizzles but it does leave your skin feeling clean and oh so smooth~~ The instructions are in korean so let me tell you wsup! - First wash your face nice and clean and pat dry - Second use the applicator to mix the clay mask around a bit - Third Take a generous glob and smear it on your cheeks, chin, forehead, and nose (don't touch the mask in the container with your fingers! it'll cause a reaction and start bubbling) - Fourth Use your fingers or applicator (I like to use my fingers) and evenly distribute the clay mask all over your face and avoid getting into your eyes and near your mouth - Fifth After waiting about 5-10 minutes, pop them fizzing bubbles with your fingers by rubbing it all over your face again - Six Let it sit again for about 5 minutes. - Seventh Wash it off~ It's a little hard to wash it off so you're going to do a bit if rubbing. Note that this mask suds up like soap. - Lastly pat dry That's it! I do this mask about 1 - 2x a week (: Love it!
I love this mask, it makes your face feel clean and I'm surprised that this isn't more popular.

reviews.review_header: If you are looking for a mask that will specifically ...
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a mask that will specifically target blackheads and pull them out, this is not the product for you! However, it did make my skin tighter afterwards and closed my pores slightly. In my opinion, this is half gimmick and half worth your money!

This product is my favorite face mask! My husband bought this for me as a Christmas present since I am big on beauty products. It only takes 7 minutes (this includes applying the mask, letting it foam, and washing it off) and has the best results! I love the tingly sensation and my husband gets a kick over how goofy I look when it foams. I am currently purchasing more since I've already gone through the entire container.

reviews.review_header: It's smells fresh and leaves me feeling clean but it ...
reviews.review_text: It's smells fresh and leaves me feeling clean but it dose make you want to itch cause of bubbles I even had my husband do it. He took his off before I cause he wanted to itch it lol
Everyone that I have had try this product loves it! Instant smooth skin after use. Lots of fun the use!

Was hesitant to give into the 'hype', but very pleasantly surprised! It was definitely a different consistency than what I was expecting, but felt very good going on. Make sure you put the lid back on right after you've applied because it does start to foam up. Washing off was a bit of a pain because of the consistency, but my skin felt so good afterwards and the large pores across my nose and cheeks looked clearer than I think they ever have!

reviews.review_header: This product is fun to use I must say
reviews.review_text: This product is fun to use I must say. It makes my skin a little dry afterward but seems to work well. The only downside is it itches me way to much, it's really hard to leave it on for the recommended time due to the bubbling action. But I'm still going to use it for those times I get breakouts or need to clarify my skin.

Definitely reduced the appearance of my pores and my face looked flawless immediately after using. It feels good too. That said, it's too messy and hard to rinse off. I would say only use this before you're going to take a shower, otherwise you'll be rinsing your face in the sink for quite a while.
I love this stuff, is crazy weird feeling when it starts bubbling but works really good
Super fun and left my face feeling so so clean!

reviews.review_header: I broke out in a pretty terrible rash because of this
reviews.review_text: My skin is way to sensitive for this stuff. I broke out in a pretty terrible rash because of this. My hubs likes it but I can't use it.

reviews.review_header: Got this as a gift for my daughter, she ...
reviews.review_text: Got this as a gift for my daughter, she loves it. Says her skin feels really clean after using it.
Easy and fun to use! The mask did tingle but not that bad - it was invigorating:) after we washed it off our faces felt smooth and refreshed! Love it!
My face feels incredibly clean when I use this mask. The bubbles can tickle a little but it's tolerable. Love it and will continue using it.
Fun to use and gets the job done! Would have gotten 5 stars but it's really hard to wash off the face, overall still a great product!
It definitely bubbles like it claims to. The smell is okay. I liked this product.

This stuff is really fun, and I feel like it does a good job of cleaning my face, but it isn't a miracle worker. You aren't going to bubble up, and then rinse it off to find perfect skin, but it does improve complexion over time with several uses.

I loved this bubbly product, the mask is applied to a damp problem area, and after a few seconds (less than a minute) it puffs up and you hear a fuzzy sound, meaning that it's working it magic! apply just a but, especially around the nostril and eye area. It comes with a tiny plastic spoon. I highly recommend it, as well as the other milky piggy products.
My skin feels so clean after using this and I have oily skin. Best product I have used ever.

reviews.review_header: This mask was fun but I have combination/ dry skin and this really ...
reviews.review_text: This mask was fun but I have combination/ dry skin and this really dried my skin out much worse than it has been in a long time. Had to apply multiple layers of hydrating lotion to get it back to normal softness. Aside from that, the mask was fun to "interact" with and watch carbonate on my face.
I wanted to love this product. Unfortunately this mask doesn't make my face feel any different after using it.

This product is amazing. Yeah, it's a fad now, but that doesn't detract from the fact that it makes my skin feel EXTRA clean and fresh. It's fun, has a light scent, isn't irritating and I just love it. Yes, I recommend this. Highly. Just watch how you're putting it on, lol, as you can see, it grows exponentially.

I bought this primarily to help with blackheads, and I'm not convinced it has helped any, but it definitely gives your face a brighter, fresh feeling. I do wish the instructions came with an English translation so I didn't have to google them every time (I can never remember how long to leave on the mask!) Overall, this is a fun way to clean your face, but I won't be buying again.

reviews.review_header: Maybe other people will like that sensation
reviews.review_text: It tickles. My whole face was screaming out to be scratched, until I washed it off. Maybe other people will like that sensation, but I don't. I won't buy it again.

reviews.review_header: Trendy product, but not really worth the hype
reviews.review_text: This mask makes your skin look kind of nice right after using it, but there are no long term effects. I purchased this out of curiosity, but would not do it again.

I have only used it once but so far I like it. There are no English directions so I left it on for about 5-10 minutes. Also you have to keep the lid on when not in use as it will start to bubble in the jar. It really should be in pump form which is why I took off a star.

reviews.review_header: I use this about 2 times a week and my ...
reviews.review_text: I use this about 2 times a week and my face LOVES it. It stops breakouts and if I do break out, it prevents them from getting huge.
The mask does bubble up on your face which is cool but I didn't feel like my face got as clean as it does with other masks
This is such a weird product but was happy with the results. The bubbles on your face make you look ridiculous, but it works so guess can't complain

This mask is so fun! I'm a beauty product junky, so I tried a lot of masks and was getting bored with them. This shakes things up with the bubbles, and yet still works great. I giggled through most of the mask (it tickles) and then when I washed it off my skin felt great! You have to try this thing :)

For some reason the mask doesn't work on my forehead but it works great on the rest of my skin! The first time I used it tiny tiny flakes of dead skin were flinging from the mask while the mask bubbled up. It was weirdly amazing! One thing though: the mask tends to itch a little bit but it didn't damage my skin or anything. Overall, pretty great product!!

reviews.review_header: great product, but is it cruelty free?
reviews.review_text: really like this mask. it's super fun to use since the bubbles puff up on your face. my pores feel very clean afterwards. my only issue is that i haven't seen anywhere that this is 100% cruelty free.

This is not only a really fun mask to use, but it's really effective! I notice softer skin, and it definitely feels cleaner too. I love that you can use this as a cleansing mask! I do a quick wipe-down to get rid of makeup and surface grime, then go for the deep clean with this mask. I've even gotten my fiance hooked on using this mask with me! It can be a bit of a pain to wash off, but that's really the only downside.

reviews.review_header: Love it. It tickles a bit when it bubbles
reviews.review_text: Love it. It tickles a bit when it bubbles. Love the results. I can definitely notice that my pores look smaller and overall skin feels refreshed.

I am a skincare junk, and I love how this product helped me remove all my makeup. It is a bit messy to apply and you may feel a slight tingle on your skin, but nothing overbearing. Fun to use if you have friends around at the house with you

I really like this mask. Plus it's just fun to use! It definitely makes my boyfriend laugh when I use it. The only drawback that I've noticed is that it's kind of a pain in the butt to get off; it sticks really well to your skin once you rub it on, so you have to scrub kind of hard to get it all off.

Tickles in a good way. Strong smell, but in a good way. Crazy texture. Bubbles tickle but your skin feels so clean and soft afterward. I keep mine in the fridge to keep it from bubbling too fast when I apply. Anyone who is curious should try--- this is really unique and I think it is good quality for the cost.
Such a cool mask! Love the tingly sensation you get from the bubbles! Leaves skin soft and supple...and clean!
My daughter and I love doing this mask just for the pure humor this mask brings! Other than that it is a really nice mask, leaves the skin nice and smooth.

This is hands down the best stuff I've used in a LONG, LONG time. I have pretty good skin -- it tends to get flaky because it's dry. I do breakout -- but it's rare. My biggest problem is that I tend to get blackheads on my very oily nose. I've used so many things that claim to get rid of blackheads -- but aside from using gelatin (and using the pinterest trick where this forms sort of like a pore strip), *nothing* would work. Then...I found this stuff. It's a dream come true. My nose is blackhead free and feels as smooth as a baby's bottom. You use a scoop to apply this stuff to your face. It goes on like a normal clay mask. After about five minutes, this stuff starts to foam up. It's super tingly and really feels like it is penetrating my skin. After a little while, massage this stuff into your skin. Then wash it off. I swear by this stuff now. Thanks to this, my nose no longer looks like a polka dot of blackheads!

reviews.review_header: It makes my face feel wonderful.
reviews.review_text: I cant read anything on the outside of the container, but I did read the reviews before I bought it. It makes my face feel wonderful.

I bought this mask to help me with bumps underneath my forehead. I've used it 3 times so far but definitely saw the results,bumps became smaller and some disappeared. I used it two days in a row when just got it and third time was like a week later. I felt that it slightly dried out my skin (combination) but every mask does it if it's a deep penetrating mask. I used it on areas where congested re forehead,nose,chin. It did a great job on me clearing blackheads on my nose. It didn't leave uncomfortable feeling but I used toner and moisturizer after. I need to continue using it before hopefully I see more results.
Feels amazing and bubbles up so much! It feels nice because it almost feels like it's getting in your pores and lifting everything up!

I love this mask! It feels really cool as it starts to bubble and makes your skin feel all tingly. After washing it off, my skin felt very fresh and soft and my pores seemed smaller. Be careful about putting any under your nose though because it will tickle as it starts bubbling!

WORKS! Put the mask on your face and leave it on for 5 minutes. You will see the bubbles forming and it is the coolest thing! Then wash it all off. I just wiped the bubbles off with my fingers then went in and used water to wash the clay off. My skin felt amazing afterwards!

reviews.review_header: Not to discourage but to inform
reviews.review_text: Ehh it's alright. I mean it works for my roommate but I have really tough skin and it doesn't do much but give me a little moisture to my skin. I can see why this would work on other people I just don't understand why it didn't change my face like it did my roommate's.

reviews.review_header: he love it! cant really tell if its doing much ...
reviews.review_text: i am constantly trying new facials and this has been all the rave on the internet and so i decided to try it out... it wasn't long until my brother got a hold of it and had been using it constantly.. he love it ! cant really tell if its doing much to his pores nor skin but the foaming of the mask alone is satisfying enough to keep using it.

reviews.review_header: Feels nice on the skin but I don't feel like it ...
reviews.review_text: Feels nice on the skin but I don't feel like it does much to help my skin... The bubble/foam sensation is fun to play with, however I was hoping that as a clay mask it would help with my oily skin and acne. Unfortunately it did neither of those things.

I liked it and it got very bubbly! It was very tingly, not in a bad way but tickling sensation. It was hard to get off my face though, ended up having to use a wash cloth. It made my skin feel really good afterwards, would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_header: A little itchy but pretty good.
reviews.review_text: He mask itself is cool and trendy. But personally I did not see any type of improvement in my skin. The mask bubbles up pretty good and tickles your face while doing so. But other than that I can’t really complain too much.

If I could give more stars I would. This thing tightened my pores like crazy! My skin looks so much clearer and and brighter. My acne is clearing too. The bubbles are fun and stuff just keep them away from your nostrils. Also use a wash cloth to help remove.

You have got to love this mask! It tickles your face as it foams up on your skin and develops into a thick cloud of bubbles on your face, It is hilarious to watch! But, besides all of the fun, this is a great mask! I have used it several times and it leaves my skin firm and smooth, but not tight like it is dry.
I have combination skin and this mask is perfect! It leaves the skin clean and smooth. I use it once a week. It does take a long time to wash it off though.

This was so much fun to use! My sister and I couldn't stop laughing. You could really feel the product getting into the pores. When it was rinsed off, our skin looked much clearer and brighter. Would absolutely recommend!

reviews.review_header: Tickles a LOT and may even burn a little, ...
reviews.review_text: Tickles a LOT and may even burn a little, but I pair this twice a week with rosehip oil...and it made my acne prone, discolored skin very glow-y and healthy.

reviews.review_header: Fun little mask, not too convinced on its benefits yet
reviews.review_text: I use many masks, so I'm not sure if this one is really making a difference. But my skin is softer right after using it until I shower the next morning. Its really just a fun product to use. It is hard to remove, so I would recommend hoping into the shower right after using to help get it all off.

reviews.review_header: It did bubble and feel good but it irritated my skin and my skin is ...
reviews.review_text: It did bubble and feel good but it irritated my skin and my skin is usually not prone to irritation.

reviews.review_header: This is my great mask to go to this is my second purchase ...
reviews.review_text: This is my great mask to go to this is my second purchase of this product and I love love it it takes a little bit to get used to it because it's tingly but it works great for me and I will buy it again when this one is done

Fun to use face mask BUT if you have sensitive skin like I do be very careful not to use it more them once a week because it can cause some dryness/peeling/flaking. After I used it the first time my skin felt AMAZING really soft, deep cleaned and with a very nice glow BUT 3 days later I was peeling really bad around my nose and chin. Second time I used it what I did was apply a very moisturizing cream with 4 drops of my favorite rosehip oil and by doing that I had no peeling or flaking :-)

reviews.review_header: Im using all kinds of masks but this is totaly ...
reviews.review_text: Im using all kinds of masks but this is totaly different effect and has jello texture. It bubbles a lot and tinggling a little bit.

reviews.review_header: Awesome mask! You can feel it cleaning and your ...
reviews.review_text: Awesome mask! You can feel it cleaning and your face feels amazing afterwards. If your thinking about purchasing, just do it, you will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_header: While this product is super fun, it dried my face out baaad
reviews.review_text: While this product is super fun, it dried my face out baaad. I would say if you have sensitive skin don't risk it. And if you do, I would say stick to once a month. It is super intense for sensitive skin.

It's packed nicely so it doesn't spill and comes with a spatula so you don't contaminate the product. This product was very fun. It bubbles up really nicely. The directions are easy to follow. The product is thick and you want to work quickly when applying. The bubbles get huge! I have very sensitive skin and this didn't irritate at all. It was a little hard to rinse off because it was so thick. But afterwards my face felt a little tight and even though I apply lotion it felt dry but I think that's a good thing especially if you have oily skin. 5/5

reviews.review_header: This mask is soooo fun. My boyfriend even wanted to try after he ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is soooo fun. My boyfriend even wanted to try after he watched me pretty much turn into a cloud. It left my face just feeling so clean. It does itch a little as it's foaming up but nothing too unbearable (in my own opinion). Will definitely be purchasing again!!!
Oh wow, I love this mask! It definitely stinks and itches when you put it on but my skin always feels so good after I use it!

reviews.review_header: My granddaughter loved this, although I've never heard her mention it ...
reviews.review_text: My granddaughter loved this, although I've never heard her mention it again. She wanted it and was very happy with it.

reviews.review_header: This is a fun face mask to use
reviews.review_text: This is a fun face mask to use! I enjoyed the way it bubbles up and it made my skin feel softer and smoother afterwards. I'm giving it a 4 star because it does tend to tickle if it's too close to my nostrils, and if left on for too long dried out my skin more than I wanted.
The bubble affect is a bit gimmicky, but I really like how easy it si to put on/off. Those clay masks were terrible for my skin and these are nice and gentle.
The gentle bubbling is an odd sensation, but this mask leaves my skin clear and silky. Love it.

reviews.review_header: I like this stuff because it kinda tickles my face however ...

reviews.review_header: and my face was super firm and felt dried out after I washed it ...
reviews.review_text: My pores weren't any different or anything... and my face was super firm and felt dried out after I washed it off. But A plus plus for entertainment factor! Also, little goes a long way! Don't lather it on like you would a normal mask.

This mask is the coolest thing. You don't need to use a lot of it, so it should last a while. You can feel the fizzing and bubbling as soon as you put it on your face. And once it is time to wash off the mask, your skin feels super soft. I'm in love.

reviews.review_header: This is my new favorite fact mask
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite fact mask. You really feel it bubble in your pores and it leaves your skin super soft and tight. Really great for my hormonal acne. I use it about once or twice a week and my face is practically clear.

This bubble clay mask is the one I have been searching for. Great price for an amazing bubble mask. The mask went on so well and makes our skin feel amazing. My husband even caved and let us try it on him. It did wonders for his pores.
Found this product on a list of 29 best Amazon products, so, I decided to try it. It works as advertised, got one for my mom too. Will but again for myself.

This is my favorite face mask of all time, the hype is very real. I have very dry dull skin and this mask not only brightens my complexion, but it also cleans out my pores. It does have a very slight tingling so I would beware if you have very sensitive skin. My best tips is to use after cleansing and toning for the best results. I also apply once, let it foam up completely and then rub back into my skin several times before finally rinsing off. Hope this helps!!

First off, I ordered this on january 24th 2016 and got it today (february 16th). Which is pretty fast for overseas shipping. I tried it out right away and i love it. Good thing i got 2 lol. Also in the box i got a few samples of over products. Such as blotting paper, brightening cc cream, pore cleaner/ tightener, hand cream, collagen deep moisturizer and bb concealer. All of those were "extras" and a nice touch. A++

reviews.review_header: This is an awesome clay mask
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome clay mask, the bubbling is totally weird but cool. It really feels like it cleans deep down into my pores because of that. There's a good amount of product in the jar and I have found since it bubbles that a very small amount actually goes a long way.

I have very sensitive, acne prone skin and this works amazingly well on my skin. You can feel it drawing out all of the impurities while it's working. My skin is really tight and smooth when I remove it.
As far as masks go, this one is pretty fun. It does bubble up, and when you rinse it off it leaves your skin feeling super smooth.

reviews.review_header: Tried it and so far it's awesome! Only drawback is that you need to be ...
reviews.review_text: Tried it and so far it's awesome! Only drawback is that you need to be very careful not to contaminate the container or else all the clay starts to fizzle.

I had to try this! My daughters and I (and even my husband haha) tried this and it was pretty fun! We had a good time, it was pretty hilarious and the product itches and tickles your face it's hard not to itch!

reviews.review_header: Works as advertised and fun to use
reviews.review_text: This is the second face mask that I've purchased. I didn't see any changes with the first mask that I used, however, this one worked like a charm; you'll start seeing results immediately and it also leaves your skin feeling smooth.
It's so fun to use! It takes a significant amount of time to wash off. When you wash it off, it feels like you have dish soap on your face.

Just used this the other night and my Skin felt great afterward! It bubbles up a lot and makes it kinda fun to put on a facial mask. It is a clay mask though so it takes a few minutes to completely wash off, but other than that, its awesome!

reviews.review_header: Leaves skin feeling and looking amazing!
reviews.review_text: Love this mask. You feel it working, really cool. My face is baby smooth after rinse and clear in appearance.
Love this stuff, it's very thick since it's a clay and it dries quickly but it leaves my skin feeling very clean. Would buy again!
So fun to use. Really does foam up! Skin feels soft and silky after. I have suppppper sensitive skin (pale skin that is red and acne prone and oily) and I didn't break out. Love it!

reviews.review_header: It was great for entertainment purposes
reviews.review_text: It was great for entertainment purposes. I had two people try this. One person stated that they felt like their skin was softer after using it once. The other person has sensitive skin and experienced burning of skin and irritation. I would not recommend this for anyone with sensitive skin.
As a novelty face mask, this is fun. The item on regular use can dry out my skin.

This product is amazing! I have oily, acne prone skin and I tend to get visibly clogged pores in some spots on my face. Once a week, after exfoliating, I put this stuff on. It smells light and floral, and the packaging is amazing. I just slather a cherry-sized amount all over my face (quickly, or it will start to foam!) and wait for it to expand. It's really funny once it expands, and it feels great. After it has expanded, I add some water and massage it onto my face. Finally, I rinse. It makes every clogged pore disappear, brightens my skin, and helps with acne. I will continue purchasing-plus, it came with a few sample packets of other products to try!

reviews.review_header: This mask is alot of fun! I like how soft my skin feels afterward ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is alot of fun! I like how soft my skin feels afterward using it as well. Typically, my skin gets slightly irritated from using clay masks, but not this one. It's very gentle on my skin and there's no redness after I rinse it off.

reviews.review_header: Is fantastic! As long as you use the provided spatula ...
reviews.review_text: Is fantastic! As long as you use the provided spatula thing and don't get your facial oil in the mask container, it keeps very well. The mask itself is great and my face felt fantastic afterwards!

This is an amazing product. I purchased it after seeing a review on youtube and am so happy I did. It made my face feel incredibly soft and really lessened the appearance of my pores for a few days. I rotate through masks, and this has definitely earned a position in the rotation!

reviews.review_header: This clay mask is super fun and leaves skin feeling soft and fresh

reviews.review_header: I Love it. But I didn't expect to.
reviews.review_text: Take a risk. Normally I make my own clay and charcoal masks at home in a little mixing bowl for kitchen spices, but one I have specifically designated for masks. Anyway, it's a hassle doing it. The powder gets everywhere, it only keeps for so long, getting all that caked on clay off your face feels like it's doing more damage than good. To me, this mask is the next generation of clay masks. It not only cleans deeper, but it's also easier to get off than the standard clay packs and it has a nice warming feel on the face. Caolin also makes a nice one, but this review isn't about that. Don't be thrown off by the packaging, if you aren't feeling it - I'm normally a more elegant packaging girl myself - but because this stuff really does work, I'm keeping it. Great for a deep clean after a summer day, fishing on the lake or anytime you know you're going to be a greaseball. It lifts it all off and leaves you feeling real fresh!

reviews.review_header: Great pore-cleansing mask and SO MUCH FUN!
reviews.review_text: This is the most fun I've ever had cleaning my face. My fifteen year-old daughter heard about it (we're both recent converts to the wonders of Korean skin routines) and we decided to try it, if only to be able to say we owned a facial product called "Milky Piggy". We usually use clay masks to purify and de-oil our skin. This works better and you get a good laugh to boot. It comes with a little spatula. Use it. If you stick your fingers in this stuff, it starts the foaming process in the jar, which is not what you want. Scoop some out, spread it all over your face and feel the sparkly party begin. Wait for 8 minutes and try not to scratch or sneeze (it tickles!). Your face will feel like it has ginger ale bubbles all over it. Pretty soon you will have a smooth, thick layer of foam on your face that makes your features look lumpy and misshapen. While you're waiting for the 8 minutes to end, go leap out at someone and scare the pants off them. I recommend washing this off in the shower. Especially if you're fifteen and splashy at the sink. It's gray and foamy and it doesn't just wipe off. You put a little water on your face and massage the mask into a creamy consistency and then gently wipe with fingers and more water until it's gone. It may take a bit, so be patient. Your face will be soft and clean and all the crud in your pores will be under siege. Plus you just had the most fun at-home facial ever!

reviews.review_header: Fun, but not the most effective.
reviews.review_text: Tl;dr - Quality fun, but ineffective for me. I think this product is well made and fun. It does what it says. My 9-year old little sister and I used it for a girls night, and it's fun to watch it bubble, but I don't notice it doing anything good for my skin type. If you are looking for a good girls night mask, this is a good deal, but if you're looking for something that will really help your skin, look elsewhere.

reviews.review_header: This is more of a novelty for me.. ...

reviews.review_header: This stuff is pretty incredible! First let me start with the positives
reviews.review_text: This stuff is pretty incredible! First let me start with the positives: it's easy to apply, it has a mellow scent, it's easy to wash off, and it WORKS! It took out stubborn blackheads on my nose and chin. (Without over drying). You can literally feel it working as it bubbles... which leads me to the only negative about this product is that it itches! It's recommended to leave it on for 5 minutes which is kind of difficult since you want to scratch so badly the entire time. However, even with the itchiness I would still give this a solid 5 stars. Overall we are very happy with this product and would definetet buy it again!

This stuff is AMAZING! Wow, the way it feels on your face is so cool! Like millions of tiny little bubble popping all over your face, then when you rub it in it becomes this amazingly thick clay mask. Takes a minute to get it washed off, but the after feeling is so nice! Defiantly a great buy!!
I bought this not knowing if I'd like it or not and the first time I used it I fell in love. You can literally feel this mask cleaning out your pores. It's amazing and would definitely recommend!!!
This stuff tickles so much! However, your face feel super moisturized and clean afterwards. I highly recommend this mask to anyone. Works on all skin types.
great mask bubbles are rlly cool i think it helps idk but i have pretty bad skin and i think this mask helped

reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this mask once a week along with rose petal witch hazel 2x a day for the past 2 months and I’ve seen AMAZING results. I Loooovvveee Iiittt. I love the smell, and that cold tingly feeling once you put it on. My face is smooth once I washed it off. I feel like it cleaned every part of my oily face. Hands down, best product.

I bought this on a whim after seeing an advertisement on Facebook about it. I figured for the price I wouldn't be too devastated if it didn't work, and it would be good for a laugh. I was incredible surprised when it actually DID work. I left it on for 5 minutes, rubbed the bubbles in to bring it back to a paste, and then left that on for an additional minute. I've only used it once so it can't comment on how good it is on blackhead removal but my skin is noticeable a lot smoother. Putting on concealer and foundation was super easy and it lasted longer through the day.

reviews.review_header: Just go ahead and buy this, you'll love it!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff. I have tried a ton of different face masks over the years but not a single one of them has left me this impressed. This stuff is fairly inexpensive, comes in a large container so you can do multiple applications, and goes to work in seconds. Plus the whole mask only takes about 5 minutes so it is perfect for someone who wants a little pampering but doesn't have a ton of time to waste. I love it! I love the foaming action it gives and it left my skin feeling super soft and incredibly clean. I even went the next day without makeup and had three different people (which is a lot for me seeing as I work in a small office) comment on how great my skin looked! Buy this stuff, use it, love it, throw all your other masks away. Pro tip: at the end of the 5 minute bubbling time, rub the mask in with your fingers, kinda like you would normally wash your face. This helps it become a little more effective and really delivers a final "push" to get all the dirt and grime off your face. Hope y'all enjoy!

reviews.review_header: This stuff rocks! Seriously though, if you can ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff rocks! Seriously though, if you can stand the gentle tickling from the effervescence then you will be very pleasantly surprised. This is the gentlest way to remove blackheads. My nose pores have never been cleaner. I will definitely be buying again when we run out.

But I am a very satisfied customer.

It's seriously worth the money

reviews.review_header: Original product is great, but be careful with the sellers!
reviews.review_text: The first time I ordered this product, I fell in love. It isn't going to solve all your skin issues (ugh, hormones), but it did leave my skin soft with a lot more of an even tone. It has even calmed some of the more painful, cystic acne I've had. Way more than I get from the standard mask. It is a struggle to wash this off in the sink (bubbles everywhere!), but fun to wear in the meantime. I ended up buying another jar immediately. Learn from my mistake: WATCH THE SELLER.I didn't notice I wasn't buying from Elizavecca the second time around (until it was too late). The jar that arrived was green-hued. The product inside was sort of green-hued (not the blue/grey I originally had). It took a half hour to "kind of" bubble up when I finally got up the nerve to test it. My skin hadn't changed. This was a far cry from the actual product I originally received. The second jar was such a disappointment that I am hesitant to buy another.

I used the spatula to quickly applythe clay on my face and then massaged a little on face with fingers in circular motion. Kept it for about 20-25 minutes and washed it off with warm water and cold water after. I saw many comments saying it was a hassle to take it out but I didnt have any problem. I figured that was may be cause I didn't use a lot of clay and I also massaged it making it a thinner layer. Anyways, my face felt softer and pored did appear a little smaller. I LOVE THIS STUFF!! I have somewhat "sensitive skin", mostly I mean it drys out easily when I use mask products. I've been looking for a replacement for my favorite mask, Nu Skin's Epoch mask. I always loved it, it's scent free, but it's kinda spendy and it did dry my skin a little. For about the past month I've gone off all migraine prescription meds and have been trying cannabis for my migraines. I have a few methods, but one is a cannabis balm/salve that I can put on my forehead and temples. It does help. But it's "fat based", because that's how your body absorbs cannabinoids, though fat cells. So even though it works, when I have a bad migraine and use it multiple times. It is oily. This made my need to find a new mask product greater! (In unrelated advice, if you're stuck on topamax and imitrex or zomig for migraines, I suggest getting off of it. They cause so many rebound headaches, and those medications aren't good for you. I've noticed so many small changes in my body, skin, hair, and teeth since I got off those meds. Not to mention LESS headaches, I do get migraines but all those medications CAUSE more rebound headaches.) So back to this amazing mask! I am on the other side of a severe 2 day migraine. I got up this morning, feeling better, also looking like I've been to hell and back. I ate breakfast, had some coffee. I used this mask, because like I said my forehead was greasy. I don't want to get clogged pores! My skin looks amazing! It's my second time using this product. My skin is so soft and smooth. Pores teeny. I LOVE that there is a light scent, but it's hardly noticeable. Another brand i tried from amazon "Deep Sea Mud Mask" was so scented I couldn't stand it. This happy pig mask doesn't dry my skin out AT ALL. The first time I waited a while to moisturize, because I wanted to see if my skin was dried out. NOPE. No dry flaky looking skin. reviews.review_header: Amazing stuff! Leaves skin completely clean AND even!! Blemishes gone!
reviews.review_text: Love! After applying it only once, I knew this was good stuff and have been telling all my friends and family about it. I originally heard about this product through a Facebook video ad - looked it up on Amazon and with all the amazing reviews and price, what did I have to lose? The container itself is really small - a bit disappointing in size but when applying the clay to my face, I hardly used very much. Probably used a portion size similar to a grape. I think the container could provide around 20-30 uses. As far as the product itself - it starts to bubble pretty quickly after applying so you need to be quick. Once it was applied, I left it on for nearly five minutes as it began to bubble over. One thing I wasn't prepared for was the bubbles slightly tickling the face; kind of makes you want to itch but it's really no big deal. The Facebook video ad I watched, the girl popped all the bubbles by lightly pressing on the them and then massaged the clay on her face to look like a real clay mask (I of coarse did this - also side note, the container and packaging have no english instructions what so ever so the Facebook ad served as great instructions). Massaging the left over clay on my face felt great! Velvety. I left it on for another 3 minutes and then finally washed it off. The clay definitely left my face feeling squeaky clean. All my pores looked clean and most importantly minimized. I tend to be on the slightly oily side in skin (no acne issues - an occasional zit or pimple and a few black heads but that's really just occasional) - after my skin started to dry, it started to feel pretty tight (so slightly drying). I used a thick moisturizer and left my skin alone all day. On my way to bed, I went to the bathroom to brush my teeth and literally took a double take in the mirror wondering if I had applied foundation earlier that day - my skin looked flawless! I occasionally have blemishes under my eyes/cheeks but my skin was completely even! I don't think I have ever used a product that has brought instant and amazing results like this - totally recommend it!!!

reviews.review_text: so far so good! Love the tingle it gives off. It does a slight smell to it but nothing face wash can mask the smell. Leaves skin smooth and a bit sticky, however I always moisturize after rinsing.

reviews.review_header: Works Great When You Follow the Instructions
reviews.review_text: First of all, I think a lot of people are using this incorrectly. There are English instructions on the box my mask came in but my Korean mother translated the actual jar for me. It says to take some product out, mix with a little warm water, wait for it to foam and bubble for 3 - 5 minutes, THEN massage it into your skin. I did this incorrectly the first time and saw very little change. A few days later I followed the right instructions and saw a dramatic difference. My large pores appeared clean and smaller. My oily skin was refreshed and not dried out. It does tingle but the instructions say to test before use to test for any allergic reactions. After following the instructions properly, I can say this product worked for me and I am loving my skin after using it.

Putting it on was the worst part, next to taking it off. But that's every clay mask you use. You have this spatula and you're using it to smear the mask on your face, which has the consistency of pudding. I did my nose first because I knew that was the trouble spot, but it was like instant when it started foaming. Then again, it was pretty warm because of the sun when I was walking home with it, so I'll give that the benefit of the doubt. My face feels softer, especially my nose. The sides of my nose aren't as clear as when I use the Bioré charcoal face scrub in the shower, though. However, this mask did dry up the acne I did have, so now they're not much trouble :) I used a little too much on my top lip because when it foamed to max capacity it was going in my nose. Don't use too little because it'll just dry and not do anything; use too much and you're a foam monster LOL But like the other scrub, when I took it off (with multiple paper towels), my face was red. Once it was off for a few minutes it was back to normal so nothing to be worried about. Though I was surprised that I felt no burning sensation like I usually do with the other. You may have to wash off your face multiple times to make sure you got it all off; appearances are deceiving and when a part of your face is still sticky you'll know. Overall, I am very pleased with it. It's a fun way to pamper yourself when you're having a bad day and the results make you feel (and look) good :)

reviews.review_header: LOve it! Laugh while you use it
reviews.review_text: LOve it! Laugh while you use it, and makes skin so soft after the first use!

I LOVE this product! First, it's fun. It's a great product to use if you have your friends staying the night, you're cheering up a girlfriend, or you're bonding with your mom. Everyone gets a kick out of it. It spreads over nicely and immediately starts bubbling up; a little goes a long way with this. It's great with light makeup removal - it's recommended that you use this product with an unwet, uncleansed face. I personally wouldn't use it while you've still got heavy makeup on, but a light cleansing beforehand would be enough; this product will get the rest of the stuff off. Once you apply it, you spread the product over your face, avoiding your eyes, mouth, and I like to avoid my nostrils. The product will begin bubbling almost immediately, but reaches peak bubbling after about 5-10 minutes. Because this product bubbles, it expands past where you initially placed it on your face. For this reason, keep the product further from your eyes/eyelashes than you would with other masks. It's fairly easy to wash off with cool water, but it does take a few minutes since the product doesn't dry completely like other cream masks might. I just stand over the sink or get in the shower afterwards to wash it all off. Makes your skin feel VERY clean and helps tremendously with blackheads and helps my pores a little. Doesn't do anything for deep zits, whiteheads, scarring, etc...So if your problem is big pores and blackheads, this product will be great. It's not harsh, and doesn't leave my face feeling extremely tight like other clay masks. The bubbles DO get a little ticklish/itchy while they're forming. The smell is light and pleasant. It's got a goopy, thick consistency...almost like pudding. A small spatula is included to scoop the product, which is super nice! A topper underneath the lid holds the spatula in place. The packaging is NOT strong - don't drop this container or you might have little grey, bubbly goop everywhere. Store this in a cool place and make sure the lid is securely on after every use - if it's loose or the topper isn't on, it will begin to bubble in the package excessively and you will lose product. Overall, a very fun and quality product for those with pore or blackhead issues.

This stuff is so ridiculously fun to use, and Snapchat worthy when it's in peak bubbling form. I literally look like a grey cloud with this on my face, or that iPhone grey moon emoji in cloud form. Picture worthiness aside, it's a product that works! My skin feels very soft and clean after I wash it off, and I recommend that this product be used before showering so that it's easier to wash off because attempting to wash it off in front of the sink took a while. I really like the spatula it comes with, it helps with applying the product evenly on the face but be sure to apply it a bit away from the nostrils and eyes because it foams up rather high; the first time I used it it blocked my nostrils with how high it foamed and got onto my lashes. Don't forget to massage the product before washing it off, it helps with removing dead skin cells and I've noticed that it re-foams afterwards which theoretically should help with lifting up and off any dead skin cells and other gunk. This product does have a scent but it's pleasant and light, I think it shouldn't be an issue for most people. I have fairly sensitive skin and I haven't experienced any skin issues with this product. Be sure to check on the Elizavecca website if the product you receive is a legit product or not, there's a sticker on the packaging with a scratch off bar that will reveal a code to type in. Their website is a little confusing to navigate and very cluttered, but even with zero knowledge of Korean I was able to find the verification page.

reviews.review_header: Might work well for others, but not for me.
reviews.review_text: For skin care, different products work/don't work for different people of different skin types. Although this was a super fun product to use, it did not work out for me. Like so many people, I had to get this for the fun factor. I have normal to dry skin. After cleansing, I quickly applied the product all over my face. I could feel it bubbling on my face. It neither tickled nor hurt. It felt like I was "sweating a lot". After 5 minutes, I looked like Papa Smurf. This is the most amusing skin care product I have every used. BUT, it took forever to wash it off my face. Almost like washing your hands with a super slimy soap that you can't get off. It's probably better if you use a face towel. After drying my face, I noticed that not was I left with dry skin, but it was accompanied by micro red bumps on my face. They weren't super red, but definitely noticeable. As fun as it is to use, this is not something that I would ever touch again. This is not to say that it wouldn't work for others. There are many good reviews so give it a try.

reviews.review_header: Very fun and very effective but hard to remove
reviews.review_text: This is one fun product that I will continue to buy until I find something else this fun. You don't need to cleanse beforehand, you just put this on with the spatula and spread it on your face. Remember that the more exposure to air the jar gets the more it will expire so be quick with that application! Do not get this anywhere below your nose or near your eyes because it foams up and gets huge. You look like an angry grey cloud and you'll be even more angry if this gets up your nose or in your eyes. It does itch on occasion and that can be super weird to deal with just persevere! Once the mask is done bubbling and looks deflated then you rub it all over your face until it isn't that spreadable. Now here comes the most irritating part: washing it off. Washing this puppy off takes time and work because the second you add water and the whole thing becomes a sticky foaming cleanser. You have to constantly do multiple rounds of rinsing to get this fully off your face but it is so worth it. My skin feels and looks fantastic after using this and the blackheads seem to be completely gone or missing which is great! It's super fun to do with your friends and it works very well! I'd buy again.

Super fun to use, the bubbles take some getting used to! I even got my husband to do it with me, although he couldn't take the bubble feeling I thought it was cool. You're supposed to leave it in for about 5-10 min, and then massage into your face and then wash off. I read that it was difficult to wash off so my husband hopped in the shower and I used a wash cloth. Using a cloth made it simple, and my face felt great after!

reviews.review_text: Received this in the mail last night, I could not wait to try it! I've watched so many videos and not only did they say it left your skin feeling so soft but it looked fun too! I have never used any facial products. So this being my first was fun and I couldn't be happier. I had a hard time opening it, but my husband got it open quickly so it could just have been me not knowing how. After putting it on my face right away it starts working so I have to be quick to smooth it on all around my face. The only TIP I have, and again this could just be me because it was my first time, do not put it so close to your eyes. My eyes were kind of burning although nothing got in them. I put the mask too close to my eyes. I could feel it working, my face felt like it was not burning but something was going on. It didn't hurt but it was different. Washing it off took me a while but once I had it off OMG my face felt amazing. I kept making my husband touch it because it was just so smooth. Love this product! Cannot wait to try it again.

reviews.review_header: This is a very fun skincare product
reviews.review_text: This is a very fun skincare product! (Make sure to keep closed when not using- WILL FOAM UP IN CONTAINER) My partner and I both decided to give it a go. His skin is not sensitive, my skin is and easily gets irritated. I've used this product multiple times and am happy to report, no skin irritation! I do find the smell something I need to get used to. The first time, the smell was overpowering. I tend to use it once every few weeks (mostly because I'm lazy and have other products I love) and I've grown to mostly enjoy the smell. My partner liked the scent right away. After this is a carbonated mask, it does BUBBLE UP. It goes on kind of goopy and then foams up quite fast, in my opinion. BE CAREFUL of your eyes and nose. Foams up enough to intrude those areas if you put it close by. The feeling of it actually bubbling up is ticklish. My partner barely lasted five minutes before he had to wash it off. I lasted to about ten minutes. FUN THING. You can actually rub it back to a smooth consistency AFTER it foams up... and then it will foam back up. After washing off the mask (which can take a minute or two), my skin felt awesome. It had a nice glow to it and felt so smooth and nice. All in all, fun and awesome product. I even purchased one for a gift for my sister. SHE LOVES IT.
Its probably the best mask I've ever gotten. My face was soo smooth & clean after I washed it off. The bubbles were fun & it smelled great! Will definitely be buying this again!

Super fun mask! Gets bubbly and tingly almost immediately. However, I do have sensitive skin, so it made my face a bit dry and a little itchy ( it is clay, afterall). Maybe tred lightly if you're on the sensitive side as well.

I read reviews of this product but was still a little skepticle, but thought I would give it a try. First off, it's just so much fun! It bubbles up quite a bit, so be sure to leave room around eyes, nose, etc. Aside from that it left my skin feeling so clean and smooth. Very impressed! I will absolutely purchase again when this runs out and I'm looking forward to trying more from this brand.

This is an inexpensive mask, so I did not have high expectations when buying this. The mask bubbles on your face, but if you have ever used a bubble/carbonated mask before, this one is underwhelming. The best part about carbonated masks is feeling tons of bubbles "pop" on your skin, but with this mask you do not feel them. This is a clay mask, so it just feels like the mask is too heavy for you to feel any bubble action. I will say that my skin felt ok after using this product. My pores shrunk a bit and my skin felt tighter, though very dry. It feels like there is a lot of soap/detergent in it. It does a good job at cleansing your face. This is one of those masks that takes forever to wash off (most clay masks do). It gets everywhere and makes a mess. The results are definitely not worth the cleanup.I only gave it three stars because you can't feel the bubbles popping on your skin, and because it was very drying. I just think there are so many better masks out there.

This was one of those "sure why not" impromptu purchases. I think this product is more of a fun gimmick than anything else. In what recent study did we find that fizz is good for the skin? Not sure, but I'll admit it's neat when it fluffs out. It scares my husband every time too, so there's that. It doesn't do much else, though. I have very oily skin with large pores and frequent acne, and I didn't find that it made my skin super smooth or anything. This mask works wonders for oily skin! I love how it feels when it bubbles up. But to answer questions. Yes it does bubble up faster depending on how oily your face it when applying it. And Yes it does itch alot when it bubbles but after that your face feels so refreshed and clean. I would recommend a face moisturizer if your skin gets to dry because it literally gets rid of all your oils. I work part time at a pizza shop and my face is naturally oily already but with the grease an oils there it makes my face super oily and when I applied it I didnt wash my face so it started working immediately. Its a fast acting mask so when you apply it id say to work slightly faster then with other masks. Also. When you wash it off it is EXTREMELY soapy and you dont wanna get it in your mouth lol it tastes bad. But it does have a nice scent and yes after applying the product some of the product will bibble up in the container but its okay cause its just reacting from the oils on the applicator that you used while dipping it back into the container. Other than that its a great product and I wish I could rate it more than five stars. So I highly recommend it to other people who have oily skin and like a refrest feeling after a face mask. No pain all gain!

I first heard about this face mask on Facebook, a video of this girl applying it and talking about this product went viral and I decided I had to try it, it looked too fun. For starters, this mask is REALLY fun to apply. It comes out like a think clay (as the label states) and once exposed to oxygen in the air it starts bubbling up so you do have to apply it really fast before it starts bubbling. Once the mask has completely bubbled you massage it a bit more in the skin and then wash it off. Playing with the bubbles was fun cause I'm a dork haha. This product smells really good too so thats another pro. The only reason why I rated it 4 out of 5 starts is because this mask is supposed to do many things but a few are lightening up dark circles and attacking white/black heads. Its supposed to deep clean and get rid of problem areas on the skin. I felt as if my face was super duper clean after I used it but my black heads/ white heads remained the same and ive used this product many times now and still the same result. So it didn't feel that it did did cleaning but did make my face feel soft like a babies bum and clean at the surface. Overall, this product is so unique and cool and I would buy it again.

I have never even had that kind of results with pore strips! This mask is great, I am very pleased!
